The town loggia in Grožnjan dates to the late 16th c. It used to be the court house.The historic core of Grožnjan has many valuable and old houses. ~~~ One of the most interesting is the preserved structure from the Venetian period, the town loggia.	Gradska loža u Grožnjanu datira na kraj 16. stoljeća, a u pro&scaron;losti je u njoj zasjedao sud.Povijesna jezgra Grožnjana obiluje vrijednim i starim kućama, a jedna od najzanimljivijih očuvanih građevina iz venecijanskog razdoblja je gradska loža.	-0.0123188
Pass through the 15th century town gate, and you will immediately see the Renaissance town loggia from 1587.	Kad se prođe kroz gradska vrata iz 15. stoljeća, odmah je uočljiva renesansna gradska loža iz 1587. godine.	0.448112
It has four columns and a limestone floor. ~~~ There are four Roman burial plates inside it.	Loža ima četiri stupa i pod od vapnenca, a u njoj se nalaze četiri rimske nadgrobne ploče.	-0.00592105
The loggia used to be the seat of the court as Grožnjan had its own statute, compiled in Italian as part of the 1558 notary document, and divided into four books.	Ovdje je u pro&scaron;losti zasjedao sud, budući da je Grožnjan imao vlastiti statut, sastavljen na talijanskom u notarskom spisu iz 1558. i podijeljen na četiri knjige.	0.379768
The fontico or the town's food storehouse, was located above the loggia.	Iznad lože nalazio se fontik, odnosno gradsko skladi&scaron;te namirnica.	0.275806
Istrian building heritage of the Venetian era	Istarska graditeljska baština venecijanskog razdoblja	0.2175
The Romanesque House situated on Marafor Square in Poreč was renovated and extended several times during its history.	Romanička kuća smje&scaron;tena na trgu Marafor u Poreču, kroz svoju povijest vi&scaron;e je puta obnavljana i nadograđivana.	0.431373
Despite numerous interventions during the time, the house kept the basic characteristics of the Romanesque residential architecture.	Usprkos brojnim zahvatima tijekom vremena, kuća je zadržala osnovne karakteristike romaničke stambene arhitekture.	0.268868
The house layout is simple and regular, with no inner partitions.		-0.3
It was built from simple roughly carved blocks. ~~~ The 1926 restoration maintained all the changes emerged during previous divisions.	Tlocrt kuće je jednostavan i pravilan, bez unutarnjih pregradnih zidova, a zidana je od jednostavnih grubo klesanih blokova.	-0.00825688
Its present-day appearance stems from the period after WW2 as it had been a part of the residential complex destroyed by bombing and not restored.	Restauracijskim zahvatom, izvedenim 1926. godine, zadržane su sve promjene nastale tijekom ranijih pregradnji.	0.231
The Romanesque house is today a detached building.		-0.3
Erected in the 13th century, its last major divisions were probably made in the 18th century when the second floor was partitioned and a wooden balcony added.		-0.3
Although stemming from later construction work and cannot be considered an original part of the Romanesque House, the wooden balcony contributes to the its picturesque quality. ~~~ The house ground floor used for economic purposes is today the gallery.	Svoj dana&scaron;nji izgled dobiva nakon Drugog svjetskog rata, budući da je građevina bila u sklopu stambenog bloka koji je uni&scaron;ten bombardiranjem i nije kasnije obnavljan te danas Romanička kuća stoji kao samostalan objekt.	-0.00658537
The first floor is accessed by the external stone staircase, while the second is reached by the inner, wooden stairs.		-0.3
Upper floors are also open for public.		-0.3
The Ethnographic Heritage Collection is on exhibit there.	Istarska graditeljska baština venecijanskog razdoblja	0.3
Istrian building heritage of the Venetian era ~~~ The intensive red colour of its facade, lavishly decorated by architectural elements in white stone are the main characteristics of the Battiala-Lazzarini Palace, presently used by the People's Museum of the town of Labin.The Baroque Battiala-Lazzarini Palace, located in the old town core, next to the Parish Church of the Birth of the Blessed Virgin Mary, is one of the most beautiful structures in Labin.	Pročelje intenzivne crvene boje, bogato dekorirano arhitektonskim elementima u bijelom kamenu obilježje je palače Battiala-Lazzarini u kojoj je danas Narodni muzej grada Labina.Barokna palača Battiala-Lazzarini smje&scaron;tena u starogradskoj jezgri, pored župne crkve Rođenja Blažene Djevice Marije jedna je od najljep&scaron;ih zdanja u Labinu.	0.0533256
Its impressive facade, affluently decorated windows and corners, additionally emphasized by white stone from which they were made, opposing the intensive red colour of the walls.	Upečatljivo pročelje zgrade, bogato dekorirani prozori i kutovi zgrade, dodatno nagla&scaron;eni bjelinom kamena od kojeg su izrađeni, a koji odskaču od intenzivne crvene boje zidova.	0.280519
The facade blue doors and windows add to a more dramatic overall impression of the Battiala Lazzarini Palace. ~~~ The construction of one of the most beautiful buildings in Labin started in 1630 by the Battiala family. ~~~ The palace was built in two phases.	Na fasadi se ističu i vrata i prozori plave boje koji čine jo&scaron; dramatičnijim cjelokupan dojam palače Battiala Lazzarini.Jedna od najljep&scaron;ih zgrada u Labinu počela se graditi 1630. godine, a gradnju je započela obitelj Battiala.	-0.0649508
The older part was built in the 17th century, while the facade was started in the early 18th century and completed in 1727.	Palača se gradila u dvije faze, stariji dio u 17. stoljeću, dok je fasada nastala početkom 18. stoljeća, a dovr&scaron;ena je 1727. godine.	0.366176
The impressive structure of almost 1000 m2 in surface consists of a central body which extends in the north-south direction, and the elongated rectangular wing of the east-west direction.	Impresivno zadnje povr&scaron;ine gotovo 1000 četvornih metara sastoji se od sredi&scaron;njeg korpusa koji se proteže u pravcu sjever &ndash; jug te izduženog pravokutnog krila smjera istok &ndash; zapad.	1.39668
The first palace owners, the Battialas, were of the Turkish-Albanian descent. ~~~ They had several estates in Istria, but chose Labin as their residence, in the current Battiala Lazzarini palace.	Prvi vlasnici palače, obitelj Battiala, su tursko &ndash; albanskog podrijetla koji su po Istri imali nekoliko svojih posjeta da bi se naposljetku smjestili u Labinu, u dana&scaron;njoj palači Battiala Lazzarini.	-0.0180723
In the 19th century, a member of the Battiala family, Margherita, married to Lodovico Lazzarinija, marking the beginning of the Labin branch of the Battiala Lazzarini family. ~~~ Their family crest had a symbol of mortality, the phoenix, and bore the motto 'Moriendo renascitur'.	U 19. stoljeću članica obitelji Margherita Battiala udala se za Lodovica Lazzarinija i tim brakom započinje labinski ogranak obitelji Battiala Lazzarini, koji su u svom obiteljskom grbu imali simbol besmrtnosti, pticu feniks, i napisano geslo 'Moriendo renascitur'.	0.105212
The last palace owners were the three brothers, Giuseppe, Nicol&ograve; and Tommaso.	Posljednji vlasnici palače bila su tri brata, Giuseppe, Nicol&ograve; i Tommaso, a nakon II.	0.73316
After the WW2, the palace was nationalized as a boarding school at first and then turned into apartments.	svjetskog rata palača je nacionalizirana pa je u njoj najprije otvoren učenički internat koji je zatim pretvoren u stanove.	0.232584
From 1960, it has been the site of the People's Museum of the town of Labin.	Od 1960.godine u njoj je smje&scaron;ten Narodni muzej grada Labina.	0.29
The building was thoroughly renovated and restored from 1982 until 1994.Prvog svibnja 6, HR-52220 LabinT: +385 (0)52 852 477<a href="mailto:narodni.muzej.labin@pu.t-com.hr" target="_blank">narodni.muzej.labin@pu.t-com.hr</a><a href="http://www.labin.hr/" target="_blank">www.labin.hr</a>	Zgrada se temeljito sanirala i restaurirala od 1982. do 1994. godine.Prvog svibnja 6, HR-52220 LabinT: +385 (0)52 852 477<a href="mailto:narodni.muzej.labin@pu.t-com.hr" target="_blank">narodni.muzej.labin@pu.t-com.hr</a><a href="http://www.labin.hr/" target="_blank">www.labin.hr</a>	1.79658
Istrian building heritage of the Venetian era	Istarska graditeljska baština venecijanskog razdoblja	0.2175
The Morosini-Grimani Castle is a medieval edifice with expressed Renaissance features.		-0.3
It was named after the two families, its owners.Svetvinčenat was erected on the border which changed through history with the exchange of conquerors.		-0.3
It was first mentioned in 983 in the document by Oton II as the property of the Bishop of Poreč. ~~~ Its ownership was first taken over by the Castropola family, and then by the Morosini family in 1384. ~~~ Pietro Morosini was last mentioned as the master of Svetvinčenat in 1529.	Ka&scaron;tel Morosini-Grimani predstavlja oblik kasne srednjovjekovne gradnje s nagla&scaron;enim renesansnim karakteristikama, a ime dobiva po dvjema obiteljima u čijem je vlasni&scaron;tvu bio.	-0.107273
The new owners, the Grimani family, were being mentioned in the written documents since 1560.		-0.3
The Grimanis renovated the castle after the fire.		-0.3
Both families, the Morosinis and the Grimanis are the most significant in the history of the castle as well as of the entire village.		-0.3
This is why the castle was named after them: Morosini-Grimani.	Istarska graditeljska baština venecijanskog razdoblja	0.282353
Istrian building heritage of the Venetian era		-0.3
Note:	Napomena:	0.1
The Svetvinčenat square is the most comprehensive example of planned Renaissance urbanism with rows of houses, a cistern and the parish church, naturally.Svetvinčenat is an exceptional example of a planned and inspired erection of a settlement from the early 16th century when the Morosini family became the owner of the castle and feudal lands.	Trg u Svetvinčentu predstavlja najcjelovitiji primjer planiranog renesansnog urbanizma s nizovima kuća, cisternom i dakako župnom crkvom.Svetvinčenat je izniman primjer planiranog i u jednom dahu podignutog naselja s početka 16. stoljeća kada u posjed ka&scaron;tela i feuda dolazi venecijanska obitelj Morosini.	0.282796
They renovated the castle in its Renaissance form, while Pietro Morosini re-urbanized the entire settlement under the principle of an ideal, regular Renaissance town. ~~~ The Large Square, called the Placa among people, has preserved its Renaissance features, harmonious architectural dimensions and simplicity.	Oni obnavljaju ka&scaron;tel koji dobiva renesansni oblik, dok Pietro Morosini reurbanizira cijelo naselje, po načelu idealnog, pravilnoga renesansnog grada.Veliki trg, pučkog naziva Placa, sačuvao je renesansni izgled, skladne arhitektonske proporcije i jednostavnost.	0.0179167
In the centre of its trapezoid layout is a stone cistern (the well) made in 1808.	Trapezoidnog je tlocrta u čijem se sredi&scaron;tu nalazi cisterna (&scaron;terna) izrađena od kamena, 1808. godine.	0.317351
The square is encircled by the castle and the palace on one side, and the Parich Church of the Annunciation of Mary on its eastern narrower side.	Trg je opasan s ka&scaron;telom i palačom s jedne strane, a na istočnoj, užoj strani je župna crkva Marijina Navje&scaron;tenja.	0.284211
The remaining sides are encircled by a row of identical one-storey houses with Renaissance windows and the town loggia.	Preostale strane okružuje niz istovjetnih jednokatnica s renesansnim prozorima i gradska loža.	0.244186
They are almost identical to the forms of the houses from the late 15th and the 16th centuries built in the Venice folk residential areas.	Nizovi kuća gotovo do u detalje odgovaraju oblicima zgrada s kraja 15. i 16. stoljeća u pučkim četvrtima Venecije.	0.258416
These are simple and functional structures which monumental feature is provided by a symmetrically placed semi-circular single lancet windows.	To su jednostavne i funkcionalne građevine kojima monumentalnost daju simetrično postavljene renesansne monofore polukružnog oblika.	0.292623
The construction of the Parish Church of the Annunciation of Mary dates back to the late 15th century.	Gradnja župne crkve Marijina Navje&scaron;tenja datira na kraj 15. stoljeća, a najvjerojatnije je dovr&scaron;ena 1529. godine.	0.198837
It was most probably finished in 1529. ~~~ Its facade is simplified, with a trefoil finish existing in Venice.	Njezino pročelje je pojednostavljeno, ali s trolisnim zavr&scaron;etkom kakve je također moguće vidjeti u Veneciji.	-0.0211957
There is a family crest with Pietro Morosini initials on the facade.	Na pročelju se također nalaze i obiteljski grb s inicijalima Pietro Morosinija.	0.463528
It was built from local stone. ~~~ However, its architect has remained unknown.	Izgrađena je od lokalnog kamena, no arhitekt je ostao nepoznat.	-0.0294643
The southern part of the square has been occupied by the 18th century town loggia with an open porch and six arches with elegant vaults.	Južni dio trga zaokupila je gradska loža iz 18. stoljeća s otvorenim trijemom i &scaron;est arkada s elegantnim lukovima.	0.283178
The loggia has two entrances, one leading to the main town square, while the other exiting into a side alley.	Loža ima dva ulaza, jedan vodi na glavni gradski trg, dok se drugi otvara prema sporednoj ulici.	0.267073
The square in Svetvinčenat is the most comprehensive example of planned Renaissance urbanism in Croatia.	Trg u Svetvinčentu predstavlja najcjelovitiji primjer planiranog renesansnog urbanizma u Hrvatskoj.	0.296703
Its special significance stems from the unique shaping of all carved architectural details on the castle, houses, the loggia and the church.	Poseban značaj toj cjelini daje jedinstveno oblikovanje svih klesanih arhitektonskih detalja na ka&scaron;telu, kućama, loži i crkvi.	0.2975
Istrian building heritage of the Venetian era	Istarska graditeljska baština venecijanskog razdoblja	0.2175
The magnificent Soardo-Bembo palace in Bale has a monumental 16th c. Gothic-Renaissance facade.Bale is a little town only a few kilometres away from the sea. ~~~ It is located on the hill protruding from the wide plain.	Veličanstvena palača Soardo-Bembo u Balama ima monumentalno gotičko-renesansno pročelje nastalo u 16. stoljeću.Bale je gradić udaljen nekoliko kilometara od mora, smje&scaron;ten na brežuljku koji se izdiže iz &scaron;iroke ravnice.	-0.0245902
A thick town tissue of concentric and radial streets was placed within the walls and towers of the former defensive system.	Gusto gradsko tkivo koncentričnih i radijalnih ulica stije&scaron;njeno je unutar zidina i kula nekada&scaron;njeg obrambenog sustava.	0.250962
Above the town gate and between the two towers of defensive walls, the palace of the Soardo family was built, later taken over by the Bembo family, after whom the palace Soardo-Bembo was named.	Iznad gradskih vrata i između dvije kule obrambenih zidina, sagrađena je palača obitelji Soardo, koju kasnije preuzima obitelj Bembo, po kojima palača i dobiva ima, Soardo-Bembo.	0.294304
It is the most significant structure in Bale, attracting the visitors with the beauty of its recently renovated Gothic-Renaissance facade.	Palača Soardo-Bembo najznačajnija je građevina Bala, a pozornost prolaznika plijeni ljepotom svoje gotičko-renesansne fasade koja je nedavno obnovljena.	0.25
The monumental facade faced west with two wide quadrifores, four windows separated by pillars, simple Gothic windows on its side.	Monumentalno pročelje otvoreno je prema zapadu s dvije &scaron;iroke kvadrifore, četiri prozora odvojena stupićima, a sa strana su jednostavniji gotički prozori.	0.205405
The closed wall mass, simplicity and the absence of carved details led experts to the conclusion that the facade was made in the 14th century. ~~~ However, it was built in the early 16th century.	Zatvorena zidna masa, jednostavnost i odsutnost klesanih detalja navodili su stručnjake na zaključak da je pročelje nastalo u 14. stoljeću, međutim, građen je na samom početku 16. stoljeća.	-0.00931677
During the centuries, the palace changed its purpose and owners. ~~~ The oldest coat of arms is the one of the Nadal family, who ruled it from 1400 until 1470.	Tijekom stoljeća palača je mijenjala namjenu i vlasnike, a najstariji grb pripada porodici Nadal, koja je palačom upravljala od 1400. do 1470.	-0.006
Its purpose was changed in the 15th century; from the fortified defensive structure to the impressive residential building.	U 15. stoljeću promijenjena mu je namjena; od utvrđene građevine s obrambenom funkcijom postaje velebni stambeni objekt.	0.297196
In the following century, the ownership of the castle was taken over by the Bembo family, who used it as the site for numerous social gatherings. ~~~ The exterior of the Soardo-Bembo palace has recently been restored. ~~~ Its original side tower windows, once built shut, were re-opened.	U idućem stoljeću vlasni&scaron;tvo nad ka&scaron;tel preuzima obitelj Bembo koja u njemu organizira brojna dru&scaron;tvena događanja.Vanj&scaron;tina palače Soardo-Bembo nedavno je restaurirana, pri čemu su otvoreni izvorni prozori na bočnim kulama koji su bili zazidani, a danas su u palači uređeni prostori Zajednice Talijana.	-0.128374
The palace renovated premises are used today by the Italian Community.Castel 1, HR-52211 Bale-ValleT: +385 (0)52 824 184<a href="mailto:zajednica.talijana.bale2@pu.t-com.hr" target="_blank">zajednica.talijana.bale2@pu.t-com.hr</a><a href="http://www.civalleztbale.com/hr_CIValle_index.html" target="_blank">www.civalleztbale.com</a>	Castel 1,HR-52211 Bale-ValleT: +385 (0)52 824 184<a href="mailto:zajednica.talijana.bale2@pu.t-com.hr" target="_blank">zajednica.talijana.bale2@pu.t-com.hr</a><a href="http://www.civalleztbale.com" target="_blank">www.civalleztbale.com</a>	4.69304

Although small, the palace of the Counts of Rigo is an exceptional achievement of the Baroque residential architecture.	Iako je mala, palača grofova Rigo iznimno je ostvarenje barokne stambene arhitekture.	0.42419
Apart from the facade, the interior layout has been preserved.The Town Palace of the Rigo family in Novigrad is an exceptional example of Baroque residential architecture.	Osim pročelja djelomično je sačuvan i unutarnji raspored prostorija.Gradska palača grofova Rigo u Novigradu izuzetan je primjer barokne stambene arhitekture, iako mala, palača je oblikovanjem iznimno reprezentativna.	0.311111
Although small in size, its formation makes it exceptionally representative. ~~~ The luxurious edifice was built in 1770.	Rasko&scaron;no je zdanje sagrađeno 1770. godine, a do danas je osim pročelja, djelomično sačuvana i izvorna unutarnja organizacija prostora.	-0.0346154
Apart from the facade, the original inner layout has been preserved until the present day.	Sredi&scaron;nji ulaz prizemlja vodi u predvorje iz kojega se pristupa prvom katu.	0.279167
The central ground floor entrance leads into the antechamber and further onto the first floor.	Lijevo i desno od ulaza bili su, kao i danas, dućani od kojih je jedan ustupio prostor maloj galeriji avangardne umjetnosti, Galeriji Rigo.	0.159259
Left and right from the entrance were, and still are, shops, among which is the Rigo Gallery of the Avant Garde Art.	Čvrsti kubus palače ra&scaron;članjen je na pročelju skladnim ukrasnim elementima kakve ne susrećemo na istarskim palačama iz istoga vremena.	0.19375
The facade of the solid palace cube was disintegrated by harmonious decorative elements which cannot be seen on the Istrian palaces of the time.	Klesani arhitektonski dijelovi svinutih su i mekanih linija, &scaron;to je obilježje kasnobarokne ili rokoko umjetnosti.	0.261111
Carved architectural elements have curved and soft lines, a characteristic of Late Baroque or Rococo.	Zgrada je ujedno i primjer srednjoeuropskog baroka koji preko Trsta prodire u istarsko primorje.	0.285714
The building is also the example of the Mid-European Baroque emerging along the Istrian coastline via Trieste.Velika ulica 5, HR-52466 Novigrad-CittanovaT:+385 (0)52 726 582<a href="mailto:muzej-museo.lapidarium@pu.t-com.hr" target="_blank">muzej-museo.lapidarium@pu.t-com.hr</a><a href="http://galerija-rigo.hr/" target="_blank">www.galerija-rigo.hr</a>	Velika ulica 5, HR-52466 Novigrad-CittanovaT:+385 (0)52 726 582<a href="mailto:muzej-museo.lapidarium@pu.t-com.hr" target="_blank">muzej-museo.lapidarium@pu.t-com.hr</a><a href="http://galerija-rigo.hr/" target="_blank">www.galerija-rigo.hr</a>	5.02564

The Large Well, which takes almost the entire surface area of the little square, has similar Late Baroque features to some palaces in Buzet.	Velika &scaron;terna, koja zauzima gotovo čitavu povr&scaron;inu malog trga, također je kasnobaroknih oblika kao i neke od palača u Buzetu.	0.284746
Its structure is polygonal. ~~~ It was built in 1789 during Captain Marco Antonio Trevisan, on the site of a former well.	Poligonalne je konstrukcije i izgrađena je 1789. godine, u doba kapetana Marca Antonija Trevisana, na mjestu starije &scaron;terne.	-0.024

On the corner of Decumanus and Cardo in Poreč is the Zuccato Palace, today a gallery.	Na uglu porečkih ulica Decumanusa i Carda smjestila se palača Zuccato, danas prenamijenjena u galeriju.	0.216667
Although the Gothic palace has kept its original facade, the interior layout has not been preserved.	Gotička palača očuvala je izvorni izgled pročelja, no unutra&scaron;nji raspored prostorija ostao je nesačuvan.	0.237209
The Zuccato Palace is a three-storey building with the ground- and first floor built from stone, while the second was made of brick.	Palača Zuccato trokatnica je kojoj su prizemlje i prvi kat sagrađeni od kamena dok je drugi kat od opeke.	0.38
The latter was also embellished by architectural details made of stone such as its corner fortifications and, naturally, windows, thus standing out on the reddish brick.	Drugi kat je također ukra&scaron;en kamenih arhitektonskim detaljima, poput pojačanja na uglu i dakako prozori koji se također od kamena pa se ističu na crvenkastoj boji opeke.	0.27931
The main facade opening on the Decumanus Street has Gothic double lancet windows with a trefoil floral finish, first in the row, while the other single lancet windows follow suit.	Otvori na glavnom pročelju, na ulici Decumanus su gotičke bifore s trolisnim cvjetnim zavr&scaron;ecima i to prvi u nizu, dok su ostali prozori monofore također s trolisnim cvjetnim zavr&scaron;ecima.	0.350331
It is interesting to note that the first floor double lancet and the first single lancet window of the Cardo facade were made of stone from Korčula as visible in its colour, different from the rest.	Zanimljiv je podatak da su bifora prvog kata i prva monofora pročelja na Cardu izgrađene od korčulanskog kamena, &scaron;to je vidljivo i u boji kamena koji se razlikuje u odnosu na ostatak.	0.296319
They represent the only imported feature in Poreč of the time.		-0.3

St. Lovreč was the seat of the peasant country Captain.	Istarska graditeljska baština venecijanskog razdoblja	0.28125
His house was along the southwest rim of the wall.		-0.3
It dates back to the 14th c.St. ~~~ Lovreč was also called 'del Pasenatico' (of peasants), as it was the seat of the peasant country Captain &ndash; a military administrator of the Venetian land estates in Istria.	Sveti Lovreč bio sjedi&scaron;te pazenatičkog kapetana, a kuća mu se nalazila uz jugozapadni obod bedema te se datira u 14. stoljeće.Sveti Lovreč imao je i naziv Pazenatički, jer je u 14. stoljeću bio sjedi&scaron;te pazenatičkog kapetana &ndash; vojnog upravitelja kopnenih venecijanskih posjeda u Istri.	-0.0224311
His seat was at the house next to the walls' south-western rim.	Sjedi&scaron;te kapetana bila je kuća koja se nalazi uz jugozapadni obod bedema.	0.198113
The ground and first floor of the structure show the forms of the 14th century medieval architecture.	Ta građevina pokazuje u prizemlju i prvom katu oblike srednjovjekovne arhitekture iz 14. stoljeća.	0.293023
The second floor was added in the 15th century featuring elegant Renaissance windows.	Drugi kat je dograđen u 15. stoljeću i na njemu su elegantni renesansni prozori.	0.282857

The Negri Baroque Palace was owned by the namesake family who moved to Labin in 1512 from the area surrounding Bergamo.	Barokna palača Negri pripadala je istoimenoj obitelji koja se 1512. godine iz okolice Bergama doselila u Labin.	0.457388
The first of the Negri family who lived in Istria was Giovanni Antonio, a banker and a business man. ~~~ From their very arrival, the family enjoyed the privileges and the sympathy of the Venetian podest&agrave;, owing as many as eight houses in Labin.	Prvi pripadnik obitelji Negri koji se nastanio u Istri bio je Giovanni Antonio, bankar i poslovni čovjek, a obitelj je od samog dolaska uživala privilegije i naklonost mletačkih podestata posjedujući čak osam kuća u Labinu.	0.0207831
Right next to the Manzini Palace is the Negri family house (today the location of the Re bar in its atrium).	Odmah do palače Manzini smjestila se kuća obitelji Negri (danas se bar &laquo;Re&raquo; nalazi u atriju ove palače).	0.726493
It was a hospital for a while, then a nursery and a school. ~~~ From their very arrival, the family enjoyed the privileges and the sympathy of the Venetian podest&agrave;, owing nine town houses, three mills and several smaller estates in the late 16th and the early 17th cc. ~~~ They were traders of wood and agricultural products, hunters and fishermen.	Neko vrijeme je u njoj bila bolnica, zatim rodili&scaron;te te &scaron;kola.Jo&scaron; od vremena doseljenja obitelj Negri je uživala privilegije i naklonost mletačkih podestata te su krajem 16. i početkom 17. stoljeća posjedovali devet kuća u gradu, tri mlina i nekoliko manjih posjeda.	-0.102857

St. John of &Scaron;terna is a village near St. Lovreč and the former representative castle of the Polesini family.	Sveti Ivan od &Scaron;terne je selo nedaleko od Svetog Lovreča u čijoj je blizini nekada&scaron;nji reprezentativni dvorac obitelji Polesini.	0.218182
The estate was given as dowry by the Scampicchio family in 1688 to the Gravisi family who later became Marquis Polesini.	Obitelj Gravisi, poslije markizi Polesini, posjed stječu kao miraz od obitelji Scampicchio 1688. godine.	0.474194
The Venetian Apollonio family was also mentioned as one of St. John of &Scaron;terna's owners.	Među ostalim vlasnicima Svetog Ivana od &Scaron;terne spominje se jo&scaron; i mletačka obitelj Apollonio.	0.244444
The noble Polesini family built a castle with the park and neighbouring buildings in the Palladian style on the hilltop near the village, the site of an earlier older castle.	Plemićka obitelj Polesini na brežuljku u blizini naselja, gdje je nekad bio smje&scaron;ten stariji ka&scaron;tel, gradi dvorac s parkom i okolnim zgradama u paladijanskom stilu.	0.392782
It seems that the castle was built according to layouts designed by famous Renaissance architect Andrea Palladio himself.	Čini se da je dvorac sagrađen prema nacrtima koje je izradio sam Andrea Palladio, slavni renesansni arhitekt.	0.438542
It is probably the most beautiful Classicistic structure in Istria, a perfection of Classical architectural composition.	Vjerojatno najljep&scaron;a klasicistička građevina u Istri, savr&scaron;enstvo je klasične arhitektonske kompozicije.	0.283019
Recent research has found that the castle had probably obtained its final form in the 19th century.	Nova istraživanja pokazuju da je svoj definitivni oblik ka&scaron;tel vjerojatno dobio u 19. stoljeću.	0.271429
The main residential building, which is at the same time the biggest structure of the entire complex, has a monumental Classicistic facade with a pronounced two-storey avant-corps and a four column porch accessed by a wide staircase. ~~~ A large central salon was put up in the ground floor entrance area.	Glavnu rezidencijalnu zgradu, koja je ujedno i najveća građevina kompleksa, krasi monumentalno klasicističko pročelje s istaknutim dvokatnim rizalitom i trijemom na četiri stupa, do kojega se pristupalo &scaron;irokim pristupnim stubi&scaron;tem, a u ulaznom dijelu prizemlja nalazio se veliki sredi&scaron;nji salon.	-0.0170588
The Polesinis moved the original staircase into their new villa on the St. Nicholas Island in front of Poreč in the late 19th century. ~~~ A spacious rectangular park surrounded by the wall was also an integral part of the castle. ~~~ Other structures used for economic purposes were placed within the walls.	Izvorno stubi&scaron;te obitelj Polesini, krajem 19. stoljeća, premje&scaron;ta na svoju novu vilu na otoku Sveti Nikola ispred Poreča.Sastavni dio dvorca bio je i prostrani pravokutni park ograđen zidom unutar kojega su raspoređene ostale građevine gospodarske namjene.	-0.126178
There is also a Baroque stone cistern with exquisitely carved details and surrounded by a short wall in the yard.	U dvori&scaron;tu se nalazi i barokna kamena cisterna s lijepo izvedenim kovanim detaljima, a koja je omeđena niskim zidom.	0.262105
A four-corner tower is a reminder of an older castle, which can still be recognized on the northern side of the castle.	Četverouglasta kula kao podsjetnik na stariji ka&scaron;tel, jo&scaron; se uvijek može prepoznati na sjevernoj strani kompleksa.	0.248485

The house with a picturesque name, the House of Two Saints, is an example of the profane Renaissance in Poreč.	Kuća pitoresknog naziva, Kuća dvaju svetaca, primjer je renesansnog profanog stila kojeg je moguće vidjeti u Poreču.	0.26129

The facade is decorated by two reliefs depicting straight standing saints, after which the house was named.	Pročelje je ukra&scaron;eno dvama reljefima uspravnih svetaca zbog koji kuća dobiva svoj naziv.	0.27907

The House of Two Saints dates back to the end of the 15th or the early 16th centuries, while the facade sculptures had originally been a part of an older structure, most probably the St. Cassian Monastery, which archaeological remains were found nearby.	Kuća dvaju svetaca datira se na kraj 15. ili početak 16. stoljeća, dok su skulpture na pročelju pripadale izvorno nekoj starijoj građevini, vjerojatno samostanu Sv. ~~~ Kasijana, čiji su arheolo&scaron;ki ostaci pronađeni u blizini.	-0.00436893

Motovun is a medieval town with the best preserved town walls in Istria. ~~~ As the walls on its western side form two defensive structures, the town is entered by the twin gate.	Motovun je srednjovjekovni gradić s najbolje sačuvanim gradskim zidinama u Istri, a budući da sa zapadne strane zidine formiraju dva obrambena pojasa, u grad se ulazi kroz dvoja vrata.	-0.0143836
The lapidarium with inscriptions and the relief from the Antiquity and the Middle Ages is located in the passage of the external town gates, while the inner ones have Early Gothic features.	Vanjska gradska vrata u svom prolazu čuvaju lapidarij s antičkim i srednjovjekovnim natpisima i reljefima, dok unutra&scaron;nja su ranogotičkih obilježja.	0.261702
A high tower was erected above the main town gates in the 16th century. ~~~ It gave the inhabitants of Motovun security, and made their enemies fear.	Iznad glavnih gradskih vrata podignuta je u 16. stoljeću visoka kula koja je građanima Motovuna ulijevala sigurnost, a neprijateljima strahopo&scaron;tovanje.	-0.0231707
The tower is also known as The New Gate, the name which stems from the 17th century when it was renovated in 1607 during the rule of the Marco Pasqualagia podest&agrave;.	Kula je poznata i pod imenom Nova vrata, a naziv dobivaju jo&scaron; u 17. stoljeću kada su 1607. godine obnovljena pod vla&scaron;ću podestata Marca Pasqualagia.	0.3
As the tower and the communal palace were joined, the tower had access to the citadel walls.	Kula i komunala palača bile su međusobno povezane, kroz nju kula je bila povezana i sa zidinama citadele.	0.245455
Istrian building heritage of the Venetian era	Istarska graditeljska baština venecijanskog razdoblja	0.2175
In the centre of Vižinada is a town square with a large cistern, one of the most important monuments of that type in Istria.	U sredi&scaron;tu Vižinade nalazi se gradski trg s velikom cisternom, jednom od najznačajnijih spomenika takvoga tipa u Istri.	0.273786
Finished in 1782, it was made from local limestone according to the design of Simone Battistella, the architect from Rovinj. ~~~ It is a flawless example of the Venetian Classicism.	Dovr&scaron;ena je 1782. godine i izrađena iz lokalnog vapnenca prema projektu rovinjskog arhitekta Simonea Battistelle te predstavlja besprijekorni je primjer venecijanskog klasicizma.	-0.0138158
The Vižinada cistern is rectangular, consisting of a stone parapet with columns on each of its four corners.	Cisterna u Vižinadi pravokutnog je oblika, a sastoji se od kamenog parapeta koji na svakom od četiri ugla ima stupove.	0.270968
Its interior was divided by columns into three naves. ~~~ South and north entrances used to be closed up by a metal door.	Unutra&scaron;njost joj je bila podijeljena stubovima u tri lađe, a ulazi se nalaze na južnoj i sjevernoj strani te su nekada bili zatvoreni metalnim vratima.	-0.0575758
Two stone wells were covered by metal lids decorated by Baroque iron arabesques.	Dva kamena bunara bila su pokrivena metalnim poklopcima, ukra&scaron;eni željeznim arabeskama baroknog stila.	0.169565
The lion heads on the south facade of the cistern from both sides of a double staircase were used for eliminating water surplus.	Lavlje glave na južnom pročelju cisterne s obiju strana dvokrakog stubi&scaron;ta služile su za ispu&scaron;tanje vi&scaron;ka vode.Sredi&scaron;njim trgom dominira župna crkva Sv.	0.140187
The main square is dominated by the Church of St. Jerome, the one-nave Neo-Classicist structure erected between 1837 and 1840.	Jeronima, jednobrodna građevina nastala između 1837. i 1840. godine.	0.385714
Not far from the church is a self-standing belfry, built most probably in the 16th century.	Građena je u neoklasicističkom stilu, a nedaleko crkve nalazi se samostojeći zvonik, najvjerojatnije izgrađen u 16. stoljeću.	0.151948
The square is encircled by the fontico, the town loggia, the Grimani and Facchinetti family houses, and the four-storey Maraston house, the tallest residential building of Vižinada.The square lost its urban characteristics after the municipal palace of the Grimani family was knocked down.	Trg okružuju građevine poput fontika, gradske lože, palače obitelji Grimani i Facchinetti te kuća Maraston, najvi&scaron;a stambena građevina Vižinade s četiri kata.Trg je izgubio svoja urbana obilježja nakon ru&scaron;enja općinske palače obitelji Grimani koja se nalazila na njegovoj južnoj strani, na čijem je mjestu nedavno sagrađena &scaron;kola, dječji vrtić, igrali&scaron;te i dvorana, a do danas su od nekada&scaron;nje palače sačuvani samo lukovi iz 16. stoljeća.	0.287678
On the site of the palace, which stood to its south, a school, a kindergarten, a playground, and a gym have recently been built.	Zgrada starog fontika, spremi&scaron;ta žita, ima veliki reljef mletačkog lava na pročelju.	0.221429
The only remaining trace of the former palace are the 16th century arches. ~~~ The building of the old fontico, a grain storehouse, has a large relief of a Venetian lion on its facade.	Novi vijek doprinosi snažnom razvoju Vižinade koja postaje obrtničko i trgovačko sredi&scaron;te ovog dijela zapadne Istre, a upravo je ploča uzidana u prizemni dio pročelja fontika dokaz njezinog prosperiteta.	-0.0377483

Poreč experienced progress in the 18th century, when several large economic buildings were erected.	Nastala u trećem desetljeću 18. stoljeća, pripadala je obitelji Sinčić, a danas se u njoj nalazi Zavičajni muzej.	0.248864
	Palača Sinčić najveća je i najznačajnija barokna palača u Poreču, a to dokazuje svojim dimenzijama, konstrukcijom, kao i konkretnom izvedbom dekorativnih detalja.Prostrana kuća ima pročelje obogaćeno profiliranim okvirima prozora i portala, a u sredini je elegantni balkon.	-0.3

Dvorska kapela sagrađena je jo&scaron; 1763. godine, a po uzoru na nju izgrađen je pandan na suprotnom krilu, kako bi se postigla simetrija, a u kojem je stanovao župnik.	-0.131532
The representative Classicistic palace of the Grisoni family was designed by French architect and adventurist Gabriel Le Terrier de Manetot in 1839.	Reprezentativnu klasicističku palaču obitelji Grisoni projektirao je francuski arhitekt i avanturist Gabriel Le Terrier de Manetot 1839. godine.	1.24268
He is responsible for its French Neoclassicistic appearance, unique in Istria.The palace was inhabited from the Antiquity, when it was the Roman villa. ~~~ During the centuries its long and turbulent history, it changed owners and its purpose.	Upravo njemu duguje svoj francuski neoklasicistički izgled, jedinstven na istarskom području.Područje palače bilo je obitavano jo&scaron; od doba antike, kada se na istom mjestu nalazila rimska vila, a kroz stoljeća duge i turbulentne povijesti izmjenjivali su se vlasnici i namjena kompleksa.	-0.0385922
Following the Roman phase, the villa was first inhabited by the Greek monks, then the Benedictines who owned it until the late 13th century when it was given as a gift to the Koper Savini family.	Pa su nakon rimske faze, vilu naselili grčki monasi, a potom i benediktinci u čijem je vlasni&scaron;tvu ostala do kraja 13. stoljeća kada je zdanje poklonjeno koparskoj obitelji Savini.	0.298137
The Koper Counts Grisoni obtained the house in 1738 as the Savinis were without heirs.	Koparski grofovi Grisoni palaču dobivaju 1738. godine budući da je obitelj Savini ostala bez nasljednika, a već 1835.	0.349073
In 1835, Franceso Grisoni vowed to the Benedictines after a personal tragedy, and the palace regained its monasterial function.	Franceso Grisoni nakon osobne tragedije je zavjetuje benediktincima te ona ponovno postaje samostan.	0.657785

The Bettica Palace was most probably erected in the 14th century. ~~~ The Bettica family, after whom it was named, became its owner in the 16th century.	Palača Bettica najvjerojatnije je izgrađena u 14. stoljeću, a vlasni&scaron;tvo obitelji Bettica, po kojoj dobiva ime, postaje u 16. stoljeću.	0.091369
Before they moved to the palace, the Bettica family had lived in other Vodnjan palaces, some of which they had restored, bearing today their family crest with the bishop's wort on it.During the second half of the 19th century and the early 20th century, the palace was often changing its owners. ~~~ It underwent numerous partitions, from condominium subdivision to re-purposing the ground floor premises.	Obitelj Bettica prije nego se nastanila u palači, borave u drugim vodnjanskim palačama, od kojih neke obnavljaju, a na njima se i danas nalazi grb obitelji s biljkom betonikom.U drugoj polovici 19. te početkom 20.stoljeća zgrada je često mijenjala vlasnika, a bila je izložena i brojnim pregradnjama, od etažiranja stanova do prenamjene prostora u prizemlju.	-0.0113977
In the 1930s, a descendant of the Bettica family bought a part of the palace, which was then declared a protected monument of culture.Having finished the long lasting restoration and adaptation, the Vodnjan Museum was opened in the Bettica Palace, exhibiting its material history.	Tridesetih godina pro&scaron;log stoljeća potomak obitelji Bettica otkupljuje dio palače te tada zgrada biva progla&scaron;ena za&scaron;tićenim spomenikom kulture.Nakon dugogodi&scaron;nje restauracije i adaptacije u palači Bettica otvoren je muzej Vodnjana gdje je prezentirana njegova materijalna povijest.	0.413725
Archaeological findings of the early medieval sacral structures are exhibited on its ground floor, while the first floor holds a valuable collection of paintings which was left to the town of Vodnjan by Gaetano Gresler in 1818.	U prizemlju su izloženi arheolo&scaron;ki nalazi pronađeni u ranosrednjovjekovnim sakralnim objektima, dok se na prvom katu nalazi vrijedna zbirka slika koju je slikar Gaetano Gresler ostavio Gradu Vodnjanu 1818. godine.	0.587198
The second floor is dedicated to the palace itself, to its history and restoration works, during which the remains of the Renaissance mural painting were found.	Drugi je kat posvećen samoj palači, odnosno njezinoj povijesti i tijeku radova na restauraciji, prilikom koje su na drugom katu otkriveni ostaci renesansnog zidnog oslika.	0.269118

Romanesque double lancet windows embellishing the first floor of the Parish House in Poreč came from an earlier building. ~~~ The structure is one of only several preserved profane buildings.The parish house or the Romanesque canonica, occupied by the Poreč parish priest even today, is one of the rarely preserved profane Romanesque structures. ~~~ According to the facade inscription, it was built in 1251. The Gate of Hercules in Pula stands between two, most probably medieval towers.	Herkulova vrata u Puli nalaze se između dvije okrugle, vjerojatno srednjovjekovne kule.	0.255882
Architecturally modest, it is built of uncarved stone blocks at the top of which, although hardly recognizable, is a carving of the head of Hercules with visible beard, curly hair and a club.	Arhitektonski skromna vrata izgrađena su od neprofiliranih kamenih blokova na čijem je vrhu, iako jedva prepoznatljiva, uklesana Herkulova glava na kojoj se razaznaju brada, kovrčava kosa i toljaga.	0.271875

The Baredine Pit is located near the village of Nova Vas. ~~~ It is a protected geomorphologic monument of nature.	Jama Bareidne smje&scaron;tena je nedaleko mjesta Nova Vas i za&scaron;tićeni je geomorfolo&scaron;ki spomenik prirode.	-0.0205263
Its depth is 132 meters. ~~~ The pit was discovered in several exploration phases.	Dubina jame iznosi 132 metra, a otkrivala se u nekoliko faza istraživanja.	2.43571
During first ones, which took place in the early 1900s, the depth of 80 meters was reached.	U prvim straživanjima koja su se odvijala početkom pro&scaron;log stoljeća, doprlo se do dubine od 80 metara, da bi se sedamdesetih godina probili do dana&scaron;nje dubine.	1.83333
	Na najnižoj dubini otkrivena su podzemna jezera sa stalnom podzemnom vodom, dubine 16 metara.Obilazak je moguć, a za turiste je uređena staza kroz pet dvorana, do dubine od 60 metara.	-0.3
	Nakon strme ulazne vertikale, unutra&scaron;njost jame prekrivena je bogato ukra&scaron;enim kalcitnim naslagama, stalaktitima, stalagmitima i sigastim stupovima različitih boja.	-0.3
	Oni tvore zanimljive i čudnovate oblike kao na primjer vrlo realističan kip Bogorodice, desetak metara visoke zavjese, tijelo pastirice Milke, kosi toranj iz Pise ili snje&scaron;ko-lučono&scaron;a koji je postao i za&scaron;titnim znakom &scaron;pilje.Za &scaron;pilju Baredine i pastiricu Milku vezana je i jedna ljubavna legenda iz 13. st. During the 1970s, the present depth was reached.	Razbojnici nisu ubili pastiricu nego su je bacili u jamu.	0.25

The Pazin Abyss or the abyss of the Pazinčica river, the longest Istrian subterranean river, is located in central Istria. ~~~ A well-known Pazin Castle was built above it.	Pazinska jama odnosno ponor Pazinčice, najveće istarske rijeke ponornice, smje&scaron;ten je u sredi&scaron;njoj Istri, a ponad nje sagrađen i poznati pazinski ka&scaron;tel.	-0.0124138
Hydrogeologically, the pit is the abyss created at the border of a waterproof bed of the Pazinčica basin and waterproof limestone forming entire south-west Istria.	U hidrogeolo&scaron;kom smislu jama predstavlja ponor koji je nastao na dodiru vodonepropusne podloge sliva Pazinčice i vodopropusnih vapnenaca koji izgrađuju cijeli prostor jugozapadne Istre.	0.234043

Romuald's Cave is located on the east side of the Lim Channel. ~~~ It was named after St. Romuald.	Romualdova &scaron;pilja smje&scaron;tena na istočnoj strani Limskog zaljeva, ime je dobila po Sv.	-0.015
The legend says that the hermit spent several years in the cave around the year 1000.	Romualdu i legendi da je pustinjak oko 1000. godine nekoliko godina boravio upravo u ovoj &scaron;pilji.	0.396189
In his honour, religious procession were held until 1942.	Njemu u čast, sve do 1942. godine, održavale su se vjerske procesije koje bi započele misom u crkvi Sv.	0.366
They would start with the mass in the Church of St. Martin and finish at the cave entrance.	Martina i zavr&scaron;ile na ulazu u &scaron;pilju.	0.11087
The establishment of the nearby Monastery of St. Michael the Archangel on Lim around 1040 is connected with the work of St. Romuald.	Uz djelovanje Sv. ~~~ Romualda povezuje se i osnutak obližnjeg samostana Sv.	-0.102273
The cave is today protected as the karst phenomenon and the habitat of a large bat, endangered and legally protected species.	Mihovila Arhanđela na Limu, oko 1040. godine.Danas je Romualdova &scaron;pilja za&scaron;tićena kao fenomen kr&scaron;a, ali i stani&scaron;te kolonije velikog &scaron;i&scaron;mi&scaron;a, ugrožene i zakonom za&scaron;tićene vrste.	-0.00283019
The cave had been formed 20000 years ago. ~~~ Some of its deposited sediments have large paleontological and paleoanthropological value. ~~~ Many animal remains were found, of which the most interesting are those of long extinct species such as the cave bear, lion, leopard or cave hyena.	Već prije 20000 godina &scaron;pilja je bila formirana, s nataloženim raznim sedimentima, a neki od njih danas imaju veliku paleontolo&scaron;ku i paleoantropolo&scaron;ku vrijednost.	0.753651
Apart from extinct ice age animals, remains of the early man were also found as well as his artefacts such as awls, scrapers and alike. ~~~ A child's molar as the oldest trace of the early man was found in Istria.	Pronađeno je mnogo životinjskih ostataka, a svakako su najzanimljiviji oni, danas odavno, izumrlih životinja poput &scaron;piljskog medjveda, lava, leoparda ili &scaron;piljske hijene.	-0.00538922
The cave is 105 meters long.	Uz izumrle ledenodobne životinje pronađeni su ostaci pračovjeka, od njegovih artefakata kao &scaron;to su &scaron;ila, strugala i slično, do zuba kutnjaka djeteta koji je ujedno i najstariji ostatak pračovjeka pronađen u Istri.Pećina je dugo 105 metara, uski i niski ulaz vodi do nekoliko većih i impresivnih dvorana.	1.81429
The narrow and tall entrance leads to several bigger and more impressive halls.	Vijugav hodnik mjestimice se &scaron;iri i tvori sedam većih prostorija, ali izrazitih ukrasa.	0.229412
A winding corridor widens at places and makes seven bigger rooms with exceptional decorations.	Visina pećine varira između pet do sedam metara, dok &scaron;irina joj je između dva i sedam.	0.3
Its height varies between 5 and 7 meters, while its width is between two and seven.	Romualdovu &scaron;pilju moguće je posjetiti uz stručno vodstvo.	0.255

Mramornica Cave, one of the biggest and most beautiful caves of the Istrian peninsula, is located near Brtonigla, in north-west Istria.	&Scaron;pilja Mramornica jedna je od najvećih i najljep&scaron;ih &scaron;pilja na području istarskog poluotoka, a smje&scaron;tena je nedaleko Brtonigle, u sjeverozapadnoj Istri.	0.317398
	Mramornica se prvi put spominje jo&scaron; 1770. godine kada ju je posjetio, a potom i opisao poznati putopisac Alberto Fortis.Iako pisani trag o &scaron;pilji postoji tek od 18. stoljeća, lokalno stanovni&scaron;tvo poznavalo ju je od pradavnih vremena pa su tako Mramornicu u pretpovijesti koristili tada&scaron;nji stanovnici Istre.	-0.3

Istria's Thermal Spa is located in the Mirna river valley, in the forest area with the Mediterranean climate.	Istarske toplice smje&scaron;tene su u dolini rijeke Mirne, u &scaron;umovitom kraju gdje vlada sredozemna klima.	0.277419
The spa has several thermal springs, of which the largest and the most important one is the St. Stephen's springing from underneath the 85 meter high rock.	Toplice imaju vi&scaron;e termalnih izvora, a najveći i najznačajniji je izvor Svetog Stjepana koji izvire ispod stijene visoke 85 metara.	1.85176
	Po njemu su se nekada i same toplice nazivale Terme Santo Stefano.Bogata natrijem, kalcijem i klorom sadrži jo&scaron; drugih deset minerala, a također je i radioaktivna i visoko sumporovit &scaron;to je razlog njezine ljekovitosti.	-0.3
	Ljekovit je i anorganski glinasto-vapneni, sumporni, radioaktivni fango koji je natopljen termalnom vodom.	-0.3
	U lječili&scaron;tu Istarske toplice liječi su dugi niz bolesti od di&scaron;nih organa do lokomotornog sustava, a liječi se inhalacijama, kupkama, oblozima&hellip;Istarske su toplice već u antičko vrijeme bile poznate pa su pronađeni rimski novci, nakit i natpisi koji svjedoče o njihovom boravku na tom području.	-0.3
The spa itself used to be called the Santo Stefano Spa after it.	Kroz srednji vijek gubi se pisani trag o kori&scaron;tenju toplica, a ponovno se spominju u 17. stoljeću.	0.0849057

The Lim Bay, known as the channel or the fjord, is located on the west coast of Istria, near Vrsar.	Važni i nacionalni parkovi, botanički vrtovi, prirodna baština	0.188136
It is a sunken karst valley, almost 13 km long.	Limski zaljev, poznat i kao kanal ili fjord nalazi se na zapadnoj obali Istre, u blizini Vrsara, a riječ je o morem potopljenoj kr&scaron;koj dolini dugoj gotovo 13 kilometara.	2.44615
It is gradually getting more narrow from the entrance on. ~~~ The Lim Channel extends deeper into the interior of the Istrian peninsula creating the Lim Cove, extending almost to Pazin.	&Scaron;irina mu se od ulaza pa prema kraju postupno smanjuje, no Limski se kanal proteže dublje u unutra&scaron;njost istarskog poluotoka tvoreći Limsku dragu koja seže skroz do Pazina.	-0.00774194
The total length of the Lim Bay and its land extension, the cove, is 35 km.	Ukupna duljina Limskog zaljeva i drage koja je u biti njegov kopneni nastavak, je 35 kilometara.	2.1379
Since 1964, it has been a legally protected geomorphologic and hydrogeological site as important landscape.		-0.3
In 1980, it was declared a special marine reserve.A particular feature of the Lim Bay is its brackish water resulting from the subterranean sweet water in the form of submarine karst spring emerging at the bay's end, making its salinity much lower.		-0.3
A high concentration of oxygen creates specific features and enables a high bio production of planktons, fish and shellfish for breeding, especially mussels and oysters. ~~~ The bay coast is rather steep and high.	Od 1964. zakonom je za&scaron;tićen geomorfolo&scaron;ko-hidrogeolo&scaron;ki lokalitet kao značajni krajolik, a od 1980. godine progla&scaron;en je i specijalnim rezervatom mora.	-0.0156442
The northern side is covered by evergreen vegetation, and the southern by deciduous trees.		-0.3
Northern coast verticals show four dark openings of larger semi-caves and caves, of which the most important is the Romuald's Cave.		-0.3
Important national parks, botanic gardens, natural heritage	Važni i nacionalni parkovi, botanički vrtovi, prirodna baština	0.272222
The Motovun forest spreads along the Mirna River Valley, from the Istrian Spa to Livade and along the valley of the Botonega river.	Motovunska &scaron;uma pruža se dolinom rijeke Mirne, sve od Istarskih toplica do Livada te dolinom rječice Botonege.	0.282692
Although no woody nor herbaceous species is indigenous to it, the forest of Motovun represents the last preserved type of lowland Mediterranean autochthonous forest of common oak, narrow-leafed ash and elm.	Iako nijedna drvenasta ili zeljasta vrsta nije svojstvena samo njoj, Motovunska &scaron;uma predstavlja posljednju sačuvanu nizinsku poplavnu mediteransku autohtonu &scaron;umu hrasta lužnjaka, poljskog jasena i brijesta.	0.262712
Such forests are known as longozas. ~~~ Only three have been preserved on the Mediterranean and the Ponta shore, of which one on the Istrian peninsula.	Takve su &scaron;ume poznate pod nazivom longaze, a danas na mediteranu i pontskom primorju sačuvane su samo tri, od kojih je jedna upravo na istarskom poluotoku.	-0.0154762
It was declared a special forest vegetation reserve in 1963, spreading across 275 hectares. ~~~ In the course of history, the forest was often being destroyed.	Posebnim rezervatom &scaron;umske vegetacije progla&scaron;ena je 1963. godine, a rezervat se prostire na povr&scaron;ini od 275 hektara.	1.01835
The Austro-Hungarian navy used its trees for building its ships.	Važni i nacionalni parkovi, botanički vrtovi, prirodna baština	0.283929
Important national parks, botanic gardens, natural heritage ~~~ The Brijuni Islands, located in the south of the western Istrian coast, has a total of 14 islands and islets, making it the best indented and largest group of islands on the Istrian area.	Brijunsko otočje smje&scaron;teno je na južnom djelu zapadne obale Istre, broji sveukupno 14 otoka i otočića, čineći ih najrazvedenijom i najvećom skupinom otoka istarskog područja.	0.62397
Together with the surrounding sea and underwater life, Brijuni was declared the national park in 1999 in light of its exceptional value.	Brijuni zajedno s okolnim morem i podmorjem progla&scaron;eni su Nacionalnim parkom 1999. godine, zbog svoje iznimne vrijednosti.Najveći je Veliki Brijun, a njegove kao i obale ostalih otoka uglavnom su niske i kamenite, ali lako pristupačne.	0.184745
	Geolo&scaron;ki i geomorfolo&scaron;ki Brijuni su nastavak zapadne Istre pa ne čudi činjenica da su do prije deset tisuća godina bili sastavni dio istarskog kopna.Brijuni obiluju ostacima dinosaura koji su ondje boravili prije otprilike 160 milijuna godina, a mogu se vidjeti na četiri lokaliteta na Velikom Brijunu.	-0.3
	Brijunski dinosauri smje&scaron;teni su u doba krede, posljednjeg razdoblja prije njihovog izumiranja, a vi&scaron;e od 200 otisaka zadivljujućih gmazova moguće je vidjeti u krednom parku.	-0.3
	Ostaci su otkriveni jo&scaron; 1925. godine, no detaljnija istraživanja izvr&scaron;ena su tek devedesetih godina pro&scaron;log stoljeća, kada se otkrilo da otisci pripadaju dvonožnim mesojedima Theropodima i agresivnim i brzim mesojedima iz skupine Coelurosaria.Životinjski svijet na otocima obogaćen je mnogobrojnih unesenim vrstama pa stoga pored autohtonih kao &scaron;to su zečevi ili razne vrste ptica moguće je vidjeti egzotične i manje egzotične životinje koje su se izvrsno aklimatizirale, poput jelena lopatara, lama, zebri ili slona.	-0.3
The largest of the islands is Veliki Brijun.	Uz faunu, flora ima neizbježnu ulogu.	0.264706
Its coast as well as those of other islands are mainly short and rocky, although easily reachable. The Palud Bay, located eight km south-west of Rovinj, is the only ornithological park in Istria.	Uvala Palud, smje&scaron;tena osam kilometara jugozapadno od Rovinja, jedini je ornitolo&scaron;ki park u Istri.	0.434146
	Prirodna depresija koja se nalazi u neposrednoj blizini mora, a zbog pritjecanja vode s okolnih brda i zaravni, ali i iz izvora na sjevernoj strani, pretvorila se u močvaru.	-0.3
	Za vrijeme djelovanja austro-ugarske vojne baze u Barbarigi, prokopan je kanal dužine 200 metara od močvare do mora s ciljem da se onemogućiti razvijanje ličinki komaraca koji su bili prijenosnici malarije.Spajanjem slatke vode močvare i mora, Palud mijenja svoje karakteristike i dobio nove stanovnike, prije svega naselili su ga cipli i jegulje, koji vole boćate vode.	-0.3
Water from neighbouring hills and valleys as well as northern side springs turned this natural depression located in the vicinity of the sea into a swamp.	Stariji stanovnici Rovinj&scaron;tine spominju vrijeme kada se u močvari moglo naći i drugih riba, koje su do&scaron;le u potrazi za hranom.	0.282927
During the existence of the Austro-Hungarian military base in Barbariga, the 200 m long canal was dug up to reach the sea for the purpose of preventing the development of mosquito larvae, transmitters of malaria.	Bogatstvo vrsta i broja ptica koje ovdje stalno ili povremeno obitavaju najznačajnija je odlika ove močvare.Ornitolozi su na Paludu zabilježili boravak vi&scaron;e od 200 vrsta ptica, a brojne migracije proljetne i jesenske odlična su prilika za njihovo promatranje.	1.12449

<span>Located on one of the northern most points of the Mediterranean, the Učka Mountain dominates over Istria by connecting it with the continent.	Smje&scaron;tena na jednoj od najsjevernijih točaka Mediterana, planina Učka dominira Istrom spajajući je s kontinentalnim djelom.	0.456303
The view from its highest peak, Vojak, extends beyond the visible encompassing not only Istria, but also the islands of Kvarner, and even the Alpes and Venice.	S najvi&scaron;eg vrha, Vojaka pruža se pogled unedogled pa osim Istre vide i kvarnesrki otoci, čak i Alpe te Venecija.	0.209709
The nature park includes the namesake mountain and a part of Ćićarija, a total surface of 160 square meters.	Park prirode obuhvaća istoimenu planinu i dio područja Ćićarije, sveukupnu povr&scaron;ine od 160 kvadratnih kilometara.	2.30444

Neposredna blizina mora kao i sam reljef Učke uvjetovalo je razvoj specifične klime i bujne vegetacije, a to je dovelo do stvaranja parka prirode.	0.254762
Učka was declared the protected area in April 1999.	Učka je progla&scaron;ena za&scaron;tićenim područjem u travnju 1999. godine.	0.713333
</span> ~~~ Important national parks, botanic gardens, natural heritage	Važni i nacionalni parkovi, botanički vrtovi, prirodna baština	-0.0101695
Rt Kamenjak najjužniji je dio Istre, a poluotok prekrasne i bogato razvedene obale dugačke gotovo četiri kilometra, s čak 30 uvala i 11 nenastanjenih otočića koji također sačinjavaju arhipelag.	Rt Kamenjak najjužniji je dio Istre, a poluotok prekrasne i bogato razvedene obale dugačke gotovo četiri kilometra, s čak 30 uvala i 11 nenastanjenih otočića koji također sačinjavaju arhipelag.	4.1
Prekriven niskim raslinjem i makijom, s malo borove &scaron;ume i oranica, čini područje gdje vlada prava mediteranska klima.	Prekriven niskim raslinjem i makijom, s malo borove &scaron;ume i oranica, čini područje gdje vlada prava mediteranska klima.	3.14211
Zbog iznimnih prirodnih vrijednosti, ali i zbog &scaron;to efikasnije za&scaron;tite devastacija, rt Kamenjak je 1996. godine progla&scaron;en za&scaron;tićenim područjem, a brigu o njemu preuzela je javna ustanova Natura Histrica. Important national parks, botanic gardens, natural heritage	Važni i nacionalni parkovi, botanički vrtovi, prirodna baština	0.272222
The Glagolitic Lane is the most important monument commemorating the Glagolitic followers and the Glagolitic script. ~~~ It runs along the road from Roč to Hum.	Aleja glagolja&scaron;a najvažniji je spomenik podignut glagolja&scaron;ima i glagolja&scaron;tvu, a proteže se uz cestu od Roča do Huma.	-0.0145161
The Lane is the project of the Chakavian Parliament, designed by Zvane Črnja and realized through the work of professor Josip Bratulić and sculptor Želimir Jane&scaron;.	Aleja je projekt Čakavskog sabora čiji je idejni začetnik bio Zvane Črnja, a osmislili su je profesor Josip Bratulić i kipar Želimir Jane&scaron;.	0.886069
Emerging from 1977 until 1985, it bears witness to centres of the Croatian medieval Glagolitic literature in Istria pointing to Slavic roots and the literacy of the time as well as to its continuity from the 9th century until the present day.	Nastajala je od 1977. do 1985. godine, a svjedoči o sredi&scaron;tima hrvatske srednjovjekovne glagoljske književnosti na području Istre upućujući na slavenske korijene te na ovda&scaron;nju pismenosti i njezin kontinuitet od 9. stoljeća do danas.	0.271782
Educational trails	Poučne staze	0.184615
The Basilica trail is a biking and hiking route, which 19 kilometres have been trying to increase the potential of the already existing Limes trail. ~~~ The entire length of the trail has a gastronomic and educational character as well.	Staza Basilica biciklističko &ndash; pje&scaron;ačka je dionica koja u dužini od 19 kilometara nastoji valorizirati dio već postojeće staze Limes, dok cjelokupna staza je i gastro-edukativnog karaktera.	0.623908
There are 11 educational signs as well as 10 directional ones set up on the main trail points.	Na cijeloj njezinoj dužini postavljeno je 11 edukativnih panoa, ali i 10 putokaza na glavnim punktovima staze.	2.23077
It stretches from Valalta or the Basilica valley, along the wide area of the Lim Channel, the Rovinj Village, intertwining with the former Kanfanar-Rovinj railroad.	Staza se proteže od predjela Valalta, odnosno dolina Bas&igrave;lica, uz &scaron;ire područje Limskog kanala, Rovinjskog Sela, ispreplićući se s nekada&scaron;njom željezničkom prugom Kanfanar-Rovinj.	0.206383
The Basilica trail passes several important historical sites such as the churches of St. Bartholomew, St. Christopher, St. Thomas or St. Proto, as well as the abandoned Roman quarry.	Staza Basilica prolazi i uz nekoliko značajnih povijesnih lokaliteta poput crkava Sv. ~~~ Bartolomeja, Sv. ~~~ Kri&scaron;tofora, Sv. ~~~ Tome ili Sv.	-0.170268
There are four resting points established along the trail, in the vicinity of the Churches of St. Thomas, St. Christopher and St. Proto and at the Lim Channel viewpoint.	Prota, ali i uz napu&scaron;teni rimski kamenolom. ~~~ Duž trase koja je dijelom asfaltirana, a dijelom makadamski put, uređena su četiri odmori&scaron;ta kod crkava Sv. ~~~ Toma, Sv.	-0.104225
One part of the trail has been asphalted, while the other is macadam.	Kri&scaron;tofora i Sv. ~~~ Prota te kod vidikovca na Limskom kanalu.	-0.00258621
Landscapes with vineyards, olive groves and orchards, as well as protected natural beauties and rich vegetation stretching along the Lim Channel, make this trail particularly charming.	Krajolici oplemenjeni vinogradima, maslinicima i voćnjacima, kao i za&scaron;tićene prirodne ljepote i bogata vegetacija koja se proteže uz Limski kanal, daju stazi posebnu draž.	0.3
Educational trails	Poučne staze	0.184615
Due to its isolation, the village of Kotli has kept its rural 19th century look. ~~~ It also managed to preserve its mills that were in use till 1964.	Selo Kotli je zbog izolacije sačuvalo ruralni izgled s kraja 19. st. kao i poznate mlinove, upotrebljavane do 1964.	0.0589015
The stone houses have many wooden elements, a material much used in the old architecture of northern Istria.	Kamene kuće imaju niz elemenata od drva, koje se mnogo koristilo u staroj arhitekturi sjeverne Istre.	0.286364
When compared to the surrounding area, these houses are more complex and lavish.		-0.3
Thanks to the development of trades and crafts, life in Kotli was good.	U usporedbi s okolicom, kuće su složenije i bogatije.	0.225
Its inhabitants were known to be excellent players of the traditional musical instruments bajs, vijulina and klarinet.	U Kotlima se zbog razvijenog obrta dobro živjelo, a stanovnici slovili kao vrsni svirači tradicijskih instrumenata bajsa, vijuline i klarineta.	0.230097
Educational trails	Poučne staze	0.184615
<span>Water has always been one of the most important living conditions. ~~~ Springs, wells and cisterns used to be the lifeline of any settlement, including Labin.	Voda je oduvijek bila jedan od najvažnijih uvjeta za život, a nekada su izvori, bunari i &scaron;terne bili žile kucavice svakoga mjesta pa tako i Labina.	-0.00676692
Labin is the right place to learn about past water springs and wells, commissioned by rich noble families.	A upravo je u Labinu moguće upoznati se s nekada&scaron;njim izvorima vode, ali i &scaron;ternama koje su dali graditi bogate plemićke obitelji.	0.18
The Path of the Labin Wells encompasses several springs such as the Vrućka, the Blažićevo or the Negri Cave spring, numerous wells in the town itself including the Negri family well in the Negri Palace, the well in the Giuseppina Martinuzzi Street, the one in the yard of the Scampicchio Palace and on the terrace of the Vinko &Scaron;aina painting studio, and the one located on the plateau of the Paolo Sfeci Street.	Staza Labinske &scaron;terne obuhvaća i nekoliko izvora poput Vrućka, Blažićevo ili izvora u Negrijevoj &scaron;pilji, a dalje se obilazi brojne &scaron;terne u gradu od &scaron;terne obitelji Negri u Palači Negri, &scaron;terna u ulici Giuseppine Martinuzzi, one u dvori&scaron;tu palače Scampicchio pa do &scaron;terne na terasi ateljea slikara Vinka &Scaron;aine i one na platou u ulici Paola Sfecija.	0.606059

Educational trails	Poučne staze	0.184615
The Palud Bay, located eight km south-west of Rovinj, is the only ornithological park in Istria.	Uvala Palud, smje&scaron;tena osam kilometara jugozapadno od Rovinja, jedini je ornitolo&scaron;ki park u Istri.	0.434146
	Prirodna depresija koja se nalazi u neposrednoj blizini mora, a zbog pritjecanja vode s okolnih brda i zaravni, ali i iz izvora na sjevernoj strani, pretvorila se u močvaru.	-0.3
	Za vrijeme djelovanja austro-ugarske vojne baze u Barbarigi, prokopan je kanal dužine 200 metara od močvare do mora s ciljem da se onemogućiti razvijanje ličinki komaraca koji su bili prijenosnici malarije.Spajanjem slatke vode močvare i mora, Palud mijenja svoje karakteristike i dobio nove stanovnike, prije svega naselili su ga cipli i jegulje, koji vole boćate vode.	-0.3
Water from neighbouring hills and valleys as well as northern side springs turned this natural depression located in the vicinity of the sea into a swamp.	Stariji stanovnici Rovinj&scaron;tine spominju vrijeme kada se u močvari moglo naći i drugih riba, koje su do&scaron;le u potrazi za hranom.	0.282927
During the existence of the Austro-Hungarian military base in Barbariga, the 200 m long canal was dug up to reach the sea for the purpose of preventing the development of mosquito larvae, transmitters of malaria.	Bogatstvo vrsta i broja ptica koje ovdje stalno ili povremeno obitavaju najznačajnija je odlika ove močvare.Ornitolozi su na Paludu zabilježili boravak vi&scaron;e od 200 vrsta ptica, a brojne migracije proljetne i jesenske odlična su prilika za njihovo promatranje.	1.12449
	Budući da u park ne zalaze lovci, ovdje je bogato stani&scaron;te fazana, trčki i prepelica.U autohtonim gustim &scaron;umama s hrastom meduncem i crnikom kontinuirano žive i gnijezde se razne vrste divljih pataka, liski, gnjuraca i koko&scaron;ica, grmu&scaron;a, vuga, djetlića te mnogih drugih.	-0.3
	Sjeverni dio Paluda skriva pravu pra&scaron;umu s vrabama, a na otočićima se gnijezde galebovi.	-0.3

The Path of the Survey of Istrian Land Boundaries, an established thematic path, is located near the village of Karojba in hinterland Istria.	Put Istarskog razvoda nalazi se pokraj mjesta Karojba u unutra&scaron;njosti Istre, a riječ je o uređenoj tematskoj stazi.	0.424561
The path starts at the Our Lady of Lourdes, built in 1898, and leads along the way used by medieval government officials and local population in setting boundaries.	Staza započinje kod Gospe Lurdske, sagrađene 1898. godine, i vodi putem kojim su u srednjem vijeku prolazili onda&scaron;nji predstavnici vlasti i lokalno stanovni&scaron;tvo, utvrđujući međe.	0.221739
It passes and points to those boundaries which have remained until the present day.	Put Istarskog razvoda prolazi i ukazuje upravo na njih koje su danas vidljive.	0.28209

Educational trails	Poučne staze	0.184615
Parenzana used to be the railroad which connected Poreč and Trieste from 1902 until 1935.	Parenzana je nekada&scaron;nja željeznička pruga koja je povezivala Poreč i Trst, a prometovala je od 1902. do 1935. godine.	0.733929
It was a fundamental economic link which connected Istria with the world, and facilitated the development of the poorest parts of Istria of that time by transporting agricultural products of north-west Istria such as wine, fruit, vegetables and grain.	Pruga je bila osnovna gospodarska poveznica Istre sa svijetom te je omogućila razvoj tada najsiroma&scaron;nijih dijelova Istre, prevozeći poljoprivredne proizvode sjeverozapadne Istre poput vina, voća, povrća ili žita.	0.275758
Educational trails	Poučne staze	0.184615
Kažun, one room, dry stone and mostly round structure is one of the Istrian specificities.	Kažun, jednosobna, suhozidom zidana kamena zdanja većinom kružna tlocrta, jedan je od specifičnosti Istre.	0.423077
Their greatest concentration is in the southern part of the Istrian peninsula. ~~~ There are more than 3000 huts in the vicinity of Vodnjan, and some in the northern and eastern parts.	Najbrojniji su u južnom predjelu istarskog poluotoka, gdje ih u okolici Vodnjana možemo pronaći vi&scaron;e od 3000, no ima ih i na sjevernom i na istočnom djelu.	-0.012766
Kažuni were traditionally used as shelters for farmers and shepherds in remote fields, and for storing tools.	Kažuni su tradicionalno služili kao skloni&scaron;te za ratare i pastire na udaljenijim poljima, a služili su i za odlaganje oruđa.	0.388421
They were erected in the areas where the stone had to be removed to obtain fertile land. ~~~ As a result, a lot of stone was left behind.	Nastajali su na predjelima gdje se za dobivanje plodnog tla teren morao krčiti od kamena te je stoga kamena bilo u izobilju.	-0.00714286
	Njegova zanimljivost krije se u dimenzijama te posebnom tehnikom gradnje, odnosno suhozidom, jednostavnim slaganjem kamena na kamen bez da ih i&scaron;ta međusobno povezuje.Kako bi se očuvala ova posebnost, nedaleko Vodnjana otvoren je park kažuna, gdje je prikazana gradnja jednog kažuna u četiri faze, od temelja preko zidanja zidova i krova te naposljetku i finalni izgled.	-0.3
Its interesting feature are its dimensions and a particular construction method, a so-called dry stone building, a simple placing of stones on top of each other with no mutual bond.	Parka kažuna je svojevrsni muzej na otvorenom gdje se posjetiteljima prezentira istarska graditeljska tradicija, a osim toga jednom godi&scaron;nje organizira se i radionica prilikom koje su polaznici djelomično izgradili zid okolo parka kažuna.	0.17451
Educational trails	Poučne staze	0.184615
Among numerous walking paths on the Labin and Rabac area, the Sentona's trail is one of the most beautiful. ~~~ It stretches from the foot of the old town along the main road to Rabac and the Maslinica Cove in the Rabac Bay.	Područje Labina i Rapca obiluje &scaron;etnicama, a jedna od najljep&scaron;ih je Sentonina staza koja se proteže od podnožja staroga grada glavnom cestom za Rabac, do uvale Maslinica u Rabačkom zaljevu.	-0.00251397
The 2.5 km long path has a mild ascend or descend, as it can be taken in both directions. ~~~ The chosen direction dictates the duration of a walk.	Staza dugo gotovo dva i pol kilometra s blagim usponom, odnosno silazom budući da se stazom može pje&scaron;ačit u oba smjera.	-0.0122727
On average, it takes from one to two hours. ~~~ The Sentona's trail is suitable for all ages and persons of normal physical condition.	O smjeru kretanja ovisi i trajanje pojedine &scaron;etnje, ali prosječno je potrebno od jednog do dva sata za obilazak.	-0.0116505
However, as some of its parts are rather steep, comfortable sport shoes are recommended.	Sentonina staza pogodna je za sve uzraste i osobe u normalnoj fizičkoj kondiciji, no na dijelovima je strma pa je potrebna udobna sportska obuća.	0.106579

The Vela draga educational trail goes along the namesake canyon located on the western slopes of Učka.	Poučna staza Vela draga prolazi rubom istoimenog kanjona, smje&scaron;tenog na padinama zapadnih obronaka Učke.	0.655682
	Interpretacijske ploče pisane su jednostavnim popularno&ndash;znanstvenim jezikom u četiri jezične varijante, kojim se obja&scaron;njavaju geolo&scaron;ki fenomeni postanka masiva Učke i samog kanjona, a postavljene su duž cijele dužine staze.Staza Vela Draga podijeljena je na dvije etape, one laganije i ne&scaron;to kraće do vidikovca odakle se pruža veličanstven pogled na vapnenačke tornjeve i druge, duže i teže.	-0.3
	Ona počinje od vidikovca kroz kanjon do podnožja kamenih tornjeva i samog dna Vele drage, a cjelokupna staza broji ne&scaron;to vi&scaron;e od dva kilometra.Vela draga spomenik je izuzetne geomorfolo&scaron;ke vrijednosti, a nastala je djelovanjem vodenih bujica koje su u vapnenačke stijene urezale kanjon u dužini od 3500 metara.	-0.3
	Počinje kod tunela Zrin&scaron;čak te zavr&scaron;ava kod Boljunskog polja, a njegovu posebnost čine &scaron;iljaste stijene, s tornjevima visokim između 50 i 90 metara, od kojih je nekolicina uni&scaron;tena pri gradnji tunela Učka.	-0.3
Signs, written in a simple popular scientific way in four languages and set up along the entire path, explain the geological phenomena of Učka and the canyon itself.	Najvi&scaron;i dio kanjona nalazi se na 600 metara nadmorske visine dok je najniži upravo onaj kod Boljunskog polja na nadmorskoj visini od samo 153 metra.	0.284211
	Kanjon je prekriven bujnom vegetacijom od vrbe i topole od bukve i tise, dok pojedini dijelovi imaju i pra&scaron;umski karakter.Vela draga je od 1963. godine za&scaron;tićena kao rezervat prirode, a od 1998. kao geomorfolo&scaron;ki spomenik prirode.	-0.3
	A osim geolo&scaron;kih fenomena, ova staza poučava o alpinizmu i slobodnom penjanju, sportovima koji su u Veloj dragi prisutni jo&scaron; od davne 1931. godine kada je alpinist Emilio Comici ispenjao prvi alpinistički smjer.	-0.3
	Vela draga tako je s vremenom postala poznato penjali&scaron;te na kojemu su mnogi hrvatski i europski alpinisti i sportski penjači stjecali dragocjeno iskustvo.T: + 385 (0)51 293 753<a href="mailto:park.prirode.ucka@inet.hr" target="_blank">park.prirode.ucka@inet.hr</a><a href="http://www.pp-ucka.hr" target="_blank">www.pp-ucka.hr</a>	-0.3

The village of Skitača is located on the southern most part of the Labin peninsula, on the 425 m high hilltop, surrounded by four hills - Goli, O&scaron;tri, Brdo and Orlić.	Mjesta&scaron;ce Skitača smje&scaron;teno je na najjužnijem dijelu labinskog poluotoka, na proplanku visine 425 metara i okruženo četirima brdima, Goli, O&scaron;tri, Brdo i Orlić.	2.26301
These are the village protectors against harsh bora winds, frequent in the area.	Upravo oni &scaron;tite selo od o&scaron;trih naleta bure, koja je česta pojava na tom području.	0.230435

Note: ~~~ Dvigrad was first mentioned in 879, when it fell under the rule of the Patriarch of Aquileia.	Kako doći:Iz Labina automobilom prema Brgodu i dalje Brovinju do Skitače (20 km u jednom smjeru).Napomena:	-0.0158824

However, it had existed long before it as a part of the Roman province settlement.	I sam njegov naziv govori da su se ovdje prvotno nalazila dva grada.	0.236842
	Dana&scaron;nje su ru&scaron;evine ostaci sjevernijeg grada Moncastella, dok je drugi, Castel Parentino napu&scaron;ten u 10. stoljeću.	-0.3
Its name speaks originally of two towns.	Prapovijesni arheološki lokaliteti	0.291176
Today's ruins are the remains of the northern town of Moncastello, while the other one, Castel Parentino, was abandoned in the 10th century.	Gradina je brončanodobno naselje koje se sastoji od sredi&scaron;njeg platoa opasanog trostrukim bedemima, a ulazi su postavljeni tako da čine labirint otežavajući ulazak u naselje.	0.191597

	Picugi su skup od tri brežuljka na kojima su gradinska naselja, a smje&scaron;teni su nekoliko kilometara jugoistočno od Poreča.	-0.3
	Svaki brežuljak uz naselje ima i pripadajuću nekropolu, sa željeznodobnim žarama.Čini se, osim &scaron;to su gradinska naselja bila za&scaron;tićena s po tri koncentrična bedema, da je postojao i četvrti bedem, koji je povezivao sve Picuge u jednu cjelinu.	-0.3
Gradina is the Bronze Age settlement consisting of the central plateau encircled by three walls.	Prema slučajnim nalazima vjeruje se da su gradine bile nastanjene od kasnoga srednjeg neolitika pa sve do rimskoga razdoblja.	0.206024
	Picugi su prije svega značajni zbog željeznodobnih žarnih nekropola, gdje je samo u istraživanjima na kraju 19. stoljeća pronađeno vi&scaron;e od 500 ukopa.	-0.3
Entrances were set up in the labyrinth form so as make the entrance into the settlement more difficult.	Nekropole su samo djelomično istražene i to na južnom podnožju Picuga I. i II., dok se u podnožju Picugi III.	0.268966
	spominju pojedinačni nalazi. ~~~ U grobovima je pronađeno mno&scaron;tvo predmeta, od tipičnih keramičkih žara trbu&scaron;astih oblika, ure&scaron;enih geometrijskim motivima do vrijedni vaza venetskoga, daunijskog i etru&scaron;čanskoga podrijetla.	-0.3
	Osim toga brončane posude, situle i kotlići, kacige, ručke lepeza i različiti oblici nakita, također su bili dio inventara nekropola.	-0.3

The settlement was surrounded by triple walls built in the dry wall technique.Monkodonja is a Bronze Age settlement located on an elevation and surrounded by fertile plains all the way to the coastline, five kilometres east from Rovinj.	Brojni arheolo&scaron;ki nalazi ukazuju na kontinuirano naseljavanje, od prapovijesti do kasne antike.Arheolo&scaron;ki lokalitet Nezakcij (Vizače) nalazi se na brežuljku Glavica pokraj Valture, istočno od Pule, nad plodnom dolinom i zaljevom Budava.	0.264

Numerous archaeological findings show its permanent population, from the prehistoric era until the Late Antiquity.The archaeological site Nesactium is located on the Glavica hill near Valtura, east of Pula, above a fertile valley and the Budava Bay. Nesactium is thought to have been the seat of the Histri, a people of the Indo-European descent who were formed in the early Iron Age after the settlement of today's Istria peninsula. Remains of a Neolithic settlement were found including wicker cottages glued together by soil and mud, as well as parts of the ceramics and some dishes. Starting point is the central reception of the tourist village Lanterna, north towards Hotel Iris, an asphalted path leads through the shade of the holm and underbrush to the road with the path sign for Sport Valeta, left downhill leads to the beach.It continues left through the sports center to the asphalt paved waterfront (lungomare) from which the view of Novigrad-Cittanova is beautiful. Then follow the signs for restaurant Delfin, around which you come to the very peak called Rt Zub (Cape Tooth) where a stone house with a lighthouse is situated.Promenade by the sea (lungomare) follows the northwest side of the peninsula, following the signs for the restaurant Marina.
