The trail length: 2.500 mWalking time: from 45 minutes to 1.15 hoursNotes:	S druge strane parkirali&scaron;ta asfaltirani je puteljak do autobusne stanice i recepcije Lanterna.Duljina staze: 2.500 metaraVrijeme pje&scaron;ačenja: 40 mindo 1,15 hNapomene:	0.0760817
Start is at the central reception of the Lanterna tourist village by pavement on to the cemented road eastwards towards Tar-Torre, pass the horse training grounds and stables to the intersection of the Solaris naturist camp where you turn right and after 100 m cross the street on the left (horseshoe tracks are visible even on the asphalt) then continue along the evergreen woods about 150 m to the huge olive oil plantation.There you turn right and continue along the edge of the olive-grove and the fence of the auto-camp around 500 m where a land trail road turns left into the olive grove through the plantation reaching the intersection and continue right along the edge of the olive grove almost to where it ends on the ridge of the hill.100 m before the end of the olive grove, along a vineyard, the main land trail turns left through the field to the first house on to a gravel road on the left where manhole lids are visible at intervals leading tothe asphalted road Santa Marina-Vabriga-Abrega.	Polazak je od recepcije Turističkog naselja Lanterna nogostupom istočno uz asfaltiranu cestu prema Taru, mimo manježa i konju&scaron;nice do raskr&scaron;ća za Naturistički kamp Solaris gdje se skreće desno i nakon 100 m prelazi cestu ulijevo (vidljivi su tragovi konjskih kopita i na asfaltu) te se produžuje uz borov &scaron;umarak oko 150 m do velike plantaže maslina.Ovdje se skreće desno i nastavlja uz rub maslinika i ograde autokampa, otprilike 500 m, gdje zemljani put ide lijevo u maslinik.	0.678096
It continues to the left uphill through the village and pass a small church of St. Antun then further right uphill (pavement) to the intersection of the regional road Novigrad-Poreč.On the 'upper' side of the intersection there is a pedestrian crossing and continues on to a pavement which goes through the town Tar-Torre, at first through Istrian street to the center, pass the Tourist information center on the right on S. Martin Street behind the church on Borgo street where in the olive oil refinery olives from the surrounding plantations are refined into high quality extra virgin Tar-Torre olive oil.Continuing left again on to Istarska ulica street to the church of St. Martin (the town's patron) with a beautiful bell tower next to it. 	Martina (za&scaron;titnika mjesta) uz koju je lijepi zvonik.	-0.3
	Istarskom ulicom vraća se do restorana Turris i desno nogostupom do raskrižja s regionalnom cestom Novigrad-Cittanova &ndash; Poreč.	-0.3
	Preko raskrižja (oprez, nema označenog pje&scaron;ačkog prijelaza) uz zanimljive skulpture vodi ravna asfaltirana prometnica uz koju se sliže natrag na polazi&scaron;te u Lanternu.Duljina staze: 9.400 metaraVrijeme pje&scaron;ačenja: od 2:30 h do 3:30 hNapomene: Povratak iz Vabrige i Tara može se planirati i noću jer je cijela dionica uz prometnice osvijetljena. ~~~ Iz Tara je moguć povratak na Lanternu autobusom.	-0.3
	Staza je pogodna za biciklistie, a u prvom dijelu i za jahanje (najam konja na početku staze).Tijekom dužih ki&scaron;nih razdoblja dijelovi staze kroz maslinik razmjerno su blatnjavi.	-0.3
Poreč and surroundings	Poreč i okolica	0.91
Lanterna tourist village by pavement on to the cemented road eastwards towards Tar-Torre, pass the horse training grounds and stables to the intersection of the Solaris naturist camp where you turn right and after 100 m cross the street on the left (horseshoe tracks are visible even on the asphalt) then continue along the evergreen woods about 150 m to the huge olive oil plantation.There you turn right and continue along the edge of the olive-grove and the fence of the auto-camp around 500 m where a land trail road turns left into the olive grove through the plantation reaching the intersection and continue right along the edge of the olive grove almost to where it ends on the ridge of the hill.100 m before the end of the olive grove, along a vineyard, the main land trail turns left through the field to the first house on to a gravel road on the left where manhole lids are visible at intervals leading tothe asphalted road Santa Marina-Vabriga-Abrega.	Turističkog naselja Lanterna nogostupom istočno uz asfaltiranu cestu prema Taru, mimo manježa i konju&scaron;nice do raskr&scaron;ća za Naturistički kamp Solaris gdje se skreće desno i nakon 100 m prelazi cestu ulijevo (vidljivi su tragovi konjskih kopita i na asfaltu) te se produžuje uz borov &scaron;umarak oko 150 m do velike plantaže maslina.Ovdje se skreće desno i nastavlja uz rub maslinika i ograde autokampa, otprilike 500 m, gdje zemljani put ide lijevo u maslinik.	0.709528
It continues to the left uphill through the village and pass a small church of St. Antun then further right uphill (pavement) to the intersection of the regional road Novigrad-Poreč.On the 'upper' side of the intersection there is a pedestrian crossing and continues on to a pavement which goes through the town Tar-Torre, at first through Istrian street to the center, pass the Tourist information center on the right on S. Martin Street behind the church on Borgo street where in the olive oil refinery olives from the surrounding plantations are refined into high quality extra virgin Tar-Torre olive oil.Continuing left again on to Istarska ulica street to the church of St. Martin	Kroz plantažu se dolazi do "raskrižja" i nastavlja desno uz rub maslinika gotovo do njegovog kraja na hrbatu brežuljka.100 m prije kraja maslinika, uz jedan vinograd, glavni kolski put skreće lijevo kroz polje do prve kuće na po&scaron;ljunčani put lijevo na kojem su u razmacima vidljivi poklopci &scaron;ahtova, a vodi do asfaltirane ceste Santa Marina &ndash; Vabriga-Abrega. ~~~ Njome se nastavlja lijevo uzbrdicom kroz selo, zatim uz crkvicu sv. ~~~ Antuna desno i dalje uzbrdicom (nogostup) do raskrižja s regionalnom prometnicom Novigrad-Cittanova &ndash; Poreč.S "gornje" strane raskrižja je pje&scaron;ački prijelaz i nastavlja se nogostupom kroz mjesto Tar.	-0.148196
The trail length: 9.400 metersWalking time: from 2 hours and 30 minutes to 3 hours and 30 minutes Notes:	Najprije Istarskom ulicom do sredi&scaron;ta, pa pored turističkog informativnog ureda desno Ulicom sv.	0.27931
	Martina "iza" crkve u Ulicu Borgo u kojoj je uljara gdje se u cijenjeno ekstra djevičansko tarsko ulje prerađuju masline iz okolnih plantaža.Nastavlja se lijevo opet u Istarsku ulicu do crkve sv.	-0.3
Starting point is at the big parking lot by the pedestrian crossing along the Olge Ban Park then turn left by Nikola Tesla Street to the Liberty square where the Church of the Lady of Angels from the 18th century is situated.	Martina (za&scaron;titnika mjesta) uz koju je lijepi zvonik. ~~~ Istarskom ulicom vraća se do restorana Turris i desno nogostupom do raskrižja s regionalnom cestom Novigrad-Cittanova &ndash; Poreč.	-0.00948276
	Preko raskrižja (oprez, nema označenog pje&scaron;ačkog prijelaza) uz zanimljive skulpture vodi ravna asfaltirana prometnica uz koju se sliže natrag na polazi&scaron;te u Lanternu.Duljina staze: 9.400 metaraVrijeme pje&scaron;ačenja: od 2:30 h do 3:30 hNapomene:	-0.3
On the opposite side of the square there is the entrance to the old town core, nearby which is situated the Pentagonal tower from the 15th century which can be climbed.Its continued straight down to Decumanus street at number 5, its worth to look at a Venetian palace with beautiful trefoil (so called flower gothic) and at number 9 a Baroque palace Sinčić from the 18th century in which the town museum is situated.At the St. Eleuterij street intersection turn right to the Poreč Cathedral Euphrasius' Basilica from the 6th century which was enlisted with the whole sacral complex- the baptistery, the remains of pre-Euphrasius Basilica, the bishops' palace and the bell tower as UNESCO'S world cultural heritage.You continue on through Euphrasius street along the park of Jurja Dobrile, up to Ljudevita Gaja Street then left on to the square Trg Marafor, once an ancient forum romanum.	Polazak je s velikog parkirali&scaron;ta pje&scaron;ačkim prijelazom oko Parka Olge Ban pa lijevo Ulicom Nikole Tesle na Trg slobode na kojem je crkva Gospe od Anđela iz 18 st. Na suprotnoj strani trga ulaz je u starogradsku jezgru uz kojeg je Peterokutna kula iz 15. st. na koju se može popeti.Nastavlja se ravno ulicom Decumanus u kojoj na broju 5 treba pogledati venecijansku palaču s lijepim triforama (tzv. ~~~ cvjetna gotika), a na broju 9 baroknu palaču Sinčić iz 18. st. u kojoj je smje&scaron;ten gradski muzej.Na križanju s Ulicom sv. ~~~ Eleuterija skreće se desno do porečke katedrale - Eufrazijeve bazilike iz 6. st. koja je s cijelim sakralnim sklopom (krstionica, ostaci predeufrazijevih bazilika, biskupska palača, zvonik) upisana u UNESCO-v popis svjetske kulturne ba&scaron;tine.Nastavite Eufrazijevom ulicom uz Park Jurja Dobrile do Ulice Ljudevita Gaja pa lijevo na Trg Marafor, nekada&scaron;nji antički forum romanum. ~~~ Idite natrag glavnom ulicom (Decumanus) pored zanimljive Romaničke kuće iz 13. st. i nekoliko lijepih gotičkih palača ponovo do križanja s Eleuterijevom ulicom, pa desno do Ulice sv.	-0.0982082
Then go back again on to the main street (Decumanus) next to an interesting Romanesque house from the 13th century and a few beautiful Gothic palaces again to the Eleuterij street intersection, then right to St. Mauro street and left along the Fisherman&rsquo;s square on to the Franje Glavinića street again left to Decumans and just on the right there is the Pentagonal tower.Behind the tower turn right onto Vladimira Nazora street, follow it to the People&rsquo;s square where is situated the town theater from the end of the 19th century and a further down there is the picturesque Town Hall from the beginning of the last century from which one can turn towards the sea on to the waterfront and continue right, on Obala marsala Tita where nearby the Round tower from the 15th century can be found.The town harbor is closed off by the island of St. Nikola which during summer can be reached by a ship, along the waterfront one can get to Hotel Palazzo (ex Hotel Riviera the oldest hotel in Poreč) and passed it to "riveta", the coast of Matko Laginja, which leads to the Istrian Assembly Hall, originally a Gothic church from the 13th century, during the Austrian-Hungarian monarchy the headquarters of the Regional (Istrian) parliament.Passing the Italian elementary school (the building is connected to the Istrian assembly Hall) continue on the paved promenade by the sea (lungomare) by the coast of dr. Ante &Scaron;onje, pass the ruins of the Northern Tower from the 15th century up to and over to Teslina street then right on Pino Budicin street which again can take you to the Church of the Lady of Angels.Turn left on to Zagrebačka ulica to the square of Joakim Rakovac (an old nickname Cimare) in its north east end, along the green market, again left on to Mlinska Street which can take you to the beginning of the trail on the big parking lot.	Maura i lijevo uz Ribarski trg u Ulicu Franje Glavinića te ponovno lijevo do Decumanusa i odmah desno je Peterokutna kula.Iza kule skreće se desno u Ulicu Vladimira Nazora kojom se dolazi do Narodnog trga na kojem je Gradsko kazali&scaron;te s kraja 19. st., a malo dalje i slikovita Gradska vijećnica s početka pro&scaron;log stoljeća od koje se skreće prema moru na rivu i nastavlja desno Obalom mar&scaron;ala Tita uz koju je Okrugla kula iz 15. st.Porečku luku zatvara otok Sv. ~~~ Nikola do kojeg ljeti vozi brodić. ~~~ Rivom se stiže do hotela Palazzo (biv&scaron;i hotel Riviera, najstariji u Poreču), pa uza nj na "rivetu", Obala Matka Laginje, kojom se dolazi do Istarske sabornice, izvorno gotičke crkve iz 13. st., a u vrijeme Austrougarske monarhije sjedi&scaron;ta Pokrajinskog (istarskog) sabora.Uz Talijansku osnovnu &scaron;kolu (zgrada spojena sa Sabornicom) nastavlja se popločanim lungomarem, Obalom dr. Ante &Scaron;onje, uz ostatke Sjeverne kule iz 15. st., do i preko Tesline ulice pa desno u Ulicu Pina Budicina kojom se ponovno stiže do crkve Gospe od Anđela.Skrenite lijevo u Zagrebačku ulicu do Trga Joakima Rakovca (stari toponim Cimare) i na njegovom sjeveroistočnom kraju, uz tržnicu, opet lijevo u Mlinsku ulicu kojom se stiže na početak trase na velikom parkirali&scaron;tu.Duljina staze: 2.500 metaraVrijeme pje&scaron;ačenja: U mnogome ovisi od dužine razgledavanja pojedinih spomenika i dijelova grada, kao i od gužve koje budu ljeti (navečer i za oblačnijih dana), prvenstveno duž rive i Decumanusa.	-0.121487

	Rivom se stiže do hotela Palazzo (biv&scaron;i hotel Riviera, najstariji u Poreču), pa uza nj na "rivetu", Obala Matka Laginje, kojom se dolazi do Istarske sabornice, izvorno gotičke crkve iz 13. st., a u vrijeme Austrougarske monarhije sjedi&scaron;ta Pokrajinskog (istarskog) sabora.Uz Talijansku osnovnu &scaron;kolu (zgrada spojena sa Sabornicom) nastavlja se popločanim lungomarem, Obalom dr. Ante &Scaron;onje, uz ostatke Sjeverne kule iz 15. st., do i preko Tesline ulice pa desno u Ulicu Pina Budicina kojom se ponovno stiže do crkve Gospe od Anđela.Skrenite lijevo u Zagrebačku ulicu do Trga Joakima Rakovca (stari toponim Cimare) i na njegovom sjeveroistočnom kraju, uz tržnicu, opet lijevo u Mlinsku ulicu kojom se stiže na početak trase na velikom parkirali&scaron;tu.Duljina staze: 2.500 metaraVrijeme pje&scaron;ačenja:	-0.3
Starting from Červar Porat where it is possible to look around the remains of the big estate from Ancient Roman times (villa rustica, oil refinery, amphora workshop and brick yard) to the bus station left towards northeast through the street to the end of the residential area where the cycling trail sign Poreč north Vabriga-Abrega stands.	Polazak je iz Červar Porta, gdje se mogu pogledati ostaci velikog gospodarstva iz starorimskih vremena (villa rustica, uljara, tvornica amfora i ciglana), od autobusne stanice lijevo prema sjeveroistoku ulicom do kraja naselja gdje je oznaka biciklističke staze Poreč north Vabriga-Abrega.	0.625696
Then continuing on a trail through the woods downhill to Draga (the bay Uvala Lunga), then on to the other shore to numerous excavations of ancient estates and living quarters from 1st-4th century A.D. (villa rustica, brickyard, amphora workshop, vivarium) which can be seen in the sea as well.The trail leads over the peninsula Larun (Loron) to the Santa Marina bay.	Odatle se nastavlja kolskim putem kroz &scaron;umarak nizbrdicom do Drage u Uvala Lunga pa drugom obalom do iskopina brojnih antičkih gospodarskih i stambenih objekata iz 1.- 4. st. n. e. (villa rustica, ciglana, tvornica amfora, vivarij) vidljivih i u moru.Put vodi preko poluotoka Larun (Loron) do zaljeva Santa Marina.	0.624
On the left side it is possible to reach after about 200 m a picturesque fisherman&rsquo;s marina where traces of a few more ancient villa rustica were found, then return by a cemented road uphill towards Vabriga-Abrega.Before the village turn right on to a white trail which turns into a wide macadam road that takes you to the main road Tar-Torre-Poreč and continues alongside it to the intersection Červar Porat, continue right and at the next intersection right again to the starting point that is the bus station.	Lijevo se može svratiti do 200 m udaljene slikovite ribarske lučice u čijoj su okolici nađeni tragovi nekoliko antičkih villa rustica, te vratiti asfaltiranim putem uzbrdicom prema Vabrigi.Prije sela skreće se desno na bijeli put koji prelazi u &scaron;iroku makadam cestu. ~~~ Njome se stiže do glavne prometnice Tar-Torre-Poreč i nastavlja uz nju desno do raskižja za Červar Porat. ~~~ Nastavite desno te na sljedećem raskrižju ponovno desno do polazi&scaron;ta tj. ~~~ autobusne stanice.	0.0215179

Alternatives:1.	Alternative:	0.230769
From the fisherman&rsquo;s marina in Santa Marina it is possible to continue on the trail left leading around a restaurant uphill through pine woods then at the woods intersection continue left uphill to two wooden houses after which you turn right on to a narrow land path.After passing through the orchard and the woods you come upon a spacious olive grove and turn right.		-0.3
The path goes along the olive grove to the top of the hill from where you can see Tar-Torre and Vabriga-Abrega, from there a wider trail leads to the right (opposite the olive grove) through the field to the first house on to a gravel path left where it is possible to see lids of manholes at intervals leading to the cemented road Santa Marina-Vabriga-Abrega which you cross and continuing on to a white road as described above.2.		-0.3
For those who want to avoid asphalt and traffic on the road can turn right from the macadam road from Vabriga-Abrega after about 1.5 km on to a trail over the hill Larun (Loron) along the olive grove then through the field leads to the coast and connects to a cycling trail towards Červar-Porat.		-0.3
Here turn right and again alongside the ancient ruins around the bay returning to the bus station.		-0.3
The trail length: from 9.500 - 11.200 metersWalking time: from 3 hours to 4 hours and 30 minutes Notes:	Duljina trase: 9.500 -11.200 metaraVrijeme pje&scaron;ačenja: od 3 h do 4,30 hNapomene:	0.730769
Starting point is at the parking lot at the town little port in front of the Municipal court, through the marina up to the granite sculpture "The Door of the XX Century" by Slavomir Drinković, then on to a paved path along the sea towards the town beach.Then trail leads on to the paved walking-bike trail along the sea to the Brulo bay and Jedro beach, to continue to the sport center Mediteran.	Polazak je s parkirali&scaron;ta u gradskoj lučici ispred Općinskog suda kroz marinu do granitne skulpture 'Vrata XX stoljeća' Slavomira Drinkovića, potom popločanom, dijelom betoniranom stazom uz more prema Gradskom kupali&scaron;tu.Staza dalje vodi asfaltiranom pje&scaron;ačko-biciklističkom stazom uz more do uvale Brulo i kupali&scaron;ta Jedro, pa do Sport centra Mediteran.	0.46987
From there you turn right by the sea around the peninsula on a paved path which continues on to a land &ndash;stone trail up to the restaurant Istarska Hiža which is possible to reach also by a little paved short cut through the woods from the sport center Mediteran (a marked bike trail, 100 m shorter).Further on asphalt and concrete paved trail leads to the Plava Laguna bay, then behind the caf&eacute; Blue center and information office right on to a paved path around the peninsula on which Rt Tedule is situated - a resting spot with a beautiful panorama of Poreč.	Otuda hodajte desno uz more oko poluotoka betonskom stazicom koja u nastavku prelazi u zemljano-kameniti puteljak do restorana Istarska hiža do kojeg se od Sport centra Mediteran može stići i asfaltiranom prečicom kroz &scaron;umarak (označena biciklistička staza, 100 m kraće).	1.0499
Further on you go by the sport center of Plava Laguna up to the parking lot and the supermarket.	Put dalje vodi asfaltiranom i betoniranom stazicom uz more do uvale Plava laguna, pa iza lokala Blue center i informativnog ureda desno betonskom stazicom oko poluotoka na čijem je Rtu Tedule uređeno odmori&scaron;te s panoramskim pogledom na Poreč, dalje idete uz Sportski centar Plava Laguna do parkirali&scaron;ta i marketa.	-0.0246835
Poreč and surroundings	Poreč i okolica	0.91
Starting point is at the parking lot at the town little port in front of the Municipal court, through the marina up to the granite sculpture "The Door of the XX Century" by Slavomir Drinković, then on to a paved path along the sea towards the town beach.Then trail leads on to the paved walking-bike trail along the sea to the Brulo bay and Jedro beach, to continue to the sport center Mediteran.	Polazak je s parkirali&scaron;ta u gradskoj lučici ispred Općinskog suda kroz marinu do granitne skulpture 'Vrata XX stoljeća' Slavomira Drinkovića, potom popločanom, dijelom betoniranom stazom uz more prema Gradskom kupali&scaron;tu.Staza dalje vodi asfaltiranom pje&scaron;ačko-biciklističkom stazom uz more do uvale Brulo i kupali&scaron;ta Jedro, pa do Sport centra Mediteran.	0.46987
From there you turn right by the sea around the peninsula on a paved path which continues on to a land &ndash;stone trail up to the restaurant Istarska Hiža which is possible to reach also by a little paved short cut through the woods from the sport center Mediteran (a marked bike trail, 100 m shorter).Further on asphalt and concrete paved trail leads to the Plava Laguna bay, then behind the caf&eacute; Blue center and information office right on to a paved path around the peninsula on which Rt Tedule is situated - a resting spot with a beautiful panorama	Otuda hodajte desno uz more oko poluotoka betonskom stazicom koja u nastavku prelazi u zemljano-kameniti puteljak do restorana Istarska hiža do kojeg se od Sport centra Mediteran može stići i asfaltiranom prečicom kroz &scaron;umarak (označena biciklistička staza, 100 m kraće). ~~~ Put dalje vodi asfaltiranom i betoniranom stazicom uz more do uvale Plava laguna, pa iza lokala Blue center i informativnog ureda desno betonskom stazicom oko poluotoka na čijem je Rtu Tedule uređeno odmori&scaron;te s panoramskim pogledom	0.380414
The trail length: in one direction 3.800 metersWalking time: from 1 hour to 1 hour and 30 minutes The return: Walking back on the promenade by the sea (lungomare) towards Poreč.	Duljina staze: u jednom smjeru 3.800 metara Vrijeme pje&scaron;ačenja: od 1 h do 1,30 hPovratak: Pje&scaron;ke lungomarem prema Poreču.	0.5275
During summer season (May-September) there is a tourist train that drives from the supermarket to the start of the described trail. Starting point is in front of the supermarket by the parking lot in Plava Laguna left towards the sports center and continue on in the direction of Zelena Laguna on a marked paved walking-bike path around the bay of Mulandrija passing a little bridge over the stream St. Anđeo to the entertainment center Club International then right along the sea to the ski lift and further on along the shore bellow the Hotel Laguna Molindrio towards Hotel Parentium.It continues to the right by the Marina Parentium around the peninsulato the Villa Romana restaurant.There is an interesting composition of three obelisks decorated with mosaics, the work of the famous Croatian painter Edo Murtić, and about 50 meters away, along the cape called Rt. During the summer season (May-September) a tourist train drives from Hotel Pinia to the starting point in Poreč.Notes:	U ljetnoj sezoni (svibanj-rujan) od hotela Pinia vozi turistički vlakić do polazi&scaron;ta u Poreču.Napomene:	0.494059
The <span id="result_box" class="short_text" lang="en"><span class="hps">attractive</span></span> sports and recreational trail that offers magical and breathtaking views of Istria has a reconstructed section of the one-time railway line that connected Poreč and Trieste.	Atraktivnu sportsko-rekreativnu stazu, duž koje se otvaraju čarobni pejzaži Istre, čini obnovljena dionica povijesne željezničke pruge koja je povezivala Poreč s Trstom.	0.26505
The Istrian section of Parenzana is winding through wonderful valleys, over green hills, through vineyards and along olive groves all the way to medieval towns.	Istarska dionica Parenzane vijuga kroz prekrasne udoline, preko zelenih brežuljaka, kroz vinograde i uz maslinike tik do srednjovjekovnih gradića.	0.28626
The entire trail is marked with characteristic yellow signposts providing information on historical viaducts, tunnels and railway stations that you will discover on this challenging journey.For those who would like to see and experience some magic of the locations where a railway composition once chugged, we have picked some locations that are accessible by car. ~~~ Those places are located near the most interesting parts of the railway covered by shadow tunnels and impressive viaducts.	Putem vas vode prepoznatljive žute table nudeći vam informacije o povijesnim vijaduktima, tunelima i željezničkim stanicama koje ćete otkrivati na ovom izazovnom putu.Za sve one koji žele vidjeti i doživjeti čari prostora kojima je nekada huktala željeznička kompozicija, izdvojili smo nekoliko, za auto, lako dostupnih mjesta u čijoj blizini se nalaze najinteresantniji dijelovi pruge, sjenoviti tuneli i impresivni vijadukti.	-0.0141732
It is easy to find them using the field map and route description:	Koristeći kartu terena i opis trase bit će ih jednostavno pronaći.	0.272727
Hiking trail Parenzana	Pješačka staza Parenzana	0.992857
	povijesne željezničke pruge koja je povezivala Poreč s Trstom.	-0.3

Vital or Veli Most	Vital ili Veli Most	2.08125
The trail starts in Brtonigla-Verteneglio, and after a 20-minute walk you will reach a hill called Žmergo, surrounded by fields.	Staza kreće iz Brtonigle, odakle nakon 20-ak minuta hoda stižete do brežuljka i okolnih polja koje mje&scaron;tani zovu Žmergo.	0.291892
The hilltop has a view over vineyards and olive groves all the way to the sea.	Pogled se odavde pruža preko vinograda i maslinika sve do mora.	0.250909
In 1936, a small structure was built on the hill.	Na Žmergu je i kućica sagrađena 1936. godine.	0.292683
Village people call it the &ldquo;old water system&rdquo;, and it is still used as water supply.	Žitelji je nazivaju stari vodovod i jo&scaron; se uvijek koristi za potrebe vodoopskrbe.	0.284615
From here, the trail will take you to the &Scaron;karline Nature Park, a hidden gem of the region, with small lakes and a stream that has carved a true canyon on its course to the Mirna River.	Staza dalje vodi prema prirodnom parku &Scaron;karline, neotkrivenom biseru ovog kraja, s jezercima i potočićem &scaron;to je na svom putu prema rijeci Mirni izdubio pravi kanjon.	0.3
After leaving the park, the trail becomes a dirt road taking you back to Brtonigla-Verteneglio.Walking the trail takes up to two hours, depending on your pace.	Iz &Scaron;karlina, pje&scaron;ačka ruta Svetog Zenona vodi bijelom cestom natrag u Brtoniglu. ~~~ Ovisno o tempu, pje&scaron;ačenje traje oko dva sata.	-0.0011194
This undemanding trail keeps to macadam tracks and field routes through vineyards; only a short section of the trail is paved.	Ruta je pristupačna, jednim dijelom prolazi makadamskim i poljskim putevima među vinogradima i tek je njen manji dio asfaltiran.	0.283178
The trail has easy-to-follow signs that are maintained by the Eco Association 'Nature&rsquo;s Friends'.	Na terenu je izvrsno označena, o čemu brine lokalna eko-udruga 'Prijatelji prirode', redovito održavajući signalizaciju.	0.234066

Vela draga has been protected by law since 1963 as a natural reserve, and since 1998 as a geomorphological nature monument.	Vela draga je zakonom za&scaron;tićena od 1963. godine kao 'rezervat prirodnog predjela', a od 1998. godine kao geomorfolo&scaron;ki spomenik prirode.	0.50206
The Vela draga educational trail passes along the edge of this impressive canyon and by the help of its interpretation tables, presents this monument of extraordinary geomorphological value.	Staza prolazi rubom impresivnog istoimenog kanjona i uz pomoć postavljenih interpretacijskih ploča predstavlja ovaj spomenik geomorfolo&scaron;ke vrijednosti.	0.26069
The geological phenomenon of the origins of the Učka massifand the Vela draga canyon are explained by the tables.	Ploče obja&scaron;njavaju geolo&scaron;ki fenomen postanka masiva Učka i kanjona Vela draga.	0.757647
Above the canyon, you can take a break at a well-preserved vantage point and watch the limestone towers rising up from the canyon itself.	Iznad kanjona, na uređenom vidikovcu može se predahnuti i promatrati tornjeve koji se izdižu iz kanjona.	0.229032
These trails teach about alpinism and free climbing, sports that have been pursued in Vela draga since 1931, when the legendary alpinist Emilio Comici first climbed the Large Tower in the canyon.Trail type: educationalTrail difficulty: easyTrail length: 600 mTime necessary: 30 - 45 minThe most convenient seasonal period: all seasons Approach to the trail itself: from the parking lot below the Učka Tunnel, the road towards the direction of place Vranja	Staza poučava o alpinizmu i o slobodnom penjanju, sportovima koji su u Veloj dragi prisutni jo&scaron; od davne 1931. godine kada je legendarni alpinist Emilio Comici u velikom tornju ispenjao prvi alpinistički smjer.Vrsta staze: poučna Težina staze: lagana Dužina staze: 600 m Potrebno vrijeme: 30 - 45 min Najpovoljnije razdoblje: sva godi&scaron;nja doba Prilaz stazi: parkirali&scaron;te ispod tunela Učka, cesta prema mjestu Vranja	1.13903

It features arranged places to rest and viewpoints offering magnificent views of the Istrian hills and the Ćićarija mountain range.Interpretation boards along the trail introduce visitors to the natural characteristics of this peak area of Učka, the richness and biological diversity of its flora and fauna, and the origins and various forms of the karst relief and shape. Korita, a fresh water spring, is a 45-minute hike away from the village of Brgudac. ~~~ The trail to Korita leads through a dense forest of hornbeam and oak with the occasional spruce tree.	Izvori&scaron;te Korita nalazi se na 45 minuta hoda od sela Brgudac.Do njega se dolazi stazom koja vodi kroz gustu &scaron;umu graba i hrasta, s ponekom smrekom te brojnim vrstama za&scaron;tićenih biljaka i životinja.	-0.0317308
This is the habitat of numerous species of protected plants and animals.It&rsquo;s situated on a meadow beneath a cliff called Brajkove Stijene, this fresh water spring pours into ten massive wooden riverbeds which lower part is rich with plant and animal life.	Smje&scaron;ten na livadi pod liticom Brajkove stijene, ovaj izvor pitke vode prelijeva se u deset masivnih drvenih korita u čijem je podnožju poveća lokva bogata biljnim i životinjskim životom.	0.314535
This construction has had an important function to provide the water supplies for people and animals, which is why this place has had a great importance for the life of the local population.By water spring is situated the place to rest which offers a breathtaking view of the mountain range Učka.	Ova je konstrukcija imala važnu funkciju u zahvatu vode za ljudsku upotrebu i napajanje blaga, zbog čega je ovo mjesto imalo iznimnu važnost za život lokalnog stanovni&scaron;tva.Uz izvor je uređeno odmori&scaron;te s kojega se pruža prekrasan pogled na planinski masiv Učke.	0.293827
The instruction boards have been set to inform about the cultural and natural significance of this place.	Postavljene su i poučne table koje govore o kulturnom i prirodnom značaju ovog mjesta.	0.244737

The trail starts near the old school at village Semić and leads us along the white unpaved path, for 10 minutes of straight road, and then climbs for about 15 minutes until it reaches the vantage point Pod &Scaron;ćikovico.	Staza započinje kod stare &scaron;kole u mjestu Semić i vodi nas bijelim, neasfaltiranim putem desetak minuta ravnim dijelom, a zatim usponom od oko 15 minuta do vidikovca Pod &Scaron;ćikovico.	0.666272
It is a nice place to relax with a view to Lupoglav and surrounding areas.	Tu je uređeno mjesto za odmor s kojeg se pruža pogled na Lupoglav i &scaron;iru okolicu.	0.41373
The trail continues along the white unpaved road and after 20 minutes turns right into a smaller trail which leads towards the wood in the direction of the edge of the hill above Lupoglav and continues along its edge.	Staza se nastavlja bijelim, neasfaltiranim putem i nakon 20 minuta skreće udesno na puteljak kroz &scaron;umicu prema rubu brda iznad Lupoglava te nastavlja njegovim rubom.	1.50923
The trail breaks out again into the white unpaved path that climbs down reaching the Nad Grad meadows and climbs up to the trail leading to Planik.	Puteljak izbija ponovno na bijeli, neasfaltirani put koji se spu&scaron;ta do livada zvanih Nad Grad i uspinje se do puta koji vodi prema Planiku.	0.535082
Continue on this path for another ten minutes until you arrive at the crossroads and then turn left to a straight path, climbing down to the village Brest.	Ovim putem nastavljamo jo&scaron; desetak minuta do raskr&scaron;ća i skrećemo lijevo ravnim dijelom, a zatim se spu&scaron;tamo u mjesto Brest.	0.440513
There is apavedpaththrough the village until you reach the old school and then for about 200 m along the unpaved path, until you reach the Nad Krog lookout spot.	Kroz mjesto se prolazi asfaltiranom cestom do stare &scaron;kole te potom dvjestotinjak metara bijelim, neasfaltiranim putem, sve do vidikovca Nad Krog.	0.434108
From the lookout spot you can see Vranja, Boljun and its wide surroundings and it has also been arranged as a resting place.	Vidikovac s kojeg se pruža pogled na Vranju, Boljun i &scaron;iru okolicu, također je uređen kao odmori&scaron;te.	0.463725
The total length of the trail is about 7 km and by walking it slowly it&rsquo;s possible to pass it with occasional rests, for about 1 hour and 50 minutes.	Ukupna dužina staze je oko 7 km, a prelazi se laganim hodom i uz usputne odmore za 1 sat i 50 minuta.	1.83102

The Pazin Cave is the most picturesque example of natural forces at work on the karst Istrian terrain.	Pazinska jama je najslikovitiji primjer djelovanja prirodnih sila na kr&scaron;ki teren Istre.	0.292857
Under the walls of a thousand year old Pazin Castle, right on the border of the &laquo;grey&raquo; and &laquo;red&raquo; Istria, the biggest Istrian stream Pazinčica has found its flow through the underground all the way to the valley of the river Ra&scaron;a. ~~~ Perhaps it continues its flow even to reach the Lim gulf, as once wrote the famous novelist Jules Verne in his novel &laquo;Mathias Sandorf&raquo;.	Ispod zidina tisućljetnog Pazinskog ka&scaron;tela, točno na granici sive i crvene Istre, najveća istarska ponornica Pazinčica na&scaron;la je svoj put kroz podzemlje do doline rijeke Ra&scaron;e, a možda i do Limskog zaljeva kako u svom romanu 'Matija&scaron; Sandorf' opisuje legendarni Jules Verne.	0.00434073
Such remarkable scenery has inspired many other writers (Nazor, Dante, Yriarte&hellip;), so You definitely won't be let uninspired.	Ta nesvakida&scaron;nja igra prirode nadahnula je i mnoge druge pisce (Nazor, Dante, Yriarte...), pa će zasigurno inspirirati i Vas.	0.613181
Pazin and surroundings	Pazin i okolica	0.9
The Pazin Cave	Pazinska jama	0.3
Opening hours:	Radno vrijeme:	0.3
Prices:	Ulaznice:	0.225
Note:	Upozorenje:	0
Info:	Info:	1.8
Trail length: 10 km Trail duration: 3 hoursThe hiking trail starts with slope which is situated at the 100 meters distance from the old church.	Dužina staze: 10 km Potrebno vrijeme: 3 sata Pje&scaron;ačenje započinje nizbrdicom uz stotinjak metara udaljenu ru&scaron;evnu crkvicu.	0.79
It is the church of St. Simeon, which date back from the 14th or 15th century, restored 2005 and before that, at the 1902 as it is stated on the lintel of the entrance door.After twenty minutes of climbing down you arrive to the Žlepčari, a small village of the former millers.	Riječ je o crkvici sv. ~~~ &Scaron;imuna iz 14. ili 15. stoljeća, obnovljene 2005., a prije toga i 1902. kako pi&scaron;e na nadvratniku ulaznih vrata. ~~~ Nakon dvadesetak minuta spu&scaron;tanja stižete u Žlepčare, malo selo nekada&scaron;njih mlinara.	-0.11393
Three of local mills are now in ruins.The trail continues along the streambed which was named Zabod in the Austrian documents at the beginning of 19th century.	Tri ovda&scaron;nja mlina danas su u ru&scaron;evinama.Staza dalje nastavlja uz korito potoka koji se početkom 19. stoljeća u austrijskim dokumentima naziva Zabod.	0.275373
This name probably originated from the name Sopot, the name of the waterfall to which you will arrive after a fifteen minute walk from Žlepčari.	Ovaj je naziv zacijelo nastao iz imena Sopot, imena slapa do kojeg ćete stići nakon petnaestak minuta hoda od Žlepčara.	0.391429
By the old bridge, the stream falls to previously mentioned Sopot, one of the most beautiful Istrian waterfalls.After a short rest by the waterfall Sopot, further you are expected to climb up the &Scaron;krbanski hill.	Kod starog mosta potok se sunovraćuje u spomenuti Sopot, jedan od najljep&scaron;ih istarskih slapova. ~~~ Nakon kraćeg odmora uz Sopot u nastavku vas očekuje uspon prema &Scaron;krbanskom brigu.	-0.0122807
Uphill, by walking slowly, for a little less than half an hour you will arrive to village Lovrić, and from there continue to the Church of Saint Stephen at the local cemetery, where nearby is situated 15 meters high tower.By returning to Grači&scaron;će, you will need 40 more minutes to walk slowly along the ridge of the hill under which the deep cuts are falling down.	Uzbrdicom, laganim hodom, za ne&scaron;to manje od pola sata stići ćete u Lovriće, a odande do crkve sv. ~~~ Stjepana na mjesnom groblju, kraj koje je 15 metara visok zvonik.Do povratka u Grači&scaron;će treba vam jo&scaron; četrdesetak minuta laganog hoda hrptom brda pod kojim se sunovraćuju duboki laporni usjeci.	-0.0190909
These cuts which are million of years old are composed of sand with layers of marl and limestone sediments.	Te su naslage, milijunske starosti, sastavljene od pjeskovitih lapora sa slojevima vapnenačkih sedimenata.	0.28
Along the way you&rsquo;ll often stop ​​to enjoy in this unusual landscape.The Hill that is in front of you rises to the west, with its 469 meters altitude, which is the highest in the region and except for its height and it is worth to point it out because of its name.	Putem ćete često zastajkivati kako biste uživali u ovom neobičnom krajoliku.Brdo koje se pred vama uzdiže na zapadu, sa svojih 469 metara nadmorske visine najvi&scaron;e je u tom kraju, a osim zbog svoje visine vrijedi ga istaći i zbog imena.	1.08488
It is called Perunčevac or Perunkovac.	To je Perunčevac ili Perunkovac.	1.25
This hill is named after the Old Slavic god of the sun, lightning, justice, harvest and war Perun.The trail will take you along the gravel road that stretches through east slope of Peruncevac, and will lead to a chapel dedicated to Saint Familiy, in front of Grači&scaron;će itself.	Ovo brdo naziv duguje staroslavenskom bogu sunca, groma, pravde, žetve i rata Perunu.	-0.352

Beram and Pazin are connected by a circular hiking trail marked with red and white mountaineer markings.In Pazin the trail starts next to the Tourist office, goes alongside Ka&scaron;tel, over the Pazin cave bridge, and after the factory it turns right and goes uphill along the road to Gortan hill.	Beram i Pazin povezani su kružnom pje&scaron;ačkom stazom označenom crveno - bijelim planinarskim markacijama. ~~~ U Pazinu staza započinje kod Turističkog ureda, uz Ka&scaron;tel, preko mosta Pazinske jame, te nakon tvornice skreće desno uzbrdo cestom do Gortanovog brijega.	0.0581967
After the Gortan hill one branch of the trail turns left towards Beram, and the other continues the circle along the hill spine towards the Du&scaron;ani village and returns to Pazin.	Nakon Gortanovog brijega jedan odvojak staze vodi lijevo za Beram, a drugi nastavlja kružno po hrptu brijega do sela Du&scaron;ani i vraća se u Pazin.	0.588014

The walking trail'the Path of dry wall' starts at Kringa, near the football field and it first leads you along forestry shade and gentle downhill of the southern Draga slope and thenslightly rise towards Faturi village and goes back to Kringa.	Pje&scaron;ačka staza suhozida započinje u Kringi, kod nogometnog igrali&scaron;ta i najprije vodi &scaron;umskom hladovinom i blagom nizbrdicom po južnom obronku Drage, a zatim se lagano uspinje prema selu Faturi i vraća natrag u Kringu.	0.376891
The trail is marked and its length is about 5 kilometers.	Staza je označena i ukupno je duga pet kilometara.	0.272727

'European dry wall'	Europskog suhozida	0.3
Length of the circular trail: 16 km Start: Pazin, Spomen dom (parking lot)Attractions on the trail:Panorama of Pazin valley, Učka mountain and Ćićarija, panorama of Grdoselo &amp; Butoniga lake, Grdoselo, Zelengrad - abandoned medieval town, canyon of Butoniga stream, picturesque waterfallsFinish: Pazin, (parking lot) or Du&scaron;aniZelengrad was first mentioned in 1102.	Kružna staza dužine 16 km.Polazak: Pazin, Spomen dom (parkirali&scaron;te)Atrakcije na stazi:Panorama pazinske kotline, Učke i Ćićarije, panorama Grdosela i jezera Butonega, Grdoselo, Zelengrad - napu&scaron;teni srednjovjekovni grad, kanjon potoka Butonege, predivni vodopadiZavr&scaron;etak: Pazin, Spomen dom (parkirali&scaron;te) ili Du&scaron;aniZelengrad se prvi put spominje 1102.	1.71078
Today this completely ruined town, was once a castle of trapezoidal ground plan, placed on a hill under which the Grdoselo stream flows into the Butoniga stream.	Taj je, danas već potpuno sru&scaron;eni grad, bio zapravo utvrda trapezoidnog tlocrta smje&scaron;tena na brežuljku ispod kojeg Grdoselski potok utiče u potok Butonigu.	0.266912
It was also for the first time mentioned in 1102. in "Istarski razvod", a well-known Glagolitic legal document from the beginning of the 14th century.	Prvi se put spominje 1102 u "Istarskom razvodu", poznatom glagoljskom pravnom dokumentu s početka 14. stoljeća. ~~~ Pazin i okolica	-0.0171053

Pazin, Spomen dom (parking lot)Attractions on the trail:Panorama of Pazin valley, Učka mountain and Ćićarija, panorama of Grdoselo &amp; Butoniga lake, Grdoselo, Zelengrad - abandoned medieval town, canyon of Butoniga stream, picturesque waterfallsFinish: Pazin, (parking lot) or Du&scaron;aniZelengrad	Pazin, Spomen dom (parkirali&scaron;te)Atrakcije na stazi:Panorama pazinske kotline, Učke i Ćićarije, panorama Grdosela i jezera Butonega, Grdoselo, Zelengrad - napu&scaron;teni srednjovjekovni grad, kanjon potoka Butonege, predivni vodopadiZavr&scaron;etak: Pazin, Spomen dom (parkirali&scaron;te) ili Du&scaron;aniZelengrad	1.06289
Walking trail Labin-Rabac is part of the protected landscape Labin-Rabac-Prklog and is a real gem worth seeing.	Pje&scaron;ačka staza Labin-Rabac dio je za&scaron;tićenog krajobraza Labin-Rabac-Prklog i pravi je biser vrijedan divljenja.	0.640625
The trail is relatively short, yet exceptionally beautiful, immersed in the lush sub-Mediterranean vegetation characteristic of the colder and damper Mediterranean climate such as the one along the entire eastern coast of Istria.	Staza je razmjerno kratka, ali iznimno lijepa, uronjena u gustu submediteransku vegetaciju, karakterističnu za hladniji i vlažniji tip sredozemne klime koju nalazimo na gotovo cijeloj istočnoj obali istarskog poluotoka.	0.295385
Labin and surroundings	Labin i okolica	0.9
trail is relatively short	Staza je razmjerno kratka	0.3
old town of Labin	starog grad Labina	0.26
constant criss-crossing with a wonderful (unnamed) stream	ispreplitanje s privlačnim (bezimenim) potokom	0.245455
two rest areas	dva odmori&scaron;ta	0.138462
The picturesque village of Kranjci, situated three kilometers from Labin, reveals the legend of hidden treasure on a new tourist trail leading to St. Flor&rsquo;s church.Walking over groves and paths of rustling autumn leaves that end up on a hill at the church, you will be revealed the legend of the wealthy Greeks who had it built in the sixth century.	Slikovito selo Kranjci, 3 km udaljeno od Labina, otkriva legendu o zakopanom blagu na novoj turističkoj stazi do crkve Sv.	-0.102857
Due to seven-year drought they had to withdraw from this area, but a part of gold load was too heavy for their horses, so they buried it near the little church with a secret vow which was never revealed.The church is on the list of protected cultural monuments of Croatia, and is dedicated to the same bishop whose feast is celebrated on October 27th.	Flora.Po gajevima i puteljcima od &scaron;u&scaron;kavog jesenskog li&scaron;ća koji zavr&scaron;avaju na brežuljku kod crkvice, otkrit će vam se legenda o bogatim Grcima koji su je podigli u 6. st. Zbog sedmogodi&scaron;nje su&scaron;e morali su se povući iz ovih krajeva, no dio zlata bio im je pretežak za konje pa su ga zakopali oko crkvice uz tajni zavjet koji nikada nije otkriven.Crkva je na listi za&scaron;tićenih kulturnih dobara Republike Hrvatske, a posvećena je istoimenom biskupu čiji se blagdan slavi 27. listopada.	0.122491
It takes 20 minutes to walk from Kranjci to the church, and you can also take a bike ride.	Od Kranjci do crkvice ima 20 minuta lagane &scaron;etnje, a staza se možete obići i biciklom.	2.38477

Kranjci, situated three kilometers from Labin, reveals the legend of hidden treasure on a new tourist trail leading to St. Flor&rsquo;s church.Walking over groves and paths of rustling autumn leaves that end up on a hill at the church, you will be revealed the legend of the wealthy Greeks who had it built in the sixth century. The hiking trails of Pula-Pola are not demanding.	Pulske pje&scaron;ačke staze nisu zahtjevne.	0.292857
However, they are very suitable for rehabilitation of coronary heart disease convalescents orfor rehabilitation of other illnesses because in their greater part they pass by the sea or through forest area.The trails also pass through tourist areas such as Stoja, Lungomare, Pje&scaron;čana Uvala, and forest areas such as Valdebek, Valmade and the park- forest &Scaron;ijana.	No, veoma su pogodne za rehabilitaciju srčanih bolesnika ili od ostalih bolesti jer prolaze većim dijelom pored mora ili &scaron;umovitim predjelima. ~~~ Od turističkih predjela staze prolaze Stojom, Lungomareom, Pje&scaron;čanom Uvalom, a od &scaron;umskih predjela Valdebekom, Valmadama i park-&scaron;umom &Scaron;ijanom.	-0.0176471
The fresh air and a slow walk are the guarantee for a quick rehabilitation.Eight trails are marked by special 'animal' tags, after which they were named.	Čisti zrak i lagana &scaron;etnja najbolje su jamstvo brze rehabilitacije. ~~~ Osam staza markirano je posebnim oznakama životinja prema kojima i nose naziv.	-0.00930233
They are 40 km long and can be passed within nine hours of walk.	Protežu se u dužini od 40 kilometara, a mogu se preći u devet sati hoda.	2.44231

From Funtana-Fontane to Vrsar, following the main road, there are 3 kilometres of paved walking trail.Once you get to Vrsar, a walk to the top of the ancient part of the town is suggested, since none would miss the breathtaking view from up there.	Od Funtane do Vrsara, uz glavnu prometnicu, izgrađena je u dužini od 3 km asfaltirana pje&scaron;ačka staza.U Vrsaru preporučamo da pro&scaron;ećete do samog vrha, odakle se pruža prekrasan pogled.	1.35057
From the bell tower the view gets broader, and there is also an opportunity to see the bells used through centuries.Istria offers the possibility to discover marvelous and unexplored surroundings. Twenty slides and an aquatic area of 4,100 m2 spread out across an area totalling 81,000 m2 &ndash; these figures translate into tons of fun that await you at Istralandia Aquapark, a waterpark located between Brtonigla and Novigrad. Pazin Cave is a natural phenomenon caused by a river Pazinčica.	Pazinska jama je prirodni fenomen nastao tokom rijeke Pazinčice.	0.283636
Hole of Pazin Cave is situated below the 100 meter high cliffs while the underground part is approx. ~~~ 270 meters long and ends with a lake.If you are in Istria, and you are a fan of adrenaline, zip-line Pazin Cave is the right place for you.Zip-line Pazin Cave consists of four lines.	Otvor Pazinske jame nalazi se ispod 100 metara visoke litice dok je podzemni dio dug otprilike 270 metara i zavr&scaron;ava jezerom.Ukoliko se nalazite u Istri, a ljubitelj ste adrenalina, zip-line Pazinska jama pravo je mjesto za vas.	0.0526974
Visitors start their adventure from the gorge below the Hotel Lovac.	Zip-line Pazinska jama sastoji se od četiri linije.	0.215217
The first two lines are 80 meters long.	Posjetitelji započinju svoju avanturu sa klisure podno Hotela Lovac.	0.0363636
The third is 220 meters long and reaches a speed of 40 km/h, leading to the courtyard of House of writers (near the castle).	Prve dvije linije dugačke su 80 m. Treća linija je dužine 220 metara i dostiže brzinu od 40 km/h, a vodi do dvori&scaron;ta Kuće za pisce (blizu Ka&scaron;tela).	0.548235
The fourth line is a longest one - 280 meters, and also fastest which maximum speed is 50 km/h.	Četvrta linija je najduža, iznosi 280 metara, ali i najbrža na kojoj dostižemo brzinu od 50 km/h.	2.4359
It is also the favorite one as it allows you to enjoy the view of the cave and the famous castle which is situated above it.	U pravilu je ona i najdraža jer omogućuje uživanje u pogledu na jamu i poznati Ka&scaron;tel iznad nje.	0.266667
This line ends above the Babina kuća cave, on the lookout, which is named after the famous French writer Jules Verne, which in his Mathias Sandorf novel (1885.)	Ova linija zavr&scaron;ava iznad pećine Babina kuća, na vidikovcu koji je dobio ime po znamenitom francuskom piscu Jules Verneu koji je u svom romanu Mathias Sandorf (1885.)	0.802381
wrote about Pazin Cave and the Ka&scaron;tel.	pisao o Pazinskoj jami i Ka&scaron;telu.	0.266667

Istra Inspirit brings interactive acting performances of historical - mythological stories and legends at authentic locations (from Roman villas, castles, medieval squares to the archaeological sites). 	Svaka priča odi&scaron;e posebnom atmosferom, a bogata gourmet ponuda daje intenzivan doživljaj posjetiteljima.	-0.3
Each story brings special atmosphere while rich gastronomic offer gives an intense experience to all visitors.	Cjelokupni spektakli potiču emocije u gostima koje će im ostati u trajnom sjećanju na vrijeme provedeno u Istri.	0.290625
The entire spectacle is bringing out emotions in visitors that will stay in their lasting memory for the time spent in Istria.The stories of the rich Istrian history revived by the professor of history, Epulonius de Histri will be presented on the St. Nicholas island.	Na otoku Sv. ~~~ Nikola predstavljaju se priče o bogatoj istarskoj povijesti koje će oživjeti simpatičan profesor povijesti Epulonius de Histri.	-0.0576149
Sea world of Jules Verne, a love story of Count Polesini and his wife Isabelle intertwine on that secret island and what is special about this event is that parents and children actively participate in the spectacle.<a href="../en/attractions-and-activities/events/15805-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Spacio in Rovinj</a> brings the most authentic fishermen experience where visitors enjoy in the Batana boat ride and the evening ends in a typical fishermen's dinner, numerous stories about the sea, comic situations and fishermen traditional stories.Visitors who would like to find out more about the traditional pirate stories and songs, including legends about the hidden treasure will surely enjoy the musical <a href="../en/attractions-and-activities/events/15806-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Captain Morgan's treasure</a>.	Na tom će se tajanstvenom otoku ispreplitati morski svijet Jules Vernea, ljubavna priča grofa Polesinija i njegove supruge Isabelle, a posebnost je u tome &scaron;to roditelji i djeca postaju aktivnim sudionicima samoga spektakla. ~~~ <a href="../hr/atrakcije-i-aktivnosti/kalendar-dogadanja/15805-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1" target="_blank">Spacio u Rovinju</a> donosi najautentičniji ribarski doživljaji u kojem posjetitelji uživaju u vožnji batanama, a večer zavr&scaron;avaju u tipičnoj ribarskoj večeri, prepunoj priča o moru, komičnih odnosa i ribarskih anegdota.Posjetitelji željni gusarskih anegdota i pjesama te legendi o skrivenom blagu sigurno će uživati u mjuziklu <a href="../hr/atrakcije-i-aktivnosti/kalendar-dogadanja/15806-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Blago kapetana Morgana</a>.	0.0286343
The event takes place at the medieval walls of Dvigrad and guests witness in search of hidden treasure and personal confession of notorious pirate - Henry Morgan!Visitors have the opportunity to witness one of the most dramatic story of the Roman time - the story of <a href="../en/attractions-and-activities/events/15807-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Crispo</a> and his tragic love with Fausta on the authentic archaeological site Vižula in Medulin.After the Roman Empire time period, Istria Inspirit travels to the mystical middle age that is full of superstitions, knights and witches.	Sama predstava se odvija na srednjovjekovnim zidinama Dvigrada, a gosti svjedoče skrivanju blaga i osobnom ispovijedanju zloglasnog gusara - Henrya Morgana!U Medulinu na autentičnom arheolo&scaron;kom nalazi&scaron;tu Vižula gosti imaju priliku svjedočiti jednoj od najdramatičnijih priča Rimskoga doba - priči o <a href="../hr/atrakcije-i-aktivnosti/kalendar-dogadanja/15807-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Crispu</a> i njegovoj tragičnoj ljubavi s Faustom.	0.478721
At the <a href="../en/attractions-and-activities/events/15808-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Mare the witch</a> - herbalist spectacle visitors find out who was Mare Radolovich and why was she burned at the stake and whether Mare was really a witch or was she a victim?At the spectacle <a href="../en/attractions-and-activities/events/15809-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Iustitia</a> in Poreč, visitors can find out who the Domenico Furlan was, what did he steel and how the justice was satisfied on the streets of Poreč.<a href="../en/attractions-and-activities/events/15810-ch-0?&amp;l_over=1">Vodnjanske &scaron;torije 2</a> will be held in Vodnjan. The Light Show of Pula's GiantsThe history of Istria is intertwined with stories of people possessing supernatural height and power - giants who lived in Istria once upon a time.	Igre svjetla pulskih divovaIstarska je povijest isprepletena pričama o ljudima nadnaravne visine i moći, a prema tim pričama upravo su oni obitavali u Istri.	0.273913
Today, after many centuries, giants have once again appeared in Istria, silent, dignified and warmly welcomed.	Danas, nakon mnogo stoljeća, u Istri se ponovno pojavljuju divovi, mirni i dostojanstveni, radosno dočekani.	0.296875
These new Istrian giants have taken on modern shapes, transforming the cranes of Uljanik Shipyard, a symbol of the town of Pula, into colour-lit colossuses.	Novi su istarski divovi poprimili moderna obličja, preobraziv&scaron;i dizalice brodogradili&scaron;ta Uljanik, jednog od simbola grada Pule, u svjetleće gigante.	0.268421
Eight huge cranes, located in the centre of the town, are ablaze in thousands of colours.	U tisućama boja zabljesnulo je tako osam velikih dizalica u sredi&scaron;tu grada.	0.291781
With the help of flood-lights these colours change and special effects are created that light up Pula's night sky.This magnificent light show, lasting 15 minutes, can be seen after dark on the hour!	Uz pomoć postavljenih reflektora mijenjaju se njihove boje i kreiraju specijalni efekti koji obasjavaju pulsko noćno nebo. ~~~ Obojani spektakl u trajanju od petnaestak minuta moguće je vidjeti kada padne mrak i to svakog punog sata! ~~~ Zabava	-0.120359
The Light Show of Pula's Giants	Igre svjetla pulskih divova	0.276
Info:	Info:	1.8
The Sports Airport Vrsar is located is the middle of green fields alongside the Adriatic coast, not far from Lim Channel, a protected natural phenomenon.	Sportska zračna luka u Vrsaru, smje&scaron;tena usred zelenih polja uz jadransku obalu, nedaleko za&scaron;tićenog prirodnog fenomena Limskog kanala, zanimljiva je postaja na putu svakog znatiželjnog putnika.	0.168462
Providing panoramic flights over Istria or flights to Venice, the airport is the perfect stop for any inquisitive traveller. ~~~ At the Aero park, you can visit an exhibition of old planes, open all year round.	Osim &scaron;to se iz Vrsara može krenuti na panoramski let Istrom ili letjeti u Veneciju, u Aeroparku možete pogledati originalnu izložbu starih aviona otvorenu tijekom cijele godine.	-0.012037
There is also a small picture gallery featuring the history of aviation in Istria, an exhibition of artifacts linked to flying, a corner for the kids, and a charming terrace that is partly set under the wing of an old-timer plane, providing a unique experience.	Tu je i mala galerija slika o povijesti zrakoplovstva u Istri, postav predmeta povezanih s avijacijom te kutak za djecu, ali i atraktivna terasa dijelom smje&scaron;tena ispod krila oldtimer-aviona koja pruža jedinstven doživljaj.	0.274627
Several of the larger airplanes are open to visitors, letting you take a look at the cockpits.	Nekoliko je većih aviona otvoreno za razgledavanje unutra&scaron;njosti pa zaviriti možete i u pilotsku kabinu.	0.220253

The remains of dinosaurs have been found in Istria, and thus became part of the story of our peninsula.	Tema parka su dinosaurusi u prirodnoj veličini.	0

Michael is located in the beautiful natural environment of 26.000 square meters, only 3km west of Svetvincenat.	Michael smje&scaron;ten je na predivnom posjedu od 26.000 četvornih metara, svega 3 km zapadno od Svetvinčenta.	0.643566

House of Istrian Olive OilPula-PolaThe olive tree is a symbol of the Mediterranean.	Kuća istarskog maslinovog uljaPula-PolaMaslina je simbol Mediterana, možemo reći da Mediteran prestaje tamo gdje nestaje maslina.	0.108333
We could also say that the Mediterranean is where olives grow. ~~~ In Istria the tree has given much since ancient times; food, medicine, fuel and material for the production of different objects.	U Istri je ljudi od davnina koriste na različite načine: kao hranu, lijek, gorivo, za izradu predmeta... For thousands of years it has been central to Istrian lives.The House of Istrian Olive Oil located in the center of Pula tells the story of olive growing in Istria through history to the present day. ~~~ Discover why Istrian olive oil was highly valued by the ancient Romans and how it was processed.	Saznat ćete za&scaron;to su jo&scaron; Rimljani izrazito cijenili istarsko maslinovo ulje te kako su ga prerađivali; kako se ono prerađuje danas i koje su tajne u stvaranju vrhunskog ekstra djevičanskog maslinovog ulja.Svakog posjetitelja očekuje i degustacija istarskog ulja uz edukaciju pravilnog ku&scaron;anja, a u prodajnom prostoru možete naći najveći izbor vrhunskih istarskih ekstra djevičanskih maslinovih ulja i druge istarske proizvode.	-0.0917004

Opening hours:	Radno vrijeme:I, II: zatvorenoIII - V: 10:00 - 18:00VI: 09:30 - 20:00VII - VIII: 09:30 - 22:00IX: 09:30 - 20:00X - XII: 10:00 - 18:00Kontakt:	-0.6
The windmill, built 140 years ago is a symbol of Medulin and the keeper of its port.	Vjetrenjača je simbol Medulina i čuvar njegovog porta, izgrađena jo&scaron; prije 140 godina.	2.58758
Today it wears a new &ldquo;dress&rdquo; and grinds grain as it used to in ancient times, but with a little help from the electric motor on those days when the wind is not able to do so.The story of this malin (mill) began back in 1872 with the arrival of the Po&scaron;ić brothers from Rovinj to Medulin, where they decided to build two windmills along the coast.	Danas nosi novo ruho i ponovno melje žito kao u neka davna vremena, ali uz malu pripomoć elektromotora u danima kada vjetar zakaže.Priča o ovom malinu (mlinu) započela je davne 1872. godine dolaskom braće Po&scaron;ić iz Rovinja u Medulin gdje su uz obalu mora odlučili sagraditi dvije vjetrenjače - mlinove.	0.324251
Medulin&rsquo;s mills were the only ones of their type in the Mediterranean, so people came from all over, both by sea and land.	Medulinski mlinovi bili su jedini takvog tipa na Sredozemlju pa su ljudi do njih pristizali sa svih strana, i morem i kopnom.	0.294286
And so the lines of those waiting patiently to grind the grain that they had nurturingly cultivated soon formed in Medulin.The windmill built of stone has a circular ground plan, and was originally, just as it is today, covered with a shallow tapered roof.	A u Medulinu su se tako ubrzo počeli stvarali i redovi onih koji su strpljivo čekali da samelju različite žitarice koje su brižljivo uzgajali.Vjetrenjača je kružnog tlocrta, sagrađena od kamena, a izvorno je bila, ba&scaron; kao i danas, natkrivena plitkim stožastim krovom.	0.259346
It had eight sails that could be enlarged and reduced depending on the wind&rsquo;s force.Today&rsquo;s Medulin mill is a faithful copy of the previous one - the windmill with its torač (a room for grinding), the wooden elements of the mill, a rotating roof and eight-pointed propellers.	Imala je osam jedara koja su se mogla povećavati i smanjivati ovisno o jačini vjetra. ~~~ Dana&scaron;nji je Medulinski malin vjerna kopija onog nekada&scaron;njeg - vjetrenjače s kamenim toračem, drvenim elementima mlina, okretnim krovom i osmerokrakom elisom.	-0.00917031
Inside, you will also find a variety of items for flour processing, as well as a number of antiques, which were left forgotten in the attics for years, and which are now shining the old shine in the rebuilt windmill.	U njegovoj unutra&scaron;njosti pronaći ćete i razne predmete potrebne za preradu bra&scaron;na, kao i starine, godinama ostavljene zaboravljene na tavanima, koje su sada ponovno zasjale starim sjajem u obnovljenoj vjetrenjači. ~~~ Zabava	-0.0202247
Working hours: VII - IX: 08:30 - 11:30, 19:30 - 22:30 Price: free entrance Malin in Medulin	Radno vrijeme: VII - IX: 08:30 - 11:30, 19:30 - 22:30 Cijena: ulaz besplatan Informacije: Malin in Medulin	2.24474

Price:	Zabava	0.3
	Cijena:	-0.3
Opening hours:	Radno vrijeme:	0.3
In an area that served as an intersection for communication and roads ever since, besides the Baredine cave as a natural monument, you can also visit an ethno story devoted to agriculture.It shows various items, machines and numerous photographs and documents closely linked to the history of this area and its people.The story starts with a threshing floor, next to which there is an exhibition on wheat threshing and the invention and development of threshing machines.The exhibition continues with a permanent exhibition of about fifty historic tractors and various types of engines called &bdquo;Tractor story&ldquo;.	Informacije: ~~~ U prostoru, gdje se od davnina nalaze susreti&scaron;ta komunikacija i putova, uz jamu Baredine kao prirodnu znamenitost, postavljena je etno priča posvećena poljoprivredi. ~~~ Prikaz predmeta i strojeva te brojnih sačuvanih fotografija i dokumenta usko je vezan uz povijest ovog kraja i njegovih ljudi. ~~~ Priča počinje s gumnom pored kojeg je prezentirana izložba o vr&scaron;enju žita te izumu i razvoju vr&scaron;ilica.Izložba se nastavlja stalnim postavom pedesetak oldtimer traktora i raznih tipova pogonskih motora.	-0.205693
Particularly prominent is an old Fordson tractor from 1923, the first tractor in our village, as well as an old engine with a heated head, which was used to run a mill in Poreč at the beginning of the last century.In the exclusive area of the Konobon Gallery you can learn more about the story of the Mediterranean trilogy &ndash; bread, wine and olive oil, all present in this are from the period of Antiquity, the medieval period until the present moment.	Posebno se ističu stari Fordson iz 1923. godine, prvi traktor koji je do&scaron;ao u obližnje selo te stari motor na grijanu glavu koji je početkom pro&scaron;log stoljeća služio za pokretanje nekada&scaron;njeg porečkog mlina. ~~~ U ekskluzivnom prostoru Galerije Konobon predstavljena je priča o mediteranskoj trilogiji - kruhu, maslinovom ulju i vinu, zastupljenima na ovim prostorima od antike, preko srednjeg vijeka pa do dana&scaron;njih dana.	0.0381653
Along with these exhibitions, the central part is an area, where various other exhibitions are presented and the wine cellar where guest can savor authentic products of this area.	Uz navedene postave, centralni dio je prostor u kojem se održavaju umjetničke izložbe te pripadna Vinoteka u kojoj je moguće ku&scaron;ati autohtone proizvode ovoga kraja.	0.3

Northwestern Istria is a destination that with its characteristics meets the interests and needs of all types of cyclists.	Sjeverozapadna Istra je destinacija koja svojim karakteristikama zadovoljava interese i potrebe svih profila biciklista.	0.291429
This part of Istria, with its 19 maintained and marked trails which include the towns of Umag, Novigrad, Buje and Brtonigla is suitable for all mountain and road specialists, as well as for cycle-tourists.	S 19 uređenih i označenih staza, ovaj dio Istre, koji obuhvaća gradove Umag, Novigrad, Buje i Brtoniglu, pogodan je za sve bicikliste, kako brdske i cestovne, tako i za cikloturiste.	1.62427
It will successfully host not only competitors in preparations for sport events, but also tourists and recreational cyclists.This part of Istria offers variety of mountain and road cycling routes including the brightest jewel which is the cycling route Parenzana, it's situated along the old narrow-gauge railway which used to connect 33 places in Istria (from Trieste to Porec).Vineyards and olive groves, forests and streams, medieval towns on the hills are all part of the cycling story in which you can enjoy in Northwestern Istria.There are numerous cycling events which are organized every year.	Uspje&scaron;no će ugostiti ne samo natjecatelje na treninzima i pripremama, već i ležerne turiste i rekreativce. ~~~ Ovaj dio Istre diči se spletom brdskih i cestovnih ruta, a njezin najsjajniji biser je biciklistička staza Parenzana, uređena trasom stare uskotračne pruge koja je povezivala 33 istarska mjesta od Trsta do Poreča.Vinogradi i maslinici, &scaron;ume i potoci, srednjovjekovni gradići na brežuljcima dio su biciklističke priče u kojoj ćete uživati u Sjeverozapadnoj Istri.Brojne su biciklističke manifestacije koje se organiziraju svake godine.	0.24616
Professional or recreational cycling competitions (more than 15 recreational events are organized per year) can be proud of great organization, top and unforgettable experiences.The licensed bike hotels can follow high standards of accommodation for cyclists.	Natjecanja profesionalaca ili rekreativne vožnje, a samo potonjih ima vi&scaron;e od 15 godi&scaron;nje, mogu se pohvaliti odličnom organizacijom, vrhunskim doživljajima i nezaboravnim iskustvima.Bike hoteli, objekti s posebnom licencom, u svim će segmentima zadovoljiti visoke standarde za prijam biciklista.	1.14897
Situated near bike trails, bike hotels offer sports nutrition, spa facilities, bicycle repair workshops, detailed information on routes and many other tailor-made services for cyclists.	Smje&scaron;teni u blizini biciklističkih staza, nude sportsku prehranu, wellness sadržaje, radionice za popravke, detaljne informacije o rutama i brojne druge usluge po mjeri biciklista.&raquo; <a href="../hr/planiranje-putovanja/brosure/istra-outdoor" target="_blank">Vi&scaron;e informacija možete pronaći u bro&scaron;urama</a>&raquo; <a href="http://www.istria-bike.com/hr/staze?filterRegion=1&amp;dfficulty=&amp;trail_type=&amp;search=Tra%C5%BEi" target="_blank">Popis svih staza u regiji</a>&raquo; <a href="http://www.istria-bike.com/hr/smjestaj?filterRegion=1&amp;accomodation_type=&amp;search=Tra%C5%BEi" target="_blank">Smje&scaron;taj</a> i <a href="http://www.istria-bike.com/hr/usluge" target="_blank">usluge</a>	-0.6
Novigrad	Novigrad	1.8
The western coast of Istria is a perfect area for all those who would like to enjoy the leisure rides and to recreate themselves and spend holidays in the untouched nature.	Zapadna obala Istre je područje savr&scaron;eno za sve koji žele uživati u laganim i ležernim vožnjama te se tako rekreirati i provoditi odmor u netaknutoj prirodi.	0.295804
With 5 maintained and shorter trails this part of Istria, along the town of Vrsar and Funtana, is suitable for driving on a flat surface so that recreational riders can enjoy in the beautiful landscapes and curvy trails situated along of the coast.Particularly enjoyable ride is through the 100 year old woods Kontija which untouched vegetation will delight you while a special attraction represents a magnificent view of Lim.Specially designed and adjusted to the needs of families and children, as well as for less experienced cyclists are three trails that carry Family &amp; Recreation sign.	S 5 uređenih i kraćih staza ovaj dio Istre, s gradićima Vrsar i Funtana, pogodan je za vožnje po ravnoj podlozi, tako da rekreativci mogu uživati u prekrasnim krajolicima i vijugavim stazama priobaljem. ~~~ Posebno je ugodna vožnja stoljetnom &scaron;umom Kontijom čija će vas netaknuta vegetacija odu&scaron;eviti dok posebnu atrakciju pruža predivan pogled na Limski kanal.Posebno osmi&scaron;ljene te prilagođene potrebama obitelji i djece, kao i manje iskusnim biciklistima, jesu 3 staze koje imaju oznaku Family&amp;Recreation.	-0.0108974

Hidrographisches Amt). Na svu sreću, sredi&scaron;nji dio Istre, istarska visoravan i na njoj Vi&scaron;njan, virili su kao otok iz mora magle koja se prostirala preko sjevernog Jadrana i daleko na zapad.	0.188496
Part of the night was spent in replacing the telescope&rsquo;s damaged electronics, while the rest was spent on routine observation of the sky.	Početak noći u zvjezdarnici proveden je u zamjeni o&scaron;tećene elektronike teleskopa, a ostatak je noći snimanje neba teklo naprosto rutinski.	0.277869
Around 11 pm the area around the star Kapa Arietis was filmed, and the location of the asteroid 4064 Marjorie, a huge rock formation 10 times the size of Učka, was calculated.	Oko 23 sata snimano je područje kraj zvijezde Kappa Arietis. ~~~ Mjeren je položaj asteroida '4064 Marjorie', u stvari ogromne kamene gromade deset puta veće od Učke.	-0.00208333
This small planet or asteroid orbits the Sun, right behind Mars.	Taj mali planet ili asteroid kao neki nebeski otok kruži oko Sunca odmah iza planeta Marsa.	0.674545
It was discovered in 1960 at the famous Palomar Observatory in the USA.	Otkrili su ga 1960. godine s čuvene američke zvjezdarnice Palomar.	0.3
The location of this specific asteroid had not been calculated for years, so the uncertainty of its precise location was growing.	Tom asteroidu već godinama nije nitko bio mjerio položaj, pa je neodređenost njegova položaja sve vi&scaron;e rasla.	0.285714
It was required to take three shots and send them to the Small Solar-System Body Centre, along with calculations.	Trebalo je napraviti tri snimka i mjerenja poslati u Svjetski centar za mala tijela.	0.2

Grown from time immemorial in the vineyards of Istria, teran is a grape variety that yields excellent red wine which has an interesting nuance of astringency.	Od davnina uzgajan u istarskim vinogorjima, teran je sorta koja daje izvrsno crveno vino sa zanimljivom nijansom trpkosti.	0.378649
Wine connoisseurs say that it is a passionate and unusual wine; it has a lively, unrestrained bouquet of forest berries, and its colour ranges from purple to ruby red.	Znalci kažu da je strastven i neobičan - ima živ, neobuzdani miris &scaron;umskog voća, a boja mu se kreće od ljubičaste do rubinski crvene.	0.26129

Every year Istrian wine cellars play their part in World Wine Day which is celebrated on the last Sunday in May in many regions of the world.	Svake godine istarski vinski podrumi daju svoj obol Danu vina &scaron;to se u mnogim regijama svijeta obilježava posljednje nedjelje u svibnju.	0.276724

This unusual, malodorous subterranean fungus of an unattractive form is &ndash; the truffle.	Neobičan gomolj, neugledna oblika i intenzivnog mirisa - to je tartuf!	0.208065
The rare and expensive tuber that grows in the fertile Istrian soil is the ultimate gastronomic delight.	Ova rijetka i skupocjena gljiva koja raste u plodnom istarskom tlu prava je kulinarska poslastica.	0.285882

Truffles	Tartufi	0.2625
The truffle is the supreme delicacy that had been enjoyed by the Mesopotamian rulers 4000 years ago, and it is still one of the most prestigious foodstuffs in world gastronomy.	Tartuf, vrhunska delicija koja je jo&scaron; pred 4000 godina dražila nepca mezopotamskih vladara, i danas je jedan od prestižnih sastojaka svjetske gastronomije.	1.72645
This intense flavour royal mushroom was known to the ancient Greeks and the Roman emperors, and it was also served at the French court and among the Austro-Hungarian aristocracy. It is very rare and it grows only in several locations in Europe - in some parts of France and Italy and in Istria, favoured by mild climate, small temperature variations and grey clay soil.
