Ancient Istrian towns were built on the peaks of the hills: today they are treasure troves of antiquity. ~~~ For centuries they have stood on the hilltops, crowning their beauty.	Položeni na uzvi&scaron;enjima istarski su gradići putokazi u galeriju starina i istovremeno njeni najljep&scaron;i eksponati.	-0.0443478
Their thick walls witnessed the arrival of master builders and artists who added to their splendour.	Uzdižu se k nebu i suncu, dominiraju krajolicima kao krune odolijevajući vremenu.	0.246575
The doors to these ancient towns are always open, and the church bells beckon the visitors to enter.	Njihovi bedemi pamte sretna razdoblja i neće zaboraviti ispričati vam onu osobitu priču o tajnama svog trajanja.	0.242857
There are flocks of doves in there, men chat in the streets, and children play in the shade of ancient lime tress. ~~~ The sun bathes the tranquil scene in a golden glow.	O tome kako su kroz stoljeća redovito dolazili graditelji i umjetnici, te u staru krunu ugrađivali nove dragulje koji bi iznova bljesnuli novim sjajem.	-0.00801527
Towns in the interior of Istria	Gradići u unutrašnjosti Istre	0.277778
If you wish to feel the atmosphere of good old country households, wholesome dishes of the traditional cuisine, romantic hearths and scented wine cellars, discover the charms of country tourism, small family-run rural hotels and homesteads.	Uz ugodnu atmosferu dobrih, starih seoskih domaćinstava, tradicionalnih domaćih jela, romantičnih ognji&scaron;ta i mirisnih vinskih podruma, otkrit ćete sve čari agroturizama, malih obiteljskih hotela i stancija.	0.281443
	Uživajući u plemenitim kapima i domaćoj hrani za drvenim klupama pod ruzom ili tik do ognji&scaron;ta, moći ćete okusiti svu blagost Istre i ljepotu življenja njezinih ljudi.	-0.3
Istria special - Countryside	Agroturističke oaze	0.21
In the first centuries of the early Middle Ages various barbarian tribes invaded Istria.	U prvim stoljećima ranog srednjeg vijeka u Istru prodiru razna barbarska plemena.	0.283333
The invasion of the Avars and Lombards lasted for a brief period and they did not remain in Istria, but the Slavs spread throughout the peninsula and settled in many parts of its interior.	Dok su Avari i Langobardi vr&scaron;ili kraće upade i uglavnom se nisu zadržali u Istri, Slaveni su se pro&scaron;irili po čitavom poluotoku i zaposjeli mnoge dijelove njegove unutra&scaron;njosti.	0.265385
In 788 Istria became part of the Franconian state that introduced the feudal system, encouraged the settling of the Slavs, often on land owned by towns.	Srednjovjekovni gradići ~~~ Rimljani u Istri	-0.33
Thus, towns began to lose their autonomy (based upon classical legal norms) and their power declined, whereas at the same time the power of the Church increased, since the rule of Charlemagne depended on it.	Rimsko doba	-0.6
Medieval towns	Rimljani u Istri	0.278571
	Pula	-0.3
Romans in Istria	Brijuni ~~~ Poreč	-0.01
In the middle of the 2nd millennium BC, on the entire territory of Istria, fortification settlements began to appear on hilltops and prominent points above valleys.	Sredinom 2. tisućljeća prije Krista na vrhovima brežuljaka i istaknutim točkama iznad dolina na području cijelog istarskog poluotoka nastaju naselja &ndash; gradine.	0.278571
More than 400 hill-forts have been recorded in Istria which speaks of the population density in the Bronze and Iron Ages.	U Istri je zabilježeno vi&scaron;e od 400 gradina &scaron;to ukazuje na veliku naseljenost poluotoka u razdoblju brončanog i željeznog doba.	1.80378
They were mostly circular, ellipsoidal and surrounded by defensive walls.	Bile su uglavnom kružnog, elipsoidnog oblika i okružene za&scaron;titnim zidinama.	0.249231
Larger hill-forts were even encompassed by several rings of walls.		-0.3
A special building technique was used where large stone blocks were laid without a bonding agent (dry wall).		-0.3
Besides the quadrangular ground plan, houses were also circular and most probably had a roof made of stone slates like today&rsquo;s stone-huts (kažun) which then suggests that the same style of construction has survived from the Bronze Age until today.		-0.3
Prehistoric settlements	Pretpovijesna naselja	0.271429
The first traces of prehistoric people on the territory of Istria date back to the period of the Lower Palaeolithic.	Prvi dokazi o postojanju praljudi na području Istre datiraju iz razdoblja starijeg paleolitika.	0.254118
The stone hand axe made by early man is about 2 million to 800,000 years old and was found in the vicinity of Pula, in &Scaron;andalja Cave.	Starost kamenog udarača izrađenog rukom pračovjeka procjenjuje se na 2 milijuna do 800.000 godina i pronađen je u blizini Pule, u &scaron;pilji &Scaron;andalja.	1.60196
Finds from the Upper Palaeolithic (40,000-10,000 BC) were found at the sites of &Scaron;andalja II and St. Romuald&rsquo;s Cave in Lim Bay.	Nalazi iz razdoblja mlađeg paleolitika (40-10.000 godina) nalaze se na lokalitetima &Scaron;andalja II te u Romualdovoj pećini u Limskom kanalu.	0.563025
Prehistoric people in Istria	Prvi ljudi u Istri	0.1125
Kažun is a small field hut that provided shelter, built using the dry wall technique - stone laid up without mortar.	Kažun je malo poljsko skloni&scaron;e napravljeno u suhozidu, od kamena bez ikakvog veziva.	0.451323
Apart from offering shelter it was also used for checking fields and vineyards before the harvest.	Osim kao zaklon koristilo se i za nadgledanje polja i vinograda neposredno prije žetve i berbe.	0.292683
Architectural heritage	Graditeljska baština	0.285714
People in Istria have always stone for their works of art, as well as everyday objects - slates for the construction of dry stone field huts kažuni, walls and covering roofs, and hard blocks of stone for dressing oils storage basins, decorative details on houses or crowns of wells.	Istarski čovjek oduvjek je za svoja umjetnička djela i predmete potrebne za svakodnevni život koristio kamen - &scaron;krilje za gradnju kažuna, zidova i krovova te onaj tvrdi, rezan na blokove iz kojeg je klesao kamenice za ulje, ukrasne detalje na kući ili 'grla' za &scaron;terne.	0.353777
Architectural heritage	Graditeljska baština	0.285714
Even today many people cherish memories of past times.	Mnogi ljudi i danas čuvaju uspomene na pro&scaron;la vremena.	0.248936
Vittorio Rossoni started his ethnographic collection completely by chance &ndash; while renovating his family house he came across some twenty old household articles that our grandparents used.	Vittorio Rossoni započeo je svoju etnografsku zbirku sasvim slučajno &ndash; prilikom uređenja obiteljske kuće nai&scaron;ao je na dvadesetak starih predmeta koji su se koristili u domaćinstvima u vremenima na&scaron;ih djedova i baka.	0.546429
Architectural heritage	Graditeljska baština	0.285714
People who lived in these areas some hundred or more years ago cultivated land daily.	Ljudi koji su na ovim prostorima živjeli prije stotinjak i vi&scaron;e godina svakodnevno su obrađivali zemlju.	0.1875
Very often they had to take it away from the stone, which they afterwards collected and used for enclosing their plots.	Često su je morali otimati kamenu, kojeg bi skupljali i njime ograđivali svoje parcele.	0.21039
Architectural heritage	Graditeljska baština	0.285714
The characteristic old Istrian house - hiža is made of stone, with walls having pointed-up joints and roofs topped with half-round tiles.	Karakteristične stare istarske hiže građene su od kamena, fugiranih su zidova i krovova prekrivenih crijepom kanalicom.	0.272222
Added to the front part of the facade is nearly always a baladur - staircase leading to the residential part of the house.	S prednje fasade na kuću je gotovo uvijek nadozidan baladur, stubi&scaron;te kojim se ulazi u stambeni dio kuće.	0.290816
Architectural heritage	Graditeljska baština	0.285714
Fairs are the life-blood of every small town and in Istria they have kept to their traditions - every town has its own fair and a specific day on which it is held.	Sajmovi su žila kucavica svakog malog grada, a u Istri su zadržali svoju tradiciju - svaki grad ima svoj sajam i poseban dan kad se održava.	0.378338
Tradition	Tradicija	0.3
Original Istrian souvenirs are items which, regardless of their simplicity, tell us much about Istria and its people.	Izvorni istarski suveniri su predmeti koji, uza svu svoju jednostavnost, mnogo govore o Istri i Istranima.	0.270652
They attract great attention as they are a perfect combination of traditional culture and modernity.	Pobuđuju veliki interes jer predstavljaju spoj tradicijske kulture i suvremenosti.	0.252
Tradition	Tradicija	0.3
Easter or locally known as Vazan is an important religious feast celebrating the resurrection of Jesus.	Uskrs ili Vazan je svečani dan u kojem se slavi Isusovo uskrsnuće.	0.370424
It is customary to wear something new on that day.	Običaj je da se za Uskrs odjene ne&scaron;to nove odjeće.	0.235714
Since Easter is a holiday celebrating a new beginning and rebirth, which coincides with the beginning of spring, so people are symbolically revived through new clothing.	Kako je Uskrs blagdan novog početka i obnove, a dolazi i proljeće, tako se čovjek putem nove odjeće simbolično obnavlja.	0.193458
Tradition	Tradicija	0.3
Ethnographic museum of Istria preserves, and actively collects textile artefacts.	Etnografski muzej Istre čuva i aktivno prikuplja tekstilnu građu.	0.235
The main parts of the collection are Istrian traditional costumes.	Veći dio zbirke čini tradicijska odjeća Istre.	0.204545
Tradition	Tradicija	0.3
In the area of Porec and its surroundings, from Tar and Vabriga to places in green Istria &ndash; Ka&scaron;telir - Labinci, Vi&scaron;njan and Vižinada, you will experience the glory of past times as well as the untouched nature of Istrian west coast.Poreč will make possible that you, besides discovering its jewels, find out why they call Istria "Terra Magica" (the magic land).		-0.3
Get to know more about the Mediterranean landscape and cultural wealth of Istria which will captivate you.		-0.3
The mosaics in the Euphrasius Basilica, which complex is from 1997 on the UNESCO list of protected world cultural heritage, will delight you with their beauty.		-0.3
Cycling trails will lead you through vineyards and olive groves to unforgettable moments and a real treat for the most prepared competitors is a ride along the route of the 15th stage of the 87th Giro d'Italia that starts in Poreč.There are numerous cycling events which are organized every year and their number proves that the Poreč is favourite location for preparation of top athletes and recreational cyclists.		-0.3
Due to the excellent climatic conditions and 10 cycling trails with a total length about 250 km, Poreč is an ideal destination for trainings of professional cyclists as well as for amateurs to enjoy nature.Search for accommodation in bike hotels in this area and you will be satisfied with the high quality service and standards.		-0.3

The development of tourism as a social and economic phenomenon is related to the calming of the political situation in the first half of the 19th century after the Napoleonic wars, and to the modernization of transport equipment, primarily railroads, which facilitated long-distance travelling.	Razvoj turizma kao dru&scaron;tveno-ekonomskog fenomena vezan je uz smirivanje političke situacije u prvoj polovici 19.st. ~~~ nakon Napoleonovih ratova, te modernizacijom prometnih sredstava kojima su se olak&scaron;ala putovanja na duže relacije, u prvom redu željeznce.	-0.00684647
The expansion of tourism and its mass character allowed a creation of the famous rivieras, wintering-balneological and especially climatic health resorts and spas.Due to its favourable and healthy climate and interesting history, Istria has been attractive to the clientele from the continental parts of Europe ever since the beginning of modern tourism.	Zbog povoljne i zdrave klime, te zanimljive pro&scaron;losti, Istra je bila privlačna za klijentelu iz unutra&scaron;njosti od samih početaka modernog turizma. ~~~ Nakon &scaron;to je 1844.	-0.124699
After 1844, when the Austrian Lloyd established permanent tourist line Trieste-Rijeka, ships regularly sailed to Piran, Novigrad, Poreč, Rovinj and Pula.	Austrijski Lloyd uspostavio stalnu izletničku liniju Trst-Rijeka, brodovi se redovno zaustavljaju u Piranu, Novigradu, Poreču, Rovinju i Puli.	0.441488
The construction of the railway line Divača-Pula with the branch line Kanfanar-Rovinj (1876) even more accelerated the development of Rovinj tourism, although then it was just about individual visits instead of organized arrivals.The year 1888 marks the official beginning of Rovinj tourism when the health resort Maria Theresia Seehospiz, provided for the treatment of poor children suffering from scrofulosis and rickets opened its doors.	Izgradnja željezničke pruge Divača-Pula s odvojkom pruge Kanfanar-Rovinj (1876.) ~~~ jo&scaron; je vi&scaron;e pospje&scaron;ila razvoj rovinjskog turizma, iako se tada radilo samo o pojedinačnim posjetima bez organiziranog dolaska.Za službeni početak rovinjskog turizma može se uzeti 1888.g. ~~~ kada je otvoreno morsko klimatsko lječili&scaron;te Maria Theresia Seehospiz, predviđeno za liječenje siroma&scaron;ne djece od skrofuloze i rahitisa.	-0.116615
This health resort was mostly visited by the children from the Austro-Hungarian Empire, but also from Germany, Russia and other countries.	Ovo su lječili&scaron;te posjećivala najče&scaron;će djeca s područja Austro-Ugarske, ali i iz Njemačke, Rusije i drugih zemalja.	0.297479
	U sklopu ovog lječili&scaron;ta započela su i prva meteorolo&scaron;ka mjerenja temperature zraka, koja su uspoređivana s bečkim vrijednostima. ~~~ Godine 1890.	-0.3
The first meteorological measurements of air temperature started, as part of this health resort, which were compared with the Viennese values.In 1890 Knight Georg H&uuml;tterott, an entrepreneur from Trieste, enchanted by the Rovinj archipelago, bought four islands in its southern part (St. Andrew, Ma&scaron;kin, &Scaron;turag and St. John), and in the coming years started to buy private properties, south of the town in the area of Punta Corrente, Montauro, &Scaron;karabe, Monvi and Monte Mulini.	Georg Hutterott, poduzetnik iz Trsta, odu&scaron;evljen rovinjskim arhipelagom, kupuje četiri otoka u južnom djelu, i to Sv. ~~~ Andriju, Ma&scaron;kin, &Scaron;turag i Sv. ~~~ Ivana, te u narednim godinama počinje s otkupljivanjem privatnih posjeda, južno od grada na predjelima Punta Corrente, Montaura, &Scaron;karabe, Monvia i Monte Mulinija.	-0.0579407
In the fenced area of almost 90 ha of pastures, vineyards and olive groves, he created a true nature park by afforestation of carefully selected Mediterranean and exotic plants.Since the purchase of the islands distinguished guests visited his property, as evidenced by the list in the memorial book Cissa Insel and the stone inscriptions along the trails on the island carved in the living limestone walls.	Na ograđenoj povr&scaron;ini od gotovo 90 ha pa&scaron;njaka, vinograda i maslinika, po&scaron;umljavanjem pomno odabranim mediteranskim i egzotičnim biljkama stvorio je pravi park prirode.Od same kupovine otoka na njegov posjed dolaze ugledni gosti, o čemu svjedoče popisi u spomen-knjizi &laquo;Cissa Insel&raquo; i kameni natpisi duž staza na otoku urezani u žive vapnenačke stijene.	0.979245
In the list of the memorial books until 1908 are mentioned Prince and Princess Coburg Gotha, Princess Stefanie von Habsburg, Archduke Ludwig Salvatore, Grand Duchess Maria Josef of Saxony, Princess Maria Theresa of Bavaria, Prince Hohenlohe with his family, Prince Johann Lichtenstein, and many other members of the European nobility; a number of admirals and officers of the Austro-Hungarian navy from Pula such as Maximilian von Sterneck, Hermann von Spaun, Rudolf Montecuccioli, Franz von Minutillo; entrepreneurs such as Arthur Krupp, Carl Escher, Paul Schoeller, E. Skoda; scientists such as R. Virchow, R. Burkhardt and others.	Na popisu iz spomen-knjige do 1908. godine nalazimo princa i princezu Coburg Gotha, princezu Stefanie von Habsburg, nadvojvodu Ludviga Salvatora, veliku vojvotkinju Mariju Jozefu od Sachsena, princezu Mariju Thereziju od Bavarske, princa Hohenlohe s obitelji, princa Johanna Lichtensteina, te mnoge druge pripadnike europskog plemstva, čitav niz admirala i časnika k.und .k mornarice iz Pule, poput Maximiliana von Sternecka, Hermana von Spauna, Rudolfa Montecucciolia, Franza von Minutilla, poduzetnike Arthura Kruppa, Carla Eschera, Paula Schoellera, E. Skode, znanstvenike R. Virchowa, R. Burkhardta i dr. Godine 1910. otok je posjetio i prijestolonasljednik Franjo Ferdinand, o čijoj se posjeti govori u pismu čuvara posjeda.	0.489646
In 1910 the island was visited by the Crown Prince Francis Ferdinand, whose visit is described in a letter to a guard of the property.	Gosti su se sve če&scaron;će i sve duže zadržavali na otoku, tako da se iz izletničkog ubrzano razvijao i stacionarni turizam.	0.297297
Guests visited more often and stayed for longer periods of time on the island, and as a result the excursion tourism rapidly evolved into the stationary tourism.Due to the significant commercial success, the Emperor Franz Joseph in 1898 awarded Georg H&uuml;tterott the title of knight for his merits in the industry, and in 1905 he became a member of the Senate of the Imperial Council, by which the reputation of his family reached its peak.	Zbog značajnog poslovnog uspjeha, car Franjo Josip dodijelio je 1898. ~~~ Georgu H&uuml;tterottu titulu viteza za zasluge u industriji, a 1905. postaje članom Senata Carskog savjeta, čime je ugled obitelji dosegnuo vrhunac.	-0.134615
As a young and successful merchant, due to his merits in 1879 he became the first Japanese consul in Europe.	Kao mladi i uspje&scaron;an trgovac, za svoje je zasluge jo&scaron; 1879. postao prvi japanski konzul u Europi.	0.28
As an admirer of space and the sea, Georg H&uuml;tterott owned yacht named Tornato, and in 1894 he purchased steam schooner, yacht "Suzume" (Japanese = sparrow), and together with the Archduke Charles Stephen became the forerunner of the sport sailing in this region.Overwhelmed with the ecstatic beauty of this area, and well aware of the remarkable success of some tourist resorts in the Adriatic, especially Opatija and Brioni, he began planning the creation of a real tourist destination.In a brochure issued in 1908, he exposed his idea of a building of climatic health resort modelled on similar facilities along the Istrian coast.	Ljubitelj prostranstva i mora, Georg H&uuml;tterott je posjedovao jahtu Tornato, a 1894. kupuje parni &scaron;kun, jahtu "Suzume" (japanski = vrabac), te zajedno s nadvojvodom Karlom Stefanom postaje preteča sportskog jedrenja na ovom području. ~~~ Zanijet ljepotama prirode ovog kraja, a poznavajući zapažen uspjeh nekih turističkih odredi&scaron;ta na Jadranu, ponajprije Opatije i Brijuna, započeo je s planovima stvaranja pravog turističkog odredi&scaron;ta. ~~~ U bro&scaron;uri koju izdaje 1908., izlaže svoju ideju gradnje klimatskog lječili&scaron;ta po uzoru na slične objekte duž istarske obale.	-0.102709
He founded a company with limited liability, which was supposed to take care of financing of the construction.	Osnovano je dru&scaron;tvo s ograničenom odgovorno&scaron;ću koje se trebalo brinuti za financiranje radova.	0.284043
The project included the area of Monte Mulini, Montauro and Punta Corrente, where the trails, tree-lined avenues, meadows and parks were already constructed.	Projektom su obuhvaćeni predjeli Monte Mulini, Montauro i Punta Corrente, gdje su već bili uređeni puteljci, aleje stabala, livade i parkovi.	0.955418
In addition, the property was surrounded by a two-meter stone wall, 900 m long, which stretched from the iron gate of the park to the sea on &Scaron;karaba.	Osim toga, posjed je bio ograđen dvometarskim suhozidom, dugačkim 900 m, koji se protezao od željeznih vrata parka do mora na &Scaron;karabi.	1.72027
He planned to build sports facilities, 3 hotels, and swimming area at the old beach Brunetti in the Lone bay.	Planirao je izgraditi sportske terene, 3 hotela, te kupali&scaron;te na mjestu starog kupali&scaron;ta Brunetti u uvali Lone.	2.23736
The first hotel was envisaged on the last bend in the road that leads to the park, while the second was to be located in the park at the intersection of roads to Punta Corrente and Montauro.	Prvi hotel bio je predviđen na zadnjem zavoju ceste koja vodi prema parku, dok bi se drugi nalazio u samom parku, na raskrižju puteva prema Punti Corrente i Montauru.	0.470213
The third, however, was supposed to be constructed at the Punta by the sea.	Treći je, pak, trebao niknuti na samoj Punti uz more. ~~~ Niz vila trebao je pratiti čitav glavni put.	-0.0547619
A number of villas were expected to follow the main road.About the feasibility of a such project testifies a bid for the purchase of a parcel of land worth a million crowns, which in that same year, i.e. ~~~ in 1908, Georg H&uuml;tterott immediately refused, and in 1918 for the purchase was even interested the Mayor of Vienna, Dr. Weisskirchner, in behalf of the City, driven exactly by a "little red book", as this project was named by Marie H&uuml;tterott.	O isplativosti takvog projekta govori i ponuda za kupnju terena na kopnu od milijun kruna, koju je iste godine, odn.1908., Georg H&uuml;tterott odmah odbio, a 1918. za kupnju je bio zainteresiran i gradonačelnik Beča, dr. Weisskirchner, i to u ime Grada, potaknut upravo "malom crvenom knjižicom", kako je ovaj projekt nazvala Marie H&uuml;tterott.	0.113151
And this offer, after several negotiations, was declined.The untimely death of Georg H&uuml;tterott in 1910 stopped most of the construction works, but the project stimulated thinking and gave impetus to the development of tourism in a true sense when in 1911 the Statute of the consortium of innkeepers, owners of coffee shops, liquor dealers and hoteliers (Consorzio dei trattori, osti caffetieri, liquoristi ed albergatori) was adopted.	I ta je ponuda, nakon nekoliko pregovora odbijena.Prerana smrt Georga H&uuml;tterotta 1910. zaustavila je većinu radova, ali je taj projekt potaknuo razmi&scaron;ljanja i dao impuls razvoju turizma u pravom smislu kada je 1911. usvojen Statut konzorcija gostioničara, vlasnika kavana, prodavača likera i hotelijera (Consorzio dei trattori, osti caffetieri, liquoristi ed albergatori).	0.671006
By seeking help of the widow H&uuml;tterott in 1913 hotel "Adriatico" was opened and the foundations of a modern tourism were laid.	Obrativ&scaron;i se za pomoć udovici H&uuml;tterott, 1913. otvoren je hotel "Adriatico" i postavljeni su temelji modernog turizma.	0.61982
The Tourist Board of Rovinj-Rovigno published a new brochure entitled &lsquo;Cultural and historical itineraries of Rovinj&rsquo; which, among other things, presents eight routes that encompass all the cultural and historical sights of the town with an emphasis on the old town, its surroundings and the wider urban surroundings.	Turistička zajednica grada Rovinja-Rovigno objavila je novu bro&scaron;uru pod nazivom Kulturno-povijesni itinerari Rovinja, u kojoj je među mnogobrojnim, predstavljeno 8 ruta obilaska kulturno povijesnih znamenitosti grada sa naglaskom na starogradsku jezgru, njeno okruženje i &scaron;iru gradsku okolicu.	0.291273
Each route is described and accompanied by a corresponding graphic display on the map.	Svaka opisana ruta popraćena je i pripadajućim grafičkim prikazom na karti.	0.278261
The first part of the brochure entitled &lsquo;Itineraries through the former island village&rsquo; presents four possible routes with attractions located in the old town, the second part titled &lsquo;Itinerary on the other side of the former channel&rsquo; suggests a route through the old part of the town opposite the old town centre, and the third section entitled &lsquo;Historical and cultural heritage of the immediate and wider surroundings of Rovinj&rsquo; presents two routes passing the sights in the northern part of the town, which covers the area to the Lim Channel and the south-east area, which covers the area to the ornithological reserve Palud.	U prvom dijelu bro&scaron;ure pod nazivom &bdquo;Itinereri kroz nekada&scaron;nje otočno naselje&ldquo; predstavljene su 4 moguće rute obilaska znamenitosti koje se nalaze u starogradskoj jezgri, u drugom dijelu pod nazivom &bdquo;Itinerari s druge strane nekada&scaron;njeg kanala&ldquo; predložena je moguća ruta obilaska starog dijela grada nasuprot starogradskoj jezgri, u trećem dijelu pod nazivom &bdquo;Povijesno-kulturne znamenitosti uže i &scaron;ire okolice grada Rovinja&ldquo; predstavljene su 2 rute obilaska znamenitosti i to u sjevernom dijelu grada koji obuhvaća područje do Limskog kanala te na jugoistoku grada koji obuhvaća područje do ornitolo&scaron;kog rezervata Palud.	0.339707
The fourth chapter of the brochure, &lsquo;Rovinj islands&rsquo;, presents the islands of Rovinj.The author is a historian, Marino Budicin, who suggested all the described routes.	Četvrti dio bro&scaron;ure čini poglavlje &bdquo;Rovinjsko otočje&ldquo; u kojem su predstavljeni rovinjski otoci. ~~~ Autor teksta je povjesničar Marino Budicin, prema čijem su prijedlogu definirane opisane rute.	0.0889916
All the sights from the itineraries contain a short description and important information, and each itinerary includes a list of numerous attractions that reflect the rich history, culture and tradition of Rovinj.	Sve znamenitosti označene u itinerarima sadrže kratki opis sa pripadajućim informacijama, a uz svaki itinerar navedene su brojne zanimljivosti koje karakteriziraju bogatu rovinjsku povijest, kulturu i tradiciju.	0.290164
This brochure, intended for all those who, through the proposed itinerary, want to discover a part of Rovinj's rich cultural, historical and traditional heritage, is available from the Tourist Board office in Croatian, Italian, German and English.	Bro&scaron;ura je namijenjena svima onima koji putem predloženih itinerara žele upoznati dio rovinjskog bogatog kulturnog, povijesnog i tradicijskog nasljeđa, tiskana je na hrvatskom, talijanskom, njemačkom i engleskom jeziku, a zainteresirani je mogu dobiti u uredu Turističke zajednice.	0.234906
Free <a href="/download/210"><span class="font-icons icon-doc-pdf"></span>PDF download</a>	Besplatno preuzmite <a href="/download/209"><span class="font-icons icon-doc-pdf"></span>PDF bro&scaron;uru</a>	1.51595
The app &ldquo;Rovinj - Cultural and Historical Itineraries&rdquo; can be downloaded from the App Store for iOS and the Google Play for ~~~ Life in Rovinj has always been inextricably linked to the sea.	Mobilna aplikacija kulturno povijesnih itinerara može se preuzeti putem App Storea za iOS te Google Playa za Android uređaj, pod nazivom Rovinj &ndash; Cultural and Historical Itineraries:	0.326087
The town&rsquo;s centuries-old fishing tradition has been preserved until today, as the harmony between the citizens living in the old town and the coastal Adriatic landscape became symbolized by the batana.	Rovinj je oduvijek bio okrenut moru, a stoljetna tradicija ribarstva sačuvana je do danas, kada je batana postala simbolom skladna suživota stanovni&scaron;tva starinskoga gradića i primorskog jadranskog krajolika.	0.27809
The batana is a wooden flatboat of 4-6 meters in length and the commonest type of vessel in Rovinj.	Batana je drveno plovilo ravnog dna dužine 4-6 metara i najrasprostranjenije je plovilo u Rovinju.	0.472866
This boat is regarded as a tangible embodiment of the customs, traditions, language, habits, mentality and spiritual atmosphere of Rovinj and its citizens.	Batana zrcali običaje, tradicije, jezik, navike, mentalitet i duhovno ozračje Rovinja i njegovih stanovnika.	0.189796
During the summer months, visitors to Rovinj, as well as local residents, can witness the construction of the batana taking place in the town centre, on the plateau in front of the Batana House Eco Museum.	Tijekom ljetnih mjeseci gosti i građani Rovinja mogu uživo svjedočiti umijeću gradnji batane.	0.00348837
There, a Rovinj kalafat (ship builder) builds a batana in the evening, and later in the summer you can also witness the boat&rsquo;s launch.	Naime, u večernjim satima u centru grada, na platou ispred muzeja Kuća o batani, rovinjski kalafat izrađuje batanu, koja svoje porinuće ima tijekom ljeta.	0.374237
Moreover, several times a week visitors can enjoy a boat ride in a batana as a part of the &ldquo;Batana with Fishing Light Parade and a Dinner at the Spacio&rdquo; event. ~~~ The parade begins with a visit to the Batana House Eco Museum, followed by a ride in a batana around the old town.	Osim toga, gostima je nekoliko puta tjedno, na raspolaganju vožnja sa batanama u sklopu manifestacije Povorka batana sa feralom i večerom u spaciu.Povorka počinje obilaskom eko-muzeja Kuća o batani, nastavlja se vožnjom batanama oko starogradske jezgre te zavr&scaron;ava večerom i zabavom uz slu&scaron;anje bitinada u tradicionalnoj rovinjskoj konobi - spaciu Matika.	-0.0117488
The event ends with a dinner and a performance of bitinada songs at a traditional Rovinj tavern &ndash; Spacio Matika.	Tradicija batane neodvojiva je od glazbene tradicije Rovinja koju predstavlja bitinada &ndash; originalni izričaj rovinjske narodne pjesme.	0.558333
The tradition of building batana boats is inseparable from the musical tradition of Rovinj, namely bitinada songs, Rovinj folk songs representing an authentic musical expression.	Prema tradiciji, bitinada je nastala među rovinjskim ribarima, koji su satima boravili u svojim barkama ribareći ili krpajući mreže.	0.359244
According to tradition, bitinada songs came to be as Rovinj fishermen, whose hands were occupied for hours while fishing on boats or repairing nets, thought of a way to achieve top-quality orchestral performances using their own voices instead of instruments.	Budući da nisu imali slobodne ruke za sviranje instrumenata, dosjetili su se načina kako glasovima postići vrhunske izvedbe poput orkestra.	0.0653226
This is an original way of accompanying the lead singer which involves imitating musical instruments used in any song the lead singer wishes to perform.	To je originalan način izvođenja vokalne pratnje solista imitiranjem muzičkih instrumenata za bilo koju pjesmu koju pjevač želi otpjevati.	0.292857
When a soloist (or soloists performing as a duo) starts singing a song, the bitinad&ugrave;rs (that is how fifteen or more members forming the group are called) use all their skills to imitate the sounds of instruments in a hypothetical orchestra.	Kad solist, ili solisti u duetu, intoniraju odabranu pjesmu, "bitinad&ugrave;ri" (tako se definiraju pjevači toga skupa, koji se sastoji od petnaestak ili vi&scaron;e članova) koriste sve svoje vje&scaron;tine u imitiranju zvukova instrumenata hipotetičnog orkestra.	0.258173
Usually, each performance is unique because it is improvised.	Pojedina izvedba je najče&scaron;će neponovljiva, jer je u znaku improvizacije.	0.194444
The Batana House Eco Museum, devoted to the wooden boat, is listed in UNESCO's Register of the world&rsquo;s best practices for the safeguarding of intangible cultural heritage.	Ekomuzej Kuća o batani, koji je posvećen ovom drvenom plovilu, uvr&scaron;ten je u UNESCO-ov Registar najboljih praksi očuvanja nematerijalne kulturne ba&scaron;tine.	0.296
Several times a week, visitors can attend the batana parade taking place in the evening.	U predvečerje nekoliko puta tjedno moguće je pridružiti se povorci batana sa feralom.	0.506286
	Kreće se sa malog mola u blizini glavnog gradskog trga te se uz prekrasnu starogradsku jezgru plovi do spacia Matika u &Scaron;valbinoj ulici, mjesto koje ulaz ima i sa morske strane.	-0.3
A batana is a traditional Rovinj flatboat sometimes equipped with a fishing lantern.	Vožnja batana praćena je sugestivnom glazbom rovinjske folk skupine Batana ili Bitinadora KUD-a Marco Garbin.	0.411546
The parade starts at the small pier near the main town square, and it will take you around the beautiful old town to the spacio Matika in Vladimir &Scaron;valba Street, which can also be accessed by boat.	U spaciu Matika organizirana je tradicionalna večera sa ribljim specijalitetima.	0.178207
During the boat parade, visitors will be able to enjoy the melodies sung by folk bands, such as &ldquo;Batana&rdquo; or &ldquo;Bitinadora&rdquo;, of the &ldquo;Marco Garbin&rdquo; cultural and artistic association, while at the spacio a traditional dinner consisting of fish dishes will be served.		-0.3
This is a place where residents of Rovinj not only kept, tasted and sold wine in their stone-built houses, but also socialised, dined, played briscola and tressette, sang and had fun.	Spacio je mjesto u kojemu su u svojim kamenim kućama Rovinjci čuvali, ku&scaron;ali i preprodavali vino, ali i mjesto druženja, blagovanja, igranja bri&scaron;kule i tre&scaron;ete, pjevanja i zabave.	0.255195
Such a well-preserved spacio became an integral part of the Batana House Eco Museum in 2006, since when it has served a venue where musical, gastronomic and other types of events have been organized by members of the museum.	Jedan takav izvorno sačuvani sp&agrave;cio, postao je sastavnim dijelom Ekomuzeja 2006. godine i u njemu se od tada organiziraju glazbeni, gastronomski i drugi programi u organizaciji članova Ekomuzeja.	0.284831
At the spacio, visitors can enjoy the finest selections of agricultural products and seafood: wine made from local varieties of Malvasia and Teran grapes, homemade olive oil, as well as fish and shellfish caught by local fishermen.	Ovdje se sljubljuju najplemenitiji plodovi zemlje i mora: vino lokalnih sorta malvazije i terana, domaće maslinovo ulje te ribe i morski plodovi, svježi ulov lokalnih ribara.	0.213158
A performance of bitinada songs (typical Rovinj fishermen songs), given by superb singers called bitinad&ugrave;rs from the &ldquo;Marco Garbin&rdquo; cultural and artistic association or the &ldquo;Batana&rdquo; folk band, adds the finishing touch to the flavours and scent of batana cuisine.	Okuse i mirise batanine kuhinje upotpunjuje izvođenje bitin&agrave;da, tipičnih rovinjskih ribarskih pjesama, u interpretaciji vrsnih pjevača bitinad&ugrave;ra iz Kulturno-umjetničkog dru&scaron;tva &ldquo;Marco Garbin&rdquo; ili folklorno instrumentalnog sastava &ldquo;Batana&rdquo;.	0.503697
A visit to the spacio is a unique opportunity to get acquainted with Rovinj's maritime culture!	Posjet spaciu postaje jedinstven doživljaj, uz upoznavanje svijeta rovinjske maritimne kulture!	0.277778
Rovinj folklore is represented by the Stjepan Žiža (Rovinjsko Selo) and Plesarin cultural and artistic associations, which maintain and preserve the traditional Istrian heritage and customs (costumes, music, songs, dialects).	Rovinjski folklor predstavljaju kulturno umjetničko dru&scaron;tvo Stjepan Žiža (Rovinjsko Selo) i Plesarin koji njeguju i čuvaju tradicionalno istarsko nasljeđe i običaje (no&scaron;nja, glazba, pjesma, govor).	0.869191
Their performances aim to popularize the original cultural heritage, including dances, vocal and instrumental music and other types of customs.	Svojim nastupima populariziraju izvorni folklor na području plesa, vokalno-instrumentalne glazbe i drugih etnografskih sadržaja.	0.282203
In summer, these cultural and artistic associations often perform in the town centre and thus offer a display of customary lore to both locals and guests.	Tijekom ljetnih mjeseci česti su njihovi nastupi u gradskom sredi&scaron;tu gdje građanima i gostima prezentiraju tradicionalni folklor i druge etnografske sadržaje.	0.256154
Rovinj cuisine is based on seafood which used to be caught by locals who set out to the open sea in batanas.	Temelj rovinjske kuhinje su morske namirnice koje su se nekad lovile batanom.	0.20597
In order to preserve the tradition of typical Rovinj cookery, the Batana House Eco Museum published The Traditional Rovinj Cuisine Cookbook.	Kako bi se očuvala tradicija rovinjske kuhinje, u okviru projekta ekomuzeja Kuća o batani izrađena je Knjiga recepata tradicionalne rovinjske kuhinje.	0.267769
This thirty-page book contains fifteen traditional recipes, ranging from recipes for appetizers to main course recipes.		-0.3
All the recipes carry their original names in Rovinj dialect and include a local proverb.	Na tridesetak stranica knjiga donosi petnaest tradicionalnih recepata, od predjela do glavnih jela.	0.252632
Moreover, next to each basic ingredient there is a description on when and how it is caught. ~~~ The cookbook contains recipes for fried sea anemones, brodet (a type of fish stew), fried picarels with kale and so on.	Imenovana su izvornim nazivljem na rovinjskom dijalektu, uz svaku temeljnu namirnicu navodi se vrijeme i način njezina ulova, a svaki recept prati i lokalna uzrečica.Tako se u spomenutoj knjizi mogu pronaći recepti za Pržene vlasulje, Brodet, Pržene gire s keljem i sl.	-0.047191
Experience Rovinj like a local - with a batana boat ride into the sunset!	Doživite Rovinj poput lokalaca, vožnjom u batani u sumrak!	0.554717
Just as the golden hour begins, your &ldquo;barcaiolo&ldquo; will take you on a romantic cruise around the Rovinj archipelago.	Čim sunce počne zalaziti, va&scaron; &bdquo;barcaiolo&ldquo; odvest će vas na romantični obilazak rovinjskog arhipelaga.	0.291743
Enjoy stunning sunset views, taste traditional homemade Rovinj Pelinkovac and enjoy a gourmet dinner at La Puntulina!	Dođite kako biste vidjeli prekrasne zalaske sunca, ku&scaron;ali tradicionalni rovinjski pelinkovac i uživali u gurmanskoj večeri u restoranu La Puntulina!	0.521569

Among the most beautiful landscapes of western Istria is most assuredly the park &lsquo;Zlatni rt&rsquo; which protects Rovinj and its harbour from the south, and extends along the picturesque bays Lone and &Scaron;karaba, and Montauro and Punta Corrente capes. In 1890 the Trieste entrepreneur Georg H&uuml;tterott (Trieste, 1852 &ndash; 1910) bought plots in the bays Lone, and on Montravo and Punta Corrente capes, thus starting the slow transformation of that part of the landscape into a beautiful forest park. Georg H&uuml;tterott began the process of afforestation, which resulted in a forest rich in botanical species, as well as many tree-lined paths, promenades, trails and meadows. Historical documents, remnants of Roman structures, bronze coins and other findings bear witness to the fact that Bale used to be a Roman fort.	Povijesni dokumenti, ostaci rimskih zgrada, brončani novčići i ostali nalazi svjedoče o tome, da su Bale imale ulogu rimske utvrde.Od znamenitosti izdvajamo: Župna crkva - sagrađena na ostacima bazilike iz 9. stoljeća od koje se sačuvala samo kripta kojoj se jo&scaron; uvijek dive dana&scaron;nji posjetitelji.	0.0357025
Let us mention some of the sights:Parish Church &ndash; built on the remnants of a basilica from the 9th century, of which only the crypt remains, an object of admiration by visitors of today.Bembo Castle (Ka&scaron;tel Bembo) &ndash; A beautiful Gothic Renaissance facade with quadriphoras and a central balcony has been completely preserved, intact in its shine and harmonious beauty.The only site where dinosaur bones were found in the Mediterranean region is located in Bale.	Ka&scaron;tel Bembo - Prekrasno gotičko-renesansno pročelje s kvadriforama i sredi&scaron;njim balkonom sačuvano je u potpunosti, nedirnuto u svome sjaju i skladnoj ljepoti.U Balama je pronađeno jedino sredozemno nalazi&scaron;te kostiju dinosaura.	0.05625
Along the Bale coastal area, on the territory of Porto Colone, numerous remnants of dinosaurs and other pre-historic animals were found. ~~~ Some of these unique findings still lie under the sea, whereas some are exhibited at the Bale Municipal Building.	Duž baljanskog priobalja, na prostoru Porto Colone, pronađeni su brojni ostaci dinosaura i drugih prapovijesnih životinja.Dio ovih jedinstvenih nalaza jo&scaron; je u moru, a dio izložen u baljanskoj općinskoj zgradi.	0.0376457
Only 25 kilometers separate us from a small city with an atmosphere of the Mediterranean south and the continental north.	Samo 25 km dijeli nas od gradića s atmosferom mediteranskog juga i kontinentalnog sjevera.	2.40886
It is located in the central part of Istria, on a hill 400 m above sea level.	Smjestio se u sredi&scaron;njem dijelu Istre, na brdu na 400 metara nadmorske visine.	2.59908
It is surrounded by low hills and valleys, and its seaward location has endowed it with a pleasant climate. ~~~ A visit to the Chapel of the Holy Three (Kapela Sv. ~~~ Trojice), housing wall paintings by local masters from the 15th century, or a visit to the Church of St. Michael (Crkva Sv. Mihovila), the largest parish church in Žminj, will be a special experience to any chance traveler.	Mihovila &ndash; najvećoj župnoj crkvi u Žminju.	0.0391304
According to stories told by the local people, the cave Fe&scaron;tinsko kraljevstvo was accidentally discovered in 1930, in Fe&scaron;tine near Žminj, when a part of karstic valley collapsed during the cultivation of the field. ~~~ After the 2nd World War, the cave was filled up, and was dug up again at the beginning of 1980s.	Smje&scaron;tena u Fe&scaron;tinima nedaleko Žminja po pričanju mje&scaron;tana slučajno je otkrivena 1930. kad se prilikom obrađivanja njive uru&scaron;ilo dno vrtače.Nakon drugog svjetskog rata, &scaron;pilja je zatrpana, te je ponovno otkopana početkom osamdesetih godina.	-0.0156
Since it is located on the terrain that was once covered in lush Mediterranean vegetation, the cave is abundant with cave decorations that are the reason why the local people called it &bdquo;Fe&scaron;tinsko Kraljevstvo" (The Kingdom of Fe&scaron;tine).	Budući da se nalazi na terenu nekad pokrivenim bujnom &scaron;umskom vegetacijom, &scaron;pilja obiluje &scaron;piljskim ukrasima, po kojima je od strane mje&scaron;tana i nazvana &bdquo;Fe&scaron;tinsko kraljevstvo&ldquo;.	0.390011
Enter the 6th largest amphitheatre in the Roman Empire and feel the excitement of gladiator fights and big spectacles that took place here 2000 years ago (today exclusive music and sports events take place here)! ~~~ Take a walk under the Arch of the Sergii toward the Forum; take a break in one of the cafes in front of the Temple of Augustus&hellip; Pula enables you to completely experience a day in the life of an ancient patrician!	Uđite u amfiteatar 6. po veličini u rimskom Carstvu i osjetite uzbuđenje gladijatorskih borbi i velikih spektakala koji su se ovdje odvijali prije 2000 godina (danas se ovdje održavaju ekskluzivne glazbene i sportske priredbe)!Pro&scaron;ećite ispod Slavoluka Sergijevaca prema Forumu, napravite pauzu u nekom od kafića ispred Augustova hrama... Pula omogućuje jedan od najkompletnijih doživljaja jednog dana u životu antičkog patricija!	0.282356
Experience the centuries-old idyllic atmosphere of the Istrian peninsula, towns with living history: Bale, Vodnjan, Motovun, Beram, Pazin, Grožnjan, Livade, Buzet, Hum... Visit their Romanesque churches, Gothic and Baroque villas, medieval towers and walls, picturesque squares. ~~~ Explore the forests, valleys and hills with hill-forts and church towers and well-known vineyards on the soil perfect for grape cultivation, where the &bdquo;drink of the gods&ldquo; is produced, the well-known Istrian wine of a unique taste.	Doživite vi&scaron;estoljetnu idilu istarskog poluotoka, gradiće žive povijesti: Bale, Vodnjan, Motovun, Beram, Pazin, Grožnjan, Livade, Buzet, Hum...Posjetite njihove romaničke crkvice, gotičke i barokne vile, srednjevjekovne kule i bedeme, slikovite trgove.Istražite &scaron;ume, doline i brežuljke s gradinama i zvonicima te nadaleko poznatim vinogradima na tlu savr&scaron;enom za rast grožđa, gdje nastaje &ldquo;piće bogova&rdquo;, poznato istarsko vino jedinstvenog okusa.Seoska domaćinstva čuvaju prave poslastice za istinske ljubitelje izvrsnog jela i pića.	0.15963
Village homesteads keep real delicacies for true lovers of excellent food and drink. ~~~ The Sports Airport Vrsar is located is the middle of green fields alongside the Adriatic coast, not far from Lim Channel, a protected natural phenomenon.	Sportska zračna luka u Vrsaru, smje&scaron;tena usred zelenih polja uz jadransku obalu, nedaleko za&scaron;tićenog prirodnog fenomena Limskog kanala, zanimljiva je postaja na putu svakog znatiželjnog putnika.	-0.0136364
Providing panoramic flights over Istria or flights to Venice, the airport is the perfect stop for any inquisitive traveller. ~~~ At the Aero park, you can visit an exhibition of old planes, open all year round.	Osim &scaron;to se iz Vrsara može krenuti na panoramski let Istrom ili letjeti u Veneciju, u Aeroparku možete pogledati originalnu izložbu starih aviona otvorenu tijekom cijele godine.	-0.012037
There is also a small picture gallery featuring the history of aviation in Istria, an exhibition of artifacts linked to flying, a corner for the kids, and a charming terrace that is partly set under the wing of an old-timer plane, providing a unique experience.	Ovdje se nalazi i mala galerija slika o povijesti zrakoplovstva u Istri, postav predmeta povezanih s avijacijom te kutak za djecu, ali i atraktivna terasa dijelom smje&scaron;tena ispod krila oldtimer-aviona koja pruža jedinstven doživljaj.	0.288571
Several of the larger airplanes are open to visitors, letting you take a look at the cockpits.	Nekoliko je većih aviona otvoreno za razgledavanje unutra&scaron;njosti pa zaviriti možete i u pilotsku kabinu.	0.220253

Histria Aromatica Park is located in the vicinity of the little town of Bale, covering the total area of 25 hectares.	Park Histria Aromatica nalazi se u neposrednoj blizini Bala, ukupne povr&scaron;ine 25 ha.	3.22785
The park is adorned with walking trails through the plantations and gardens hosting more than 300 species of indigenous aromatic and medicinal plants and spices as well as olive groves and vineyards, creating a natural paradise for all the senses.	Park krase uređene &scaron;etnice kroz plantaže i vrtove sa vi&scaron;e od 300 vrsta autohtonog aromatičnog, začinskog i ljekovitog bilja, maslinika i vinograda predstavljaju prirodni raj za sva osjetila.	1.39343
There is a shop in the park selling its own natural cosmetic products, and a restaurant whose &lsquo;eno-gastro&rsquo; offer is based on high-quality, organically grown ingredients.	U parku se nalazi trgovina sa vlastitim prirodnim proizvodima za kozmetiku, i restoran čija se eno-gastronomska ponuda temelji na visokovrijednim namirnicama iz vlastitog eko uzgoja.	0.294268

Visitors to Rovinj are enthralled by the <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/discover/culture-and-art/cultural-and-historical-sights">cultural and historical monuments</a>, the <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/cultural-and-historical-sights/477">church of St. Euphemia</a>, the <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/museums-and-galleries/472">Rovinj Heritage Museum</a>, galleries and studios displaying artworks and souvenirs.	<a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/kulturno-povijesni-spomenici">Kulturno-povijesni spomenici</a>, <a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/kulturno-povijesni-spomenici/477">Crkva sv.	0.864532
A special treat is a visit to the <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/discover/culture-and-art/museums-and-galleries/500">Batana House Eco Museum</a> dedicated to a wooden flatboat called batana.	Eufemije</a>,<a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/muzeji-i-galerije/472"> Zavičajni muzej</a>, <a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/muzeji-i-galerije">galerije i ateljeji</a> svojim umjetninama i suvenirima mame prolaznike namjernike.	0.359914
Due to its activity in preserving the flatboat-building tradition, the museum was included in the UNESCO's Register of the world&rsquo;s best practices for the safeguarding of intangible cultural heritage. The &ldquo;must see&rdquo; list of things to do in Rovinj includes discovering Rovinj&rsquo;s rich history, exploring the old town and visiting the town&rsquo;s <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/cultural-and-historical-sights">cultural and historical monuments</a>. Spring is the perfect time for taking a walk along the <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/archeologicas-sites">Monkodonja and Mu&scaron;ego</a> archaeological sites, as well as visiting the <a href="/en/discover/nature/palud-swamp">Palud</a> special ornithological reserve, situated on the edge of Rovinj.	&Scaron;etnja arheolo&scaron;kim nalazi&scaron;tima <a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/arheoloska-nalazista/546">Monkodonja i Mu&scaron;ego</a>, kao i posjeta <a href="/hr/explore-discover/priroda/mocvara-palud-i-otoci-dvije-sestrice">ornitolo&scaron;kom rezervatu Palud</a>, koji su smje&scaron;teni uz rubni dio grada upravo je u proljeće idealna.	0.452908
Moreover, visiting Rovinj in spring gives you an opportunity to attend a variety of events: the spring edition of &ldquo;<a href="/en/calendar-of-events">On the Paths of Rovinj Delicacies</a>&rdquo; (during which visitors can enjoy specially prepared fish or meat dishes at promotional prices), the spring edition of the &ldquo;<a href="/en/calendar-of-events">Weekend Bike &amp; Gourmet Tour</a>&rdquo; (a bike tour during which participants will get acquainted with the local gastronomy and visit the main sights, as well as agritourism and agricultural farms, near Rovinj), &ldquo;Popolana&rdquo; (an event dedicated to sports and leisure activities); &ldquo;Music Lesson&rdquo; (a series of educational concerts), &ldquo;Communication Days&rdquo; (a Croatian marketing communication festival), &ldquo;Youth Movement Power&rdquo; (an international football and handball tournament), and many more.Visitors to Rovinj can also enjoy the sailing regattas held in the town, such as the Rovinj-Pesaro-Rovinj regatta, which has been held for more than 30 years, or the Rovinj-Chioggia-Rovinj regatta.	Za goste Rovinja organizirane su brojne <a href="/hr/kalendar">manifestacije</a>: proljetno izdanje Putovima rovinjskih delicija, tijekom koje se u rovinjskim restoranima po promotivnoj cijeni mogu ku&scaron;ati posebno pripremljeni riblji ili mesni meniji; proljetno izdanje Weekend Bike &amp; Gourmet Tour-a &ndash; biciklističke ture s naglaskom na gastronomiju i posjeti atraktivnim punktovima, agroturizmima i poljoprivrednim gospodarstvima u okolici Rovinja; Popolana, sportsko-rekreativna i zabavna manifestacija; ciklus edukativnih koncerata Glazbeni poučak; Dani komunikacija - nacionalni festival marketin&scaron;kih komunikacija; Youth Movement Power, međunarodni turnir u nogometu i rukometu te mnogi drugi.	0.293051
Furthermore, the regatta of traditional boats and vessels, held in early June, is one of the most wonderful sights to enjoy while in town. Thanks to the mild climate, visitors to Rovinj can go <a href="/en/enjoy/outdoor-and-active-holidays/diving">diving</a> already in spring.	Blaga klima omogućuje uživanje u ronjenju već u proljeće.	-0.0944444
The appeal of the diving sites in Rovinj lies in the rich, varied and well-preserved marine wildlife and aquatic vegetation, as well as in a multitude of underwater walls, reefs, caves and shipwrecks.	Lokacije <a href="/hr/dozivi/outdoor/623">ronjenja</a> atraktivne su zbog bogatog, raznolikog i očuvanog biljnog i životinjskog svijeta, ali i mno&scaron;tva podvodnih zidova i grebena, spilja i olupina brodova od kojih je zasigurno najatraktivnija lokacija potonuća broda Barona Gautscha.	0.140237
The most breath-taking diving site is undoubtedly the wreck of the Baron Gautsch steamboat.There is also the possibility to go on <a href="/en/discover/excursions">excursions</a> to various sites of interest, such as the small medieval towns in central Istria, the amphitheatre in Pula, the Euphrasian Basilica in Poreč, the Baredine cave, etc.	Zanimljive su <a href="/hr/explore-discover/izleti">izletničke lokacije</a> poput malih srednjevjekovnih gradića u unutra&scaron;njosti Istre, amfiteatra u Puli, Eufrazijeve bazilike u Poreču, jame Baredine&hellip; Organiziraju su različiti brodski izleti oko rovinjskog arhipelaga, Limskog kanala, posebnog rezervata u moru, nacionalnog parka Brijuni.	0.353691
Various boat excursions are organized around the Rovinj archipelago, the Lim Channel (a special marine reserve) and Brijuni National Park.Those looking for a carefully designed and comprehensively equipped place offering relaxing body and beauty treatments throughout the year will surely enjoy the wellness centres in Rovinj.	<a href="/hr/dozivi/wellness-i-zdravlje/wellness">Wellness centri</a> uređeni u mediteranskom stilu s pažnjom posvećenom i najmanjim detaljima najmodernije su mjesto za opu&scaron;tanje i tretmane ljepote tijekom cijele godine, a posebno će goditi tijekom zimskih mjeseci.	0.25749
Rovinj wellness centres offer a selection of treatments based on Mediterranean herbs and herbal essences.	Wellness tretmani baziraju se na ljekovitom bilju i ljekovitim esencijama Mediterana.	0.236842
First-class accommodation facilities which include multi-purpose meeting and conference halls make Rovinj an ideal destination for <a href="/en/enjoy/business-trips">business meetings and congresses</a>. True to its reputation as a <a href="/en/enjoy/romance">romantic</a> destination, Rovinj has hosted numerous weddings.	Kao pravo <a href="/hr/dozivi/romantika">romantično odredi&scaron;te</a> Rovinj je mnogobrojnim parovima kulisa njihovom vjenčanju.	0.713425

Rovinj is one of the best and most popular summer holiday destinations in Croatia.Visitors who want to enjoy a <a href="/en/accommodation/hotels">luxurious holiday</a> can stay in the elite Monte Mulini zone, next to the <a href="/en/discover/nature/golden-cape-forest-park">Golden Cape</a> forest park, where top quality 4-star and 5-star hotels overlooking the beautiful Mulini Beach near the newly-built marina are located.Numerous coves and gravel beaches, children's playgrounds and other facilities offered by family-friendly <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/accommodation/hotels">hotels</a>, <a href="/en/accommodation/appartments">tourist resorts</a>, <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/accommodation/campsites">campsites</a> and private accommodation make Rovinj an excellent choice for a family vacation.		-0.3

Pine trees casting a pleasant shade are scattered all around the campsites. ~~~ The camping sites are located a few steps away from the sea and well-kept beaches and are equipped with various facilities, pools and amenities for children. During these events gentle, sensual Latin rhythms are heard on every corner of the town, and all day long people dance salsa, bachata, kizomba&hellip;. ~~~ Visitors to Rovinj can also attend a variety of events, such as baroque and classical music concerts performed at churches, as well as concerts held in streets and squares. One of the most famous events is St. Lawrence's Night, when Rovinj is engulfed by a special, romantic atmosphere. ~~~ During St. Lawrence's Night, the street lights are switched off and romantic music is played in candlelight and torchlight at various locations across the town. The Haber farm has been breeding Austrian trakehner horses from 1983. ~~~ Today another horse breed can be found on this farm, SpanishPRE Pura Razza Espa&ntilde;ola horses from which the famous croatian Lipizaner breed derives. ~~~ Today this farm has became a small paradise for other typical Croatian breeds like the istrian donkey, the istrian goat, the istrian Bo&scaron;karin cattle, the Bu&scaron;a cattle, the Posavec horse and the tornjak dog. The tradition of the Orthopaedic and Rehabilitation Hospital &ldquo;Prim.	dr. Martin Horvat datira jo&scaron; iz doba Austro &ndash; Ugarske.	0.264407
Dr. Martin Horvat&rdquo; goes back to the Austro-Hungarian period.	Zbog blagotvorne mediteranske klime i pozicije na poluotoku Sv.	0.283929
Owing to the beneficial Mediterranean climate and its location on the peninsula of St Pelagius, the hospital had been an attractive coastal health resort for the treatment of bone diseases of the then European aristocracy right from its founding.	Pelagija, od svog osnutka bila je atraktivno morsko lječili&scaron;te za ko&scaron;tane bolesti tada&scaron;nje europske aristokracije.	0.0902439
The hospital complex was built under the patronage of Maria Theresa and inaugurated in her presence on 22 May 1888.	Bolnički kompleks izgrađen je pod pokroviteljstvom Marije Terezije, a otvoren je u njezinoj nazočnosti 22.05.1888.	0.278351

The hospital&rsquo;s reputation as a health resort, as well as an ideal place for spending a holiday and undergoing orthopaedic rehabilitation, lasted for a century, and it ensured the loyalty of Austrian patients who gladly used the hospital services, mainly under long-term contracts with the AUVA Austrian insurance company. ~~~ The Department of Surgery was active until the 1990s. This is place providing endless options &ndash; walks in wonderful nature, sport and recreation activities, sailing, diving, climbing, biking, discovering hidden beauties, cultural antiques, archeological sites and culinary specialties, all combined with accommodation in high-quality hotels, tourist resorts and camps providing numerous possibilities for a pleasant holiday, wellness delights, business conferences and sporting activities.	To je mjesto koje pruža nebrojene mogućnosti &ndash; &scaron;etnje prekrasnom prirodom, bavljenje sportskim i rekreacijskim aktivnostima, jedrenjem, ronjenjem, climbingom, biciklističkim vožnjama, zatim otkrivanje skrivenih ljepota, kulturnih starina, arheolo&scaron;kih nalazi&scaron;ta, kulinarskih specijaliteta, a sve to povezano boravkom u visokokvalitetnim hotelima, turističkim naseljima i kampovima koji pružaju brojne mogućnosti za ugodan odmor, uživanje u blagodatima wellnessa, poslovne susrete i sportske aktivnosti.	0.284185

There are numerous spots suitable for watching the sunset: the Francesca Bodi Ascent (at the foot of the St. Euphemia church), the Gnot Brothers Promenade (old town - Lanterna), Monte (Baluota beach) the large pier (in the town centre), the beach below the Amarin hotel (located between the hotel and the resort), the beach below the Porton Biondi campsite, Lone Bay - Mulini Beach; the quarry in the &ldquo;Zlatni rt&rdquo; forest park. Rovinj batanas are flat-bottomed boats protected by UNESCO due to their longevity and a traditional way of construction. ~~~ This is the reason why the Batana House Eco Museum was established. ~~~ This is a dynamic project that offers, besides a permanent exhibition of batanas and fishing tools, various events that ensure a unique experience of combining tradition and contemporary life, past and present, and the story about an ancient wooden vessel that still remains a part of Rovinj's everyday life.	U ovda&scaron;njim lukama, za&scaron;tićenim od vjetrova, i danas se vežu mnogobrojne rovinjske batane, čamci ravnih dna koji su zbog svoje dugovječne i karakteristične drvene gradnje pod visokim UNESCO-ovim pokroviteljstvom.Razlog tome je otvaranje i Eko - muzeja &ldquo;Kuća o batani&rdquo;, dinamičnom projektu, koji osim stalnog postava batana te ribolovnog alata i pribora, kontinuiranim događanjima pruža jedinstven doživljaj spajanja tradicije sa suvremenim životom, pro&scaron;losti i sada&scaron;njosti te, prije svega, priču o drevnoj brodici koja je i danas, eto, dio rovinjske svakodnevnice.	-0.168652
The Museum has won numerous recognitions and the first prize at The Heritage - Excellence Club Congress, part of the Expo Museum and Heritage Fair in Cologne. On Sunday, 13 August 2017, the traditional Grisia exhibition was held in the street of the same name in the old town of Rovinj.	U nedjelju 13. kolovoza 2017. godine održala se tradicionalna izložba Grisia u istoimenoj ulici u starogradskoj jezgri Rovinja.	0.435038
This year's edition of Grisia that celebrates its 50th birthday featured 90 exhibitors, including 27 academics, 10 art students, 42 self-taught artists and 10 children.	Ovogodi&scaron;nje izdanje Grisije koja slavi 50.-ti rođendan, bilježi 90 izlagača, od kojih 27 akademskih umjetnika, 10 studenata likovnih akademija, 42 samouka umjetnika i 10-tak djece.	0.716021

After reviewing the exhibited works, the jury composed of art historians selected the award winners.	Proljeće u Rovinju u znaku je sporta i rekreacije.	0.00681818
This year's first prize (4,500.00 Kuna and prosciutto) was awarded to the academy sculptor from Rovinj, Aleksandar Garbin. ~~~ Second place (4,500.00 Kuna and cheese) was awarded to the student of the Academy of Fine Arts, Anja Leko, and the third place (4,500.00 Kuna) to Vida Meić, also an Academy of Fine Arts student.	To je idealno vrijeme za boravak u park &scaron;umi <a href="/hr/explore-discover/priroda/park-suma-zlatni-rt">Zlatni rt</a> uz razne outdoor aktivnosti poput bicikliranja po uređenim i označenim biciklističkim stazama, trčanja, &scaron;etnji u prirodi, slobodnog penjanja&hellip; <a href="/hr/dozivite/outdoor">Atraktivni sportski sadržaji</a> u samom gradu (nogometni stadion, ko&scaron;arka&scaron;ko i rukometno igrali&scaron;te, tenis tereni na otvorenom i zatvorenom&hellip;) čine Rovinj idealnim odredi&scaron;tem za pripremu rekreativaca ali i vrhunskih sporta&scaron;a.	-0.143309
Spring in Rovinj is perfect for doing sports and leisure activities, especially for spending time in the <a href="/en/discover/nature/golden-cape-forest-park">Golden Cape forest park</a>.	&Scaron;etnja ulicama rovinjske povijesne jezgre predstavlja pravi umjetnički doživljaj.	-0.00361446
Visitors to Rovinj can engage in a variety of outdoor activities such as <a href="/en/enjoy/cycling-and-hiking">cycling</a> on well-marked tracks, running, walking, <a href="/en/enjoy/outdoor-and-active-holidays/free-climbing">free climbing</a>, etc.	<a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/kulturno-povijesni-spomenici">Kulturno-povijesni spomenici</a>, <a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/kulturno-povijesni-spomenici/477">Crkva sv.	1.1202
Thanks to its <a href="/en/enjoy/outdoor-and-active-holidays">attractive sports facilities</a> (the football stadium, basketball and handball courts, outdoor and indoor tennis courts...), Rovinj is perfect place for amateur and professional athletes to train. ~~~ A walk along the streets of Rovinj's historical centre is a true artistic experience.	Eufemije</a>,<a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/muzeji-i-galerije/472"> Zavičajni muzej</a>, <a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/muzeji-i-galerije">galerije i ateljeji</a> svojim umjetninama i suvenirima mame prolaznike namjernike.	0.082711
Visitors to Rovinj are enthralled by the <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/discover/culture-and-art/cultural-and-historical-sights">cultural and historical monuments</a>, the <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/cultural-and-historical-sights/477">church of St. Euphemia</a>, the <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/museums-and-galleries/472">Rovinj Heritage Museum</a>, galleries and studios displaying artworks and souvenirs.	Poseban je doživljaj posjeta ekomuzeju <a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/muzeji-i-galerije/500">Kuća o batani</a>, koji je posvećen drvenoj brodici ravnog dna batani, a zbog svojeg je djelovanja u očuvanju tradicije uvr&scaron;ten u UNESCO-ov Registar najboljih praksi očuvanja nematerijalne kulturne ba&scaron;tine svijeta.	0.309957
A special treat is a visit to the <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/discover/culture-and-art/museums-and-galleries/500">Batana House Eco Museum</a> dedicated to a wooden flatboat called batana.	Istraživanje bogate rovinjske povijesti i posjete starogradskoj jezgri i kulturno povijesnim spomenicima jedna je od obaveznih aktivnosti u Rovinju.	0.204545
Due to its activity in preserving the flatboat-building tradition, the museum was included in the UNESCO's Register of the world&rsquo;s best practices for the safeguarding of intangible cultural heritage.	&Scaron;etnja arheolo&scaron;kim nalazi&scaron;tima <a href="/hr/explore-discover/kultura-i-umjetnost/arheoloska-nalazista/546">Monkodonja i Mu&scaron;ego</a>, kao i posjeta <a href="/hr/explore-discover/priroda/mocvara-palud-i-otoci-dvije-sestrice">ornitolo&scaron;kom rezervatu Palud</a>, koji su smje&scaron;teni uz rubni dio grada upravo je u proljeće idealna.	0.0252809
The &ldquo;must see&rdquo; list of things to do in Rovinj includes discovering Rovinj&rsquo;s rich history, exploring the old town and visiting the town&rsquo;s <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/cultural-and-historical-sights">cultural and historical monuments</a>. ~~~ Spring is the perfect time for taking a walk along the <a href="/en/discover/culture-and-art/archeologicas-sites">Monkodonja and Mu&scaron;ego</a> archaeological sites, as well as visiting the <a href="/en/discover/nature/palud-swamp">Palud</a> special ornithological reserve, situated on the edge of Rovinj.	Za goste Rovinja organizirane su brojne <a href="/hr/kalendar">manifestacije</a>: proljetno izdanje Putovima rovinjskih delicija, tijekom koje se u rovinjskim restoranima po promotivnoj cijeni mogu ku&scaron;ati posebno pripremljeni riblji ili mesni meniji; proljetno izdanje Weekend Bike &amp; Gourmet Tour-a &ndash; biciklističke ture s naglaskom na gastronomiju i posjeti atraktivnim punktovima, agroturizmima i poljoprivrednim gospodarstvima u okolici Rovinja; Popolana, sportsko-rekreativna i zabavna manifestacija; ciklus edukativnih koncerata Glazbeni poučak; Dani komunikacija - nacionalni festival marketin&scaron;kih komunikacija; Youth Movement Power, međunarodni turnir u nogometu i rukometu te mnogi drugi.	0.00740563
Moreover, visiting Rovinj in spring gives you an opportunity to attend a variety of events: the spring edition of &ldquo;<a href="/en/calendar-of-events">On the Paths of Rovinj Delicacies</a>&rdquo; (during which visitors can enjoy specially prepared fish or meat dishes at promotional prices), the spring edition of the &ldquo;<a href="/en/calendar-of-events">Weekend Bike &amp; Gourmet Tour</a>&rdquo; (a bike tour during which participants will get acquainted with the local gastronomy and visit the main sights, as well as agritourism and agricultural farms, near Rovinj), &ldquo;Popolana&rdquo; (an event dedicated to sports and leisure activities); &ldquo;Music Lesson&rdquo; (a series of educational concerts), &ldquo;Communication Days&rdquo; (a Croatian marketing communication festival), &ldquo;Youth Movement Power&rdquo; (an international football and handball tournament), and many more.Visitors to Rovinj can also enjoy the sailing regattas held in the town, such as the Rovinj-Pesaro-Rovinj regatta, which has been held for more than 30 years, or the Rovinj-Chioggia-Rovinj regatta.	Posebno su zanimljive <a href="/hr/dozivi/outdoor/655">jedriličarske regate</a>, poput regate na ruti trabakula Rovinj-Pesaro-Rovinj koja se neprekidno odvija već vi&scaron;e od 30 godina, regata Rovinj-Chioggia-Rovinj, a poseban doživljaj je regata tradicijskih barki i plovila, koja se održava početkom lipnja.	0.530347
Furthermore, the regatta of traditional boats and vessels, held in early June, is one of the most wonderful sights to enjoy while in town.	Blaga klima omogućuje uživanje u ronjenju već u proljeće.	-0.0444444
Thanks to the mild climate, visitors to Rovinj can go <a href="/en/enjoy/outdoor-and-active-holidays/diving">diving</a> already in spring. ~~~ The appeal of the diving sites in Rovinj lies in the rich, varied and well-preserved marine wildlife and aquatic vegetation, as well as in a multitude of underwater walls, reefs, caves and shipwrecks.	Lokacije <a href="/hr/dozivi/outdoor/623">ronjenja</a> atraktivne su zbog bogatog, raznolikog i očuvanog biljnog i životinjskog svijeta, ali i mno&scaron;tva podvodnih zidova i grebena, spilja i olupina brodova od kojih je zasigurno najatraktivnija lokacija potonuća broda Barona Gautscha.	-0.0208494
The most breath-taking diving site is undoubtedly the wreck of the Baron Gautsch steamboat.There is also the possibility to go on <a href="/en/discover/excursions">excursions</a> to various sites of interest, such as the small medieval towns in central Istria, the amphitheatre in Pula, the Euphrasian Basilica in Poreč, the Baredine cave, etc.	Zanimljive su <a href="/hr/explore-discover/izleti">izletničke lokacije</a> poput malih srednjevjekovnih gradića u unutra&scaron;njosti Istre, amfiteatra u Puli, Eufrazijeve bazilike u Poreču, jame Baredine&hellip; Organiziraju su različiti brodski izleti oko rovinjskog arhipelaga, Limskog kanala, posebnog rezervata u moru, nacionalnog parka Brijuni.	0.353691
Various boat excursions are organized around the Rovinj archipelago, the Lim Channel (a special marine reserve) and Brijuni National Park.Those looking for a carefully designed and comprehensively equipped place offering relaxing body and beauty treatments throughout the year will surely enjoy the wellness centres in Rovinj.	<a href="/hr/dozivi/wellness-i-zdravlje/wellness">Wellness centri</a> uređeni u mediteranskom stilu s pažnjom posvećenom i najmanjim detaljima najmodernije su mjesto za opu&scaron;tanje i tretmane ljepote tijekom cijele godine, a posebno će goditi tijekom zimskih mjeseci.	0.25749
Rovinj wellness centres offer a selection of treatments based on Mediterranean herbs and herbal essences.	Wellness tretmani baziraju se na ljekovitom bilju i ljekovitim esencijama Mediterana.	0.236842
First-class accommodation facilities which include multi-purpose meeting and conference halls make Rovinj an ideal destination for <a href="/en/enjoy/business-trips">business meetings and congresses</a>.	Vrhunski smje&scaron;tajni kapaciteti u sklopu kojih se nalaze polivalentne dvorane za sastanke i konferencije stvaraju Rovinj idealno odredi&scaron;te za <a href="/hr/dozivi/poslovna-putovanja">poslovne sastanke i kongrese</a>.	0.536858
True to its reputation as a <a href="/en/enjoy/romance">romantic</a> destination, Rovinj has hosted numerous weddings.	Kao pravo <a href="/hr/dozivi/romantika">romantično odredi&scaron;te</a> Rovinj je mnogobrojnim parovima kulisa njihovom vjenčanju.	0.713425
Any professional photographer will turn Rovinj&rsquo;s beautiful nature, the well-preserved old town and the hotel designer interior and exterior into the perfect background for unforgettable photos. ~~~ In turn, the romantic atmosphere of the town will ensure a memorable experience to all wedding guests.	Prekrasna priroda, odlično očuvana stara gradska jezgra i dizajnerski interijeri i eksterijeri hotela iskusno će oko profesionalnog fotografa odmah pretvoriti u savr&scaron;ene kulise za nezaboravne fotografije, a svim će uzvanicima ponuditi doživljaj za pamćenje.	-0.0157563
Rovinj is one of the best and most popular summer holiday destinations in Croatia.Visitors who want to enjoy a <a href="/en/accommodation/hotels">luxurious holiday</a> can stay in the elite Monte Mulini zone, next to the <a href="/en/discover/nature/golden-cape-forest-park">Golden Cape</a> forest park, where top quality 4-star and 5-star hotels overlooking the beautiful Mulini Beach near the newly-built marina are located.Numerous coves and gravel beaches, children's playgrounds and other facilities offered by family-friendly <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/accommodation/hotels">hotels</a>, <a href="/en/accommodation/appartments">tourist resorts</a>, <a href="/admin/articles/edit/en/accommodation/campsites">campsites</a> and private accommodation make Rovinj an excellent choice for a family vacation.		-0.3

Pine trees casting a pleasant shade are scattered all around the campsites. ~~~ The camping sites are located a few steps away from the sea and well-kept beaches and are equipped with various facilities, pools and amenities for children. During these events gentle, sensual Latin rhythms are heard on every corner of the town, and all day long people dance salsa, bachata, kizomba&hellip;. ~~~ Visitors to Rovinj can also attend a variety of events, such as baroque and classical music concerts performed at churches, as well as concerts held in streets and squares. One of the most famous events is St. Lawrence's Night, when Rovinj is engulfed by a special, romantic atmosphere. ~~~ During St. Lawrence's Night, the street lights are switched off and romantic music is played in candlelight and torchlight at various locations across the town.	U jesenskoj ediciji manifestacije Putovima rovinjskih delicija u rovinjskim restoranima po promotivnoj cijeni moći će se ku&scaron;ati posebno pripremljene riblje ili mesne menije, a na Istria Gourmet Festivalu uz vrhunska predavanja i show cooking renomiranih chefova ovjenčanih Michelinovim zvjezdicama, ljubitelji gourmeta moći će ku&scaron;ati vrhunske delicije.	-0.0596154

During the Batana Boat Parade you will be sailed to the Spacio (a traditional tavern in Rovinj) in a batana (a small, wooden flat-bottomed boat), where you will hear the melodies of bitinada (traditional Rovinj songs).	<a href="/hr/dozivi/gastronomija/maslinovo-ulje">Masline i maslinovo ulje</a> također su plodovi jeseni stoga se ne smije propustiti posjeta lokalnim proizvođačima i ku&scaron;anje maslinovog ulja od autohtonih sorti rožinjola i buža.	0.251087
Visitors to Rovinj can also watch a batana being built in the open and enjoy evenings dedicated to the local tradition in the Riviera square. ~~~ Thanks to the numerous islands and islets surrounding it, as well as an interesting underwater landscape, Rovinj is the ideal place for sailing and <a href="/admin/articles/edit/enjoy/outdoor-and-active-holidays/diving">diving</a> enthusiasts. The Republic of Croatia is a country with beautiful nature, interesting tradition and rich past. ~~~ This country, with its cultural, culinary, natural and architectural wonders, will enchant every sophisticated traveler in search for the pleasant and exciting vacation.	Republika Hrvatska je zemlja s predivnom prirodom, zanimljivom tradicijom i bogatom prošlosti koja će svojim šarolikim kulturnim, gastronomskim, prirodnim i arhitektonskim čudima oduševiti svakog sofisticiranog putnika u potrazi za ugodnim i ispunjenim odmorom.	-0.00193966
Do not let the size fool you, because in just little more than 56 000 square kilometers you will see nature reserves, national parks, protected nature parks, you can relax in one of many Ethno Villages, go skiing or enjoy the beautiful Adriatic coast.	Nemojte dopustiti da vas veličina zavara jer na nešto više od 56 000 km², u Hrvatskoj ćete moći obilaziti prirodne rezervate, nacionalne parkove, zaštićene parkove prirode, odmarati se u mnogobrojnim etno selima istočne Hrvatske, otići na skijanje ili uživati na predivnoj Jadranskoj obali.	1.04498
Croatia is a destination that has everything you need to make your holiday unique, and to provide you with new experiences and unforgettable memories.	Hrvatska je destinacija koja ima sve potrebne sadržaje da vaš odmor učini jedinstvenim te vam pruži nova iskustva i nezaboravne uspomene.	0.285246
Croatia has a favorable geographical position, and therefore, excellent traffic connections to all world destinations.	Hrvatska ima povoljan geografski položaj što joj omogućuje odličnu prometnu povezanost sa svim svjetskim destinacijama.	0.285714
It spreads from the eastern edges of the Alps in the west, all the way to the Pannonian Plain and the banks of the Danube in the east, the central part is covered by Dinara mountain range, and it ends at the southern coast of the Adriatic Sea.	Prostire se od krajnjih istočnih rubova Alpa na zapadu pa do Panonske nizine i obala Dunava na istoku, središnji dio prekriva planinski masiv Dinare, a južni završava na obali Jadranskog mora.	0.246108
It lies between Slovenia on the west, Hungary on the north, and Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia and Montenegro on the east, while the Adriatic Sea divides it from its neighbor Italy.	Smještena je između Slovenije na zapadu, Mađarske na sjeveru, Srbije i Crne Gore te Bosne i Hercegovine na istoku, dok ju Jadransko more dijeli od susjedne Italije.	0.278873
Majority of population are Croats (90,42%), and the biggest ethnic group are Serbs (4,36%).	Većinu stanovništva čine Hrvati (90,42%), a najveću manjinu čine Srbi (4,36%).	0.77973
The most represented religion is Roman Catholic (86,28%).	Najzastupljenija vjeroispovijest je katolička (86,28%).	0.788235

During the summertime, on daylight, driving with headlights is not obligatory.	Tijekom ljetnog računanja vremena, po danu ne moraju biti upaljena svjetla.	0.291045
Use of mobile telephones while driving is forbidden, and use of safety seatbelts is mandatory.	U vožnji je zabranjena uporaba mobitela, a upotreba sigurnosnih pojaseva je obavezna.	0.280263
Custom regulations in the Republic of Croatia are almost entirely harmonised with EU regulations and standards, but the value of those non-commercial items that are brought into the country for personal use and are exempt from tax duty or PDV (VAT), is limited to only 1,000 HRK (kuna).	Carinski propisi Republike Hrvatske gotovo su jednaki propisima i standardima zemalja Europske Unije. ~~~ Prilikom unošenja predmeta nekomercijalne prirode za osobnu uporabu, u vrijednosti do 1 000 kn, carinu i PDV nećete plaćati.	-0.0291045
Foreign and local currency and cheques may be freely taken in and out of the country by both foreign and Croatian citizens with foreign residence, but transfers of an amount of 10,000 Euros or more must be declared to a customs official.	Unošenje i iznošenje stranog i domaćeg gotovog novca i čekova slobodno je za strane i hrvatske državljane s boravištem u inozemstvu, ali uz obvezatno prijavljivanje cariniku svakog prijenosa svote u kunskoj protuvrijednosti iznosa od 10 000 eura ili više.	0.25736
Valuable professional equipment and other technical devices must also be declared to a customs official at the border crossing.	Vrijedniju profesionalnu opremu i tehničke uređaje također je potrebno prijaviti cariniku na graničnome prijelazu.	0.288679
VAT is refunded to persons who do not have permanent or temporary residence in Croatia, for individual goods purchased in Croatia, for amounts in excess of 740.00 HRK (Kuna), upon the presentation of a Tax Cheque form verified by a customs official during the export of purchased goods, at the latest 3 months from the day of purchase.	PDV se vraća osobama koje nemaju prebivalište ili boravište u Republici Hrvatskoj, za robu kupljenu u Hrvatskoj, iznosu većem od 740,00 kuna (kn), uz predočenje poreznog obrasca koji je ovjerio carinik pri izvozu kupljene robe, najkasnije 3 mjeseca od dana kupnje.	1.0218
Foreign nationals must claim Tax refunds within six months of the receipt issue date.		-0.3
The permitted quantity of excise products that particular person (older than 17 years) can enter:	Dozvoljena količina trošarinskih proizvoda koje pojedina osoba (starija od 17 godina) može unijeti:	2.63214
