The transport of house pets across state borders is possible only with the necessary veterinary documentation certifying the animals’ state of health. ~~~ Cats and dogs must be fitted with an electronic identification system (microchip).	Prenošenje kućnih ljubimaca preko granice moguće je samo uz posjedovanje potrebne veterinarske dokumentacije o zdravstvenome stanju životinja, pri čemu psi i mačke moraju biti označeni mikročipom.	-0.0208333
When bringing your pet into the Republic of Croatia, it is your responsibility to meet all the conditions necessary for its importation.	Kada dovodite svojeg kućnog ljubimca u Republiku Hrvatsku, snosite svu odgovornost za ispunjavanje uvjeta za unos.	0.255446
Please check, for instance, whether your pet has been vaccinated, that is, re-vaccinated, on time, whether an antibody titer test has been performed and whether it has a valid passport or veterinary certificate.	Provjerite je li vaš kućni ljubimac na vrijeme cijepljen, je li napravljen titar protutijela i ima li važeću putovnicu i veterinarski certifikat.	0.181395
If your pet does not meet these criteria, then your entry into the Republic of Croatia may be denied, that is, your pet can be returned to the country of origin or quarantined at the permitted border crossing.	Ako vaš kućni ljubimac ne ispunjava navedene zahtjeve, ulazak u Republiku Hrvatsku može vam biti odbijen, odnosno životinja može biti vraćena u zemlju podrijetla ili stavljena u karantenu.	0.291071
In line with the Regulations on veterinary conditions for the non-commercial transportation of pets, the following animals species are considered as pets: dogs, cats, pet ferrets (Mustela putorius) from the marten family (Mustelidae), invertebrates (except for bees and crayfish), ornamental tropical fish, amphibians, reptiles, all bird species (except for poultry), rodents and rabbits.	Pod kućnim ljubimcima, prema Pravilniku o veterinarskim uvjetima za nekomercijalno kretanje kućnih ljubimaca, podrazumijevaju se sljedeće životinjske vrste: psi, mačke, pitome vretice (Mustela putorius) iz porodice kuna (Mustelidae), beskralježnjaci (izuzev pčela i rakova), ukrasne tropske ribe, vodozemci, gmazovi, sve vrste ptica (izuzev peradi) te glodavci i domaći kunići.	0.481003

The Zadar area is a well developed tourist region with some 50 settlements and extending across more than 1200 km of coastline, off which are about 150 islands, isles and reefs, countless coves and idyllic tiny beaches amid unspoiled nature, washed by clean, crystal-clear blue seas. Šibenik, an ancient historical city that long ago was inhabited by the Illyrian tribe of Dalmati, and one of the major cities along the Adriatic highway, is roughly equidistant between Zadar and Split, and about 80 km from each of the two cities.	Šibenik je najstariji hrvatski samorodni grad, a nalazi se u najzaštićenijoj prirodnoj luci, posred istočne obale Jadranskog mora, prastarog mare Adriaticuma.	0.167832

Arboretum is over 500 years old and declared as one of the most beautiful gardens in Europe with more than 300 species of exotic trees and plants.	Arboretum je star preko 500 godina i priznat je kao jedan od najljepših vrtova u Europi s više od 300 vrsta egzotičnog drveća i biljaka.	1.78974
Kornati are the most indented archipelago in the Mediterranean, and it is located in North Dalmatia not far from Šibenik.	Plitvička jezera su najpoznatiji i najstariji hrvatski nacionalni park, na popisu svjetske baštine UNESCO-a.	0.281633
This labyrinth of sea and rock consists of 140 uninhabited islands, islets and reefs with an area of only about seventy square kilometers…	Poznat je po veličanstvenim sedrenim slapištima koja stvaraju bistra jezera u stalnom biodinamičkom procesu stvaranja i rasta sedre.	0.3
Famous for its numerous waterfalls, formed by deposition of travertine (special kind of limestone) just like the waterfalls in Plitvice Lakes.	Kao posljedica tog procesa nastao je niz od 16 stepenasto poredanih većih jezera i nekoliko manjih, koja su najslikovitiji dio ovog Parka.	0.289916

Plitvice Lakes are the most famous and oldest Croatian National Park, entered on the World Natural Heritage List of UNESCO.	U Parku je registrirano čak 1267 različitih biljnih vrsta od čega čak 50 vrsta orhideja, 321 vrsta leptira, 157 vrsta ptica, 20 vrsta šišmiša…	0.231429
It is known for its magnificent travertine waterfalls which create clear lakes in a constant biodynamic process of travertine creation.	Ne zna se da li je Park ljepši u proljeće kad se rascvjeta cvijeće na njegovim livadama, da li za odraza jesenskog šarenila boje u jezerskim zrcalima ili za zimskog mira ledom sputanih vodopada u snježnom krajoliku.	0.125641
As a result of that process, a series of 16 cascade-lined larger and several smaller lakes, which are the most picturesque part of this Park, was created.	Nacionalni park Brijuni obuhvaća otočnu skupinu od 14 otoka i otočića ukupne površine od svega sedam četvornih kilometara.	0.254464
The Park is just as beautiful in the spring when the flowers bloom, in the fall when the lake reflects the palette of colors, or in winter time when the cold weather creates frozen waterfalls. The Brijuni islands are famous for preserved Mediterranean vegetation of holm oak, high macchia, pines and cypresses, partly shaped like a landscape park.	Brijunski otoci su poznati po očuvanoj sredozemnoj vegetaciji hrasta crnike, visoke makije te borova i čempresa, djelomično oblikovanoj kao pejzažni park.	0.42283
In mid 20th century fallow deer, axis deer and mouflon were introduced to the archipelago and today they are freely roaming and grazing the extensive grasslands or resting in the shadow of ancient Holm oaks.	Na otočje su sredinom 20. stoljeća uneseni jeleni lopatari, jeleni aksisi i mufloni koji danas bezbrižno šeću i pasu na prostranim travnjacima ili se odmaraju u hladovini stoljetnih hrastova crnika.	0.298276
In addition to these and other introduced species, the Park’s area is also inhabited by autochthonous animals, among which birds are the most prominent group.	Područje Parka naseljavaju, osim ovih i drugih unesenih vrsta i autohtone životinje, među kojima su najbrojnije ptice.	0.212264
The island Veli Brijun hosts one of the oldest olive trees in the Mediterranean, planted in the 4th century, which even today bears fruit and as a witness of ancient past attracts many tourists.	Na otoku Velikom Brijunu nalazi se jedno od najstarijih stabala masline na Sredozemlju, zasađeno još u IV stoljeću koje i danas rodi i daje plod, a kao svjedok davne prošlosti privlači mnoge turiste.	0.27963
The waters of Brijuni, comprising almost 80% of the Park’s surface, retained their original beauty and value due to established protection and it is a habitat of numerous marine organisms typical for communities of the northern Adriatic.	Akvatorij Brijuna, koji čini gotovo 80% površine Parka, zbog provedene zaštite zadržao je svoju izvornu ljepotu i vrijednost te je stanište brojnih morskih organizama tipičnih za životne zajednice sjevernog Jadrana.	0.38131
It is worth to mention footprints of the dinosaur Igvanodon on cape Ploče and Barban peninsula telling the life story of these reptiles in our region.	Važno je spomenuti i otiske stopala dinosaura Igvanodona na rtu Ploče i poluotoku Barbanu koji svjedoče o životu ovih gmazova i na našim prostorima.	0.410551
For its remarkable beauty, the islands are favorite tourist destination of world politicians and aristocracy for over a hundred years.	Zbog izuzetne ljepote otoci su još od početka stoljeća omiljeno ljetovalište svjetskih državnika i aristokracije.	0.268571
Kornati are the most indented archipelago in the Mediterranean, and it is located in North Dalmatia not far from Šibenik.	Kornati su najrazvedenija otočna skupina cijelog sredozemlja, a nalaze se u Sjevernoj Dalmaciji, nedaleko Šibenika.	0.4875
This labyrinth of sea and rock consists of 140 uninhabited islands, islets and reefs with an area of only about seventy square kilometer.	Ovaj pravi labirint mora i kamena sastoji se od oko 140 nenaseljenih otoka, otočića i hridi s površinom od svega sedamdesetak četvornih kilometara.	1.63879
Karst, typical for the entire Adriatic coast, is also present here consisting of harsh land on one side and exceptionally diverse submarine environment on the other.	Krš tipičan za cijelu jadransku obalu koji je i ovdje prisutan sastoji se od surovog kopna s jedne strane i iznimno raznovrsnog podmorja s druge strane.	0.274615
Islands are mostly covered with vegetation of rocky-terrain pastures divided by dry stone walls consisting of grassland communities typical for dry areas.	Otoci su uglavnom pokriveni vegetacijom kamenjarskih pašnjaka; međusobno odijeljenih suhozidima, a čine ih travnjačke zajednice karakteristične za suha područja.	0.264179
More than three quarters of the Park’s surface belongs to the sea, whose underwater environment, due to its diverse and abundant sea life, is the most prominent feature of this protected area.	Više od tri četvrtine površine parka pripada moru, čije je podmorje zbog raznovrsnog i bogatog podmorskog svijeta najvažnije obilježje ovog zaštićenog područja.	0.269799
Famous for its numerous waterfalls, formed by deposition of travertine (special kind of limestone) just like the waterfalls in Plitvice Lakes.	Poznata je po brojnim vodopadima, koji su, kao i kod Plitvičkih jezera, nastali taloženjem sedre, posebne vrste vapnenca.	0.25514
The National Park comprises the largest part of the river with the surrounding coastal area of the historic town of Knin.	Nacionalni park obuhvaća najveći dio toka rijeke s okolnim priobalnim prostorom od povijesnog grada Knina nedaleko njenog izvora do drugog povijesnog gradića Skradina.	0.161765
The river partly flows through the deep canyons in the limestone plateau, and partly makes the lake.	Rijeka dijelom teče dubokim kanjonima urezanim u vapnenačku zaravan, a dijelom je ujezerena.	0.292771
Among the numerous waterfalls, the most beautiful ones are the Skradinski buk and Roški Slap. ~~~ Between those two is Visovac Lake (13 km long) with an islet (see Visovac) and a Franciscan monastery.	Među brojnim vodopadima osobitom ljepotom ističu se Skradinski buk i Roški slap, između kojih je na ujezerenom dijelu rijeke smješten otočić Visovac sa franjevačkim samostanom.	0.133102
The total of 221 bird species has been recorded in the Park’s area, among which the largest number are nesting birds.	Na području parka zabilježena je 221 vrsta ptica među kojima veći broj gnjezdarica.	2.56241
Some species stay there only during spring and autumn migrations and as a result this protected area was included in ornithological important areas of Europe.	Neke vrste ovdje borave samo za vrijeme proljetnih i jesenskih seoba, zbog čega je ovo zaštićeno područje uvršteno u ornitološki važna područja Europe.	0.418333
National Park Mljet is located on the western part of the homonymous island Mljet.		-0.3
Autochthonous forests of Holm oak and Aleppo pine cover more than 90% of the Park’s surface providing it with special biological and aesthetic value and it is therefore often called the “Green Island”.		-0.3
Along with numerous coves, bays and islets, the Park is known for its salty lakes, Malo and Veliko jezero (Great and Small Lake), which are actually karst valleys submerged by sea water.	Uz brojne uvale, zaljeve i otočiće, Park je poznat po dvama slanim jezerima, Malom i Velikom jezeru, koja su morem potopljene krške udoline.	0.341393
They are abundant with a large number of species of fish, crustaceans, shells and other marine organisms.	Bogata su velikim brojem različitih vrsta riba, rakova, školjkaša i drugih morskih organizama.	0.286047
Inside the Great Lake there is a small isle of St. Mary with ancient Benedictine monastery and church dating from 12th century.	U Velikom jezeru nalazi se otočić Svete Marije s drevnim benediktinskim samostanom i crkvom, utemeljenim još u 12. stoljeću.	0.288785
The remains of the early Christian basilica, Roman palace and thermal baths are located in the town of Polače.	U naselju Polače nalaze se ostaci ranokršćanske bazilike, rimske palače i termi.	0.218919
Paklenica includes the most attractive parts of southern Velebit, the largest Croatian mountain, including its highest peaks.	Paklenica obuhvaća najatraktivnije prostore južnog dijela Velebita, najveće hrvatske planine, uključujući i njegove najviše vrhove.	0.449318
This relatively small area has an abundance of geomorphological forms, diverse flora and fauna, attractive landscapes and intact nature.	Na relativno malom području nalazi se veliko bogatstvo geomorfoloških oblika, nekoliko spilja, raznolik biljni i životinjski svijet, atraktivni krajobrazi i netaknuta priroda.	0.201681
Forests cover two thirds of the Park’s area with abundant plant communities.	Šume pokrivaju dvije trećine površine Parka i odlikuju se bogatstvom biljnih zajednica.	0.247059
This protected area offers around 150 km of walking trails and is also considered the most important Croatian hub for climbing, with over 360 equipped and prepared climbing routes, of which the best known route is the cliff Anića kuk (400 m vertical face).	U ovom zaštićenom području postoji oko 150km pješačkih staza i puteva, a ujedno se smatra najznačajnijim hrvatskim penjačkim centrom, s preko 360 opremljenih i uređenih smjerova, od kojih je najpoznatiji Anića kuk (visina stijene 400m) najpopularnije odredište hrvatskih alpinista.	0.470581
Although it is an area of marked wilderness and preserved nature, it is easily accessible to visitors due to the proximity of the Adriatic tourist road and the town of Zadar.	Iako se radi o prostoru izrazite divljine i očuvane prirode, lako je dostupan posjetiteljima zbog blizine Jadranske turističke ceste i grada Zadra.	0.262791
Risnjak is a forested mountain massif not far from the city of Rijeka that got its name after the lynx (ris), its best known inhabitant.	Risnjak je šumovit gorski masiv nedaleko grada Rijeke, koji je ime dobio po risu, svom najpopularnijem stanovniku.	0.427667
Park extends from 300 to 1.500 meters above sea level and being located where the Alps meet the Dinaric Range and where the Mediterranean gradually gives way to the Pannonia Plain, it combines almost all the forest types of the areas and contains numerous plant and animal species.	Park se prostire od 300 do 1.500 metara nad morem, a zbog čvorišnog položaja na prijelazu iz Alpa u Dinaride te iz Sredozemlja u Srednju Europu, tu su na malom području okupljene gotovo sve vrste šuma ovih prostora te mnoge biljne i životinjske vrste.	1.13876
The main phenomenon of the Park is forest and hydrogeological natural monument – Kupa spring.	Temeljni fenomen Parka su šuma i hidrogeološki spomenik prirode- izvor Kupe.	0.243478
The Park is characterized by different karts phenomena and forms so the rich vegetation hides many potholes, sinkholes and grykes.	Park karakteriziraju različite krške pojave i oblici pa se ispod bujne vegetacije kriju jame, ponikve, škrape.	0.437077
Nature lovers come to Risnjak for the beauty of the mountains, forests, waters and karst.	Ljubitelji prirode na Risnjak dolaze zbog ljepota planine, šume, voda i krša.	0.500334
The most frequent visitors are mountaineers, who find the highest peak of the massif the most rewarding challenge.	Najviše je planinara koje osobito privlači prostor oko najvišeg vrha masiva.	0.18
Risnjak peak is equally attractive in all seasons: in winter, when covered with snow; in spring, when the meadows around it transform into carpets of flowers; in summer, when it offers respite from the heat in the nearby littoral area, and in autumn, when the trees are bathed in a myriad of colors.	Vrh Risnjaka podjednako je atraktivan u sva godišnja doba, zimi kad ga prekrije snijeg, u proljeće kad se livade oko njega pretvore u cvijetnjake, ljeti kad pruža odmor od ljetnih vrućina u obližnjem priobalju i u jesen kad se šume kupaju u različitim bojama.	0.267857
Sjeverni Velebit (Northern Velebit) is the youngest Croatian National Park, established in 1999.	Sjeverni Velebit najmlađi je hrvatski nacionalni park, osnovan 1999. godine.	1.04862
It comprises the most attractive and, in terms of nature, the most valuable areas of the northern part of Velebit.	Njime se željelo obuhvatiti najatraktivnije i prirodno najvrednije prostore sjevernog dijela Velebita.	0.290323
It was proclaimed a national park for its wealth and diversity of karst forms, flora, fauna and landscapes located within a small area.	Zbog bogate raznolikosti krških oblika, živoga svijeta i krajobraza na malom prostoru proglašen je nacionalnim parkom.	0.280374
Depending on climate conditions and altitude, the area is covered in Mediterranean and mountainous vegetation.	Ovaj je jedinstven stjenovit krajolik zaštićen kao strogi rezervat, što čini najstroži oblik zaštite prirode u Hrvatskoj.	0.253608
In addition to ancient beech, fir and black pine forests, the Park hosts almost 1,500 different plant species, including a great number of endemic and relict species (Biokovo bell flower, fine-leaved moor grass, etc.).	Usprkos ambijentu surove gorske kamene divljine, kroz Rožanske je kukove majstorski tridesetih godina dvadesetog stoljeća izgrađena staza. ~~~ Po inženjeru Anti Premužiću, zaljubljeniku u Velebit koji ju je gradio, nazvana je Premužićevom stazom.	-0.0290323
The vertebrae fauna includes numerous reptiles and birds, and out of around thirty mammals inhabiting this area we should mention dormouse, bat, wild boar, chamois, mouflon and wolf.	Ova se staza smatra najljepšom pješačkom stazom u Hrvatskoj, a čuvena je po tome što i posjetiteljima sa skromnijom fizičkom kondicijom omogućuje bezopasno kretanje rubom gorostasnih stijena i strmoglavih provalija.	0.226923
In order to protect and maintain the park, in 1998 the Public institution of National Park Biokovo was established.	S nje se pružaju prekrasni vidici prema moru i kvarnerskim otocima. ~~~ Park prirode Biokovo obuhvaća istoimeni planinski masiv Biokovo.	0.234181
Annually, mountain is visited by 50,000 tourists.	Parkom prirode proglašen je 1981. godine, s površinom od 195,5 km2.	0.190909
The Nature Park Kopački rit is considered one of the most preserved fluvial-wetlands in Europe characterized by outstanding beauty of landscape and rich biodiversity.	Park se administrativno nalazi u Splitsko-dalmatinskoj županiji.	0.25
It is located in Baranja, in the northeast Croatia, between the Danube and Drava rivers in the east to the south covering a total of 238 hectares, and which, due to its inaccessibility, has remained in the intact state since the olden times.	Biokovo se ističe izraženim krškim reljefom. ~~~ Na tom se području nalazi velik broj špilja i jama, ponikava, škrapa i kamenica, kao i mnoge endemične biljne i životinjske vrste te značajna paleontološka nalazišta.	-0.00463918
The Park’s largest area is covered by white willow forests and wetland and grassland vegetation.		-0.3
Wetland conditions are favourable for a large number of amphibians, fish, birds and mammals and for that reason the south part of the Park was designated a special zoological reserve.	Uz prekrasne krajobraze i vidikovce, u parku se nalaze i posebni geomorfološki rezervati i posebni rezervati šumske vegetacije bukve i jele te autohtone šume crnog dalmatinskog bora.	0.290323
Kopački rit is especially interesting for its birds and known as one of the largest spawning grounds for Danube river basin fish.	Za zaštitu i održavanje parka, 1998. godine je osnovana Javna ustanova Park prirode Biokovo.	0.197561
Until now 282 bird species were recorded.	Godišnje planinu posjeti oko 50.000 turista.	0.258333
Due to the importance of Kopački Rit as a wetland habitat and habitat of a large number of birds, in 1986 it was included in the List of European Important Bird Areas (IBA), and was also nominated for the listing in UNESCO (World Natural Heritage).		-0.3
With it area of 50,650 hectares, Nature Park Lonjsko polje is the biggest wetland area not only in Croatia, but also in the entire Danube area.	Park prirode Kopački rit je poplavno područje u Baranji, na sjeveroistoku Hrvatske, između rijeka Dunav na istoku i Drave na jugu.	0.423206
It is located in the valley of the Sava River between Sisak and Stara Gradiška.	Utemeljen je 1976. godine i najstariji je proglašeni park prirode u Hrvatskoj.	0.291045
It consists of three fields: Lonjsko, Mokro and Poganovo. ~~~ Park is rich in plant and animal species.	Na površini od 17.000 ha (177 km2), od čega Specijalni zoološki rezervat obuhvaća 8.000 ha (80 km2), svake se godine gnijezdi oko 140 vrsta ptica.	-0.0715116
Because of those particular areas in the Park: Krapje Đol and Rakita are protected as special ornithological reserves, and the entire area of the Park was in 1983 included in the List of European Important Bird Areas (IBA).	Velika bioraznolikost od 2000 bioloških vrsta odraz je bogate flore i faune parka.	-0.183333
From 1993 the Park was included in the List of Wetlands of International Importance under the Convention on Wetlands.	Park prirode Lonjsko polje, sa svojom površinom od 50.650 ha, najveće je zaštićeno močvarno područje ne samo u Republici Hrvatskoj, već i u cijelom dunavskom porječju.	0.297
Nature Park Medvednica is located in Zagreb County.	Park prirode Medvednica nalazi se u Zagrebačkoj županiji.	0.913333
The main feature of the Nature Park Medvednica are forests (beech, fir, maple, ash and sessile oak) of great biological value due to which 8 forest reserves are protected within the Park.	Šume Medvednice spuštaju se gotovo do samog središta Zagreba.	-0.226316
Nature Park Papuk covers the largest part of the mountain Papuk, and partially of Krndija in the general direction northwest – southeast.	Park prirode Papuk obuhvaća prostorno najveći dio planine Papuk, te djelomično Krndije.	0.846058
It covers an area of 336 km2 (33 600 hectares).	Prostire se na površini od 336 km2 (33 600 ha).	4.11049
Almost 95% of the Park’s surface is covered with forests which are under special protection in some sites due to their scientific and landscape value.	Unutar Parka prirode nalaze se brojna područja koja imaju veći stupanj zaštićenosti nego ostali dijelovi parka.	0.216832
The Nature Park Papuk is protected because of its extremely valuable biological, geological, landscape and historical features and includes almost the entire area of the Mountain Papuk and western part of the Mountain Krndija.	Status posebno zaštićenih područja dobili su zbog svojih neuobičajenih značajki koje ih manifestiraju kao jedinstvene u području, regiji, zemlji pa čak i šire.	0.20137
From geological perspective, the Park is significant for its abundance of almost all types of rocks from Palaeozoic to Quaternary, as well as for the great diversity of rocks, minerals, fossils, geological structures and textures, karsts phenomena and objects.	Posebno zaštićena područja su: geološki spomenik prirode Rupnica, park šuma Jankovac, posebni rezervat šumske vegetacije Sekulinačke planine, spomenik prirode Dva hrasta, spomenik prirode Stanište tise, posebni floristički rezervat Pliš-Mališčak-Turjak-Lapjak.	0.270404
The north-western part of the Park includes the site Rupnica – the first geological nature monument in Croatia – protected because of the step-like discharge of volcanic rocks and representing a unique geological phenomenon in our country.		-0.3
Nature Park Telašćica is located on southeastern part on the island of Dugi Otok, surrounded by 13 islands and islets.	Park prirode Papuk član je Europske mreže geoparkova (EGN), te Svjetske mreže geoparkova (GGN).	0.444186
It includes six islands within the bay, and was declared a nature park in 1988.	Prvi je geopark iz Hrvatske.	-0.192
Telašćica covers the surface area of 70.5 km2, of which 44.55 km2 belongs to the sea. ~~~ The land part of the Park is an exceptionally differentiated karsts area with karsts hills and fields overflowing with Mediterranean vegetation with over 400 plant species.	Status zaštićenog područja dobila je zahvaljujući svojem iznimno vrijednom biljnom i životinjskom svijetu, geološkim i geomorfološkim fenomenima, vrijednim zajednicama morskog dna i zanimljivom arheološkom nasljeđu.	-0.0156716
It was given the status of protected area in 1980 thanks to its exceptionally valuable plant and animal life, geological and geomorphological phenomena and valuable archaeological heritage.	Biljni i životinjski svijet kopna i podmorja čini više od stotinu vrsta.	-0.156923
Velebit is one of the largest in the area of the Dinarides, extends in length about 145 kilometers from Vratnik pass above Senj to the Valley of Zrmanja River in the southeast.	Brdski masiv Velebita, jedan od najznatnijih u užem dinarskom području, proteže se, u dužinu otprilike 145 km, od Vratnika nad Senjom na sjeverozapadu do okuke Zrmanje na jugoistoku.	1.40916
Nature Park covers an area of 2,000 square kilometers and is the largest protected area of Croatia.	Park prirode Velebit prostire se na 2.000 četvornih kilometara i najveće je zaštićeno područje Hrvatske.	0.444643
Velebit’s position, as well as its geologic structure, has resulted in growth of extremely rich and diverse flora and fauna.		-0.3
Over 2,700 plant species have been recorded until now, of which 78 are endemic species.		-0.3
Among the endemics, we should point out the famous Velebit Bellflower and among tertiary relicts Croatian Sibirea. ~~~ Velebit is a nesting ground for many different bird species and from mammals we should mention two endangered species in Europe: brown bear and wolf.	Neobične stijene, divlji kanjoni, duboke jame i spilje, te bogati endemi hrvatske flore i faune razlog su zbog čega je UNESCO 1978. godine planinu Velebit uvrstio u međunarodnu mrežu rezervata biosfere – MAB.	0.0224464
Nature Park Vransko lake is administratively located in Zadar and Šibenik-Knin County.	Park prirode Vransko jezero administrativno se nalazi u Zadarskoj i Šibensko-kninskoj županiji.	0.722577
It was declared a Nature Park in 1999 and it spreads on the area of 57 km2.	Parkom je proglašen 1999. godine. ~~~ Vransko jezero se prostire na površini od 57 km2.	0.240698
Park represents a geomorphological rarity of our karsts area since it is a cryptodepression filled with mildly salt water in which a specific community of sea organisms developed.	To je jezero zapravo krško polje ispunjeno vodom i rijedak primjer kriptodepresije. ~~~ Posebnost parka je u bogatstvu ptica i riba.	-0.0530973
The north-western part of the lake is in the zone of intensive flooding and is designated a special ornithological reserve due to its diversity of bird species (wetland birds).	Prema procjenama u parku za jesenje selidbe dnevno boravi između 20.000 i 200.000 ptica.	0.0194805
The Park currently records 235 bird species, of which 102 are nesting birds, while for others the Park is an important wintering or transitory site. ~~~ As much as 143 migratory bird species from Central and North Europe use this area as resting grounds before continuing their journey.	Dominantna karakteristika Parka je posebni ornitološki rezervat, a sjeverozapadni dio jezera je 1983. godine proglašen posebnim ornitološkim rezervatom i uvršten u popis važnih ornitoloških područja u Europi.	-0.0386842
In 2013, it was included in the list of protected wetlands under the Ramsar Convention.	Park prirode je 2013. godine uvršten u popis zaštićenih močvarnih područja Ramsarskom konvencijom.	0.227027
Nature Park Učka is located in the mountain range Učka in Croatia, near the city of Rijeka and covers an area of 160 square kilometers.	Park prirode Učka se nalazi u planinskom masivu Učke u Hrvatskoj, u blizini grada Rijeke i obuhvaća površinu od 160 četvornih kilometara.	1.9746
Owing to reliefs and immediate vicinity of the sea, the Nature Park Učka has a specific microclimate and developed abundant forest vegetation.		-0.3
It was declared a protected area in 1999.	Park prirode je proglašen zaštićenim područjem 1999. godine.	0.43619
The Park is home to over 1,200 plant species, of which special significance is given to endemic taxa inhabiting rocks and “Gulles” (e.g. ~~~ Učka bellflower).		-0.3
It is also home to around 150 bird species, of which over 70 nests in this area.	Blizina mora pogoduje specifičnoj klimi i bujnoj vegetaciji.	0.245455
The Park’s territory is rich with speleological objects.	Mnoge zaštićene i rijetke životinjske i biljne vrste se mogu naći u rezervatu.	0.190385
According to available data, there’s almost 200 of them.	Područje Parka obiluje speleološkim objektima kojih prema dostupnim podacima ima gotovo 200.	0.105882
The Nature Park Žumberak–Samoborsko gorje is characterized by preserved nature, forests, streams, waterfalls, vineyard covered hills, pastures and traditional farms.		-0.3
It covers the area of 350 km2.	Park prirode Žumberak prostire se na površini od 350 km2.	4.488
Lastovo Archipelago is the youngest Croatian Nature Park (declared in 2006).	Većim djelom se nalazi u Zagrebačkoj, a manjim u Karlovačkoj županiji.	0.290769
	Vegetacijski pokrov čine bukove i miješane hrastovo-bukove šume koje se izmjenjuju s livadama i pašnjacima nastalim djelovanjem čovjeka.	-0.3
	Titulu zaštićenog područja Parku je priskrbilo njegovo bogatstvo flore i faune.	-0.3
	Šume i travnjaci dva su glavna ekosustava u kojima su nastanjene i neke rijetke i zaštićene vrste biljaka i životinja.	-0.3
	Vodno bogatstvo također je odlika ovog prostora, a očituje se kroz brojnost izvora i vodotoka.	-0.3
	U sklopu parka moguće je obići i neka od arheoloških nalazišta. ~~~ Biljni pokrov se prije svega odlikuje raznolikošću, naročito rijetkim zaštićenim biljnim vrstama kao sto su: blagajev likovac, mekolisna veprina, tridesetak vrsta kaćuna (europske orhideje), božikovina, crnkasta sasa, planinski božur, hrvatska perunika, hrvatski karanfil i mnoge druge. ~~~ Lastovsko otočje je najmlađi hrvatski park prirode, proglašen 2006. godine.	-0.3
It consists of 44 islands, islets and highly indented coastline, with a total area of 53 km2 and 143 km2 of sea surface, bordered by stone lights Sušac, Tajana, Loggerhead and Struga.	Lastovsku otočnu skupinu čine 44 otoka, otočića i hridi vrlo razvedene obale, ukupne površine 53 km2 i 143 km2 morske površine, omeđenih kamenim svjetlima Sušca, Tajana, Glavata i Struge.	1.87273
Because of its mystical beauty, accentuated landscape value, thick forests and fertile fields rich ponds, high coastal cliffs, land and underwater caves, and many rare sea and land species and habitats, Lastovo Archipelago has been declared a Nature Park.	Najprepoznatljivija odrednica koja definira fizionomiju povijesnoga grada Dubrovnika i daje mu onaj karakteristični, u cijelom svijetu znamenit izgled jesu njegove netaknute gradske zidine, koje u neprekinutom tijeku dugom 1940 metara obuhvaćaju grad.	0.293119
Other specific features of the archipelago are numerous stone churches and chapels, picturesque chimneys and the traditional Lastovo Carnival, but one must not forget local inhabitants, who prove that the coexistence of man and nature is possible with developed environmental awareness.	Ta kompleksna tvorevina, jedan od najljepših i najčvršćih tvrđavnih sustava na Mediteranu, sastavljena je od niza utvrda, bastiona, kazamata, kula i odvojenih tvrđava. ~~~ Dubrovnik, kasnosrednjovjekovni planirani grad na južnodalmatinskoj obali postao je značajnom sredozemnom pomorskom silom već u 13. stoljeću.	-0.0218623
The most recognizable landmark that define the physiognomy of the historical city of Dubrovnik and give the city its characteristic, world known appearance are its intact city walls, which in the length of 1940 meters surround the city.	Premda u velikoj mjeri oštećen zemljotresom iz 1667. godine Dubrovnik je uspio sačuvati svoje prekrasne gotičke, renesansne i barokne crkve, samostane, palače i vodoskoke.	0.33039
This complex is one of the most beautiful and solid fortress systems on the Mediterranean, is composed of a series of forts, bastions, casemates, towers and freestanding fortresses.	Nakon uništavanja tijekom Domovinskog rata Dubrovnik je bio uvršten na Popis ugrožene baštine svijeta UNESCO-a od 1991. do 1998.	0.195652
Split, the second largest city of Croatia, is situated at the foot of Marjan hill near Trogir and Omiš.	Podno Marjana u blizini Trogira i Omiša smjestio se drugi po veličini grad u Hrvatskoj- Split.	0.281707
This urban centre of Dalmatia is ideal for those who want to spend their vacation partying until late into the night.	Ovo urbano središte Dalmacije idealno je za sve koji žele svoj odmor provesti tulumareći do kasno u noć.	0.280435
The most famous sights are Split Diocletian palace which is under UNESCO protection, Cathedral of St Doimus, the statue of Gregory of Nin, the Temple of Jupiter and Prokurative.	Najpoznatije znamenitosti Splita su Dioklecijanova palača koja stoji pod zaštitom UNESCO-a, katedrala sv.Dujma, kip Grgura Ninskog, Jupiterov hram i Prokurative.	0.432512
The Emperor’s Palace is one of the most significant works of late-ancient architecture, not just for the preservation of original parts and the whole, but also for a series of original architectural forms announcing the new early-Christian, Byzantine and early-medieval art.	Careva palača jedno je od najznačajnijih djela kasnoantičke arhitekture ne samo po očuvanosti pojedinih izvornih dijelova i cjeline, nego i po nizu originalnih arhitektonskih formi koje navještaju novu ranokršćansku, bizantsku i ranosrednjovjekovnu umjetnost.	0.297447
The cathedral was built in the middle Ages by using materials from an ancient mausoleum.	Katedrala je izgrađena u Srednjem vijeku rabeći materijale antiknog mauzoleja.	0.2875
Roman churches from the 12th and 13th centuries, medieval forts and gothic, renaissance and baroque palaces are contained within the Roman walls, thus creating a harmonious whole.	Romaničke crkve iz dvanaestog i trinaestog stoljeća, srednjovjekovne utvrde, te gotičke, renesanse i barokne palače nalaze se unutar rimskih zidina tvoreći tako harmoničnu cjelinu.	0.280519
The beauty of Plitvice and its unsurpassable attractiveness are a result of gypsum and gypsum-depositing plants.	Plitvice zahvaljuju svoju ljepotu i nenadmašnu atraktivnost sedri i sedrotvornom bilju.	0.477848
Creation of gypsum and rearrangement of the river bed created a string of 16 Plitvice Lakes representing a magnificent natural architectural phenomenon, surrounded by thick forests inhabited by bears, wolves and many other rare animal and plant species.	Tvorbom sedre i pregrađivanjem riječnoga korita, nastala je niska od 16 Plitvičkih jezera koja predstavlja veličanstven arhitektonski fenomen prirode okružen gustim šumama u kojima obitavaju medvjedi, vukovi i mnoge druge rijetke životinjske i biljne vrste.	1.19731
The waters flowing over the limestone and chalk have, over thousands of years, deposited travertine barriers, creating natural dams which in turn have created a series of beautiful lakes, caves and waterfalls.	Vode koje tisućama godina teku preko vapenenačkih stijena uzrokovale su stvaranje sedrenih barijera, te su gradeći prirodne pregrade stvarale brojna prekrasna jezera, špilje i vodopade.	0.276506
These geological processes continue today.	Ovi geološki procesi nastavljaju se i danas.	0.292308
The forests in the park are home to bears, wolves and many rare bird species.	Šume u parku dom su medvjedima, vukovima i mnogim rijetkim pticama.	0.274576
The cathedral complex in Poreč was named Euphrasius Basilica after Bishop Euphrasius who thoroughly renovated the cathedral in mid-6th century and decorated it with famous mosaics.	Porečki katedralni sklop naziva se Eufrazijana po biskupu Eufraziju koji je sredinom 6. stoljeća temeljito preuredio katedralu i ukrasio je poznatim mozaicima.	0.265957
Before Euphrasius’ renovation, there were at least two phases of early-Christian buildings in the same place.	Prije Eufrazijeve pregradnje postojale su barem dvije faze ranokršćanskih građevina na istom mjestu.	0.283696
In Poreč, Christianity was established as early as the 4th century – the basilica, the atrium, the baptistery and the Episcopal palace are remarkable examples of religious architecture, while the basilica itself combines elements of classicism and Byzantine Empire in an exceptional way.	U Poreču je kršćanstvo utemeljeno već u 4. stoljeću te su bazilika, atrij, krstionica i episkopska palača izvanredni primjeri religiozne arhitekture, dok sama bazilika izuzetno spaja elemente klasicizma i bizanta.	0.208901
The apse is luxuriously decorated with figurative mosaics that are among the most significant examples of its kind in Europe.	Apsida je bogato ukrašena figurativnim mozaicima koji predstavljaju jedne od najznačajnijih primjera te vrste u Europi.	0.3
Trogir is an excellent example of urban continuity.	Trogir je izvanredan primjer kontinuiteta grada.	0.721753
The orthogonal street plan of this island settlement originates from the Hellenic era – consecutive rulers continued to decorate it with exceptional public and residential buildings and forts.	Ortogonalni plan ulica ovog otočkog naselja potječe iz helenističkog doba koji su uzastopni vladari nastavili ukrašavati s raznim izuzetnim javnim i stambenim zgradama i utvrdama.	0.400385
	Njegove lijepe romaničke crkve upotpunjene su izuzetnim renesansnim i baroknim zdanjima.	-0.3
	Najznačajnija građevina je trogirska katedrala s portalom zapadnih vratiju, remek-djelom majstora Radovana najznačajnijim primjerom romaničko-gotičke umjetnosti u Hrvatskoj.	-0.3
The Cathedral of St James in Šibenik (1431-1535), on the Dalmatian coast, bears witness to the considerable exchanges in the field of monumental arts between Northern Italy, Dalmatia and Tuscany in the 15th and 16th centuries.	Stara jezgra formirala se u razdoblju 13.-15. stoljeća unutar zidina koje je Venecija u 15. stoljeću obnovila, izgradivši dvije još i danas sačuvane utvrde: kaštel Kamerlengo i kulu sv. ~~~ Marka.	-0.018314
In July of 2008, Starigrad Plain was added to the UNESCO World Heritage List.	U prošlosti, Trogir je bio jedan od najistaknutijih kulturnih središta Dalmacije.	0.258462
The explanation provided by the World Organization states that the vineyards and olive groves in the Plain have remained practically intact since it was first colonized by the ancient Greeks and that they are a unique example of the geometric land division used in the ancient times.	Katedrala Sv. ~~~ Jakova koja je izgrađena između 1431. i 1535. godine svjedok je bitnih razmjena u području spomeničke umjetnosti između Sjeverne Italije, Dalmacije i Toskane 15. i 16. stoljeća.	-0.0575581
Starigrad Plainn located on the island of Hvar is a cultural landscape which practically remained the same since it was first colonized by Ionian Greeks from Paros in the 4th century BC.	Starogradsko polje na jadranskom otoku Hvaru kulturni je krajolik koji je praktički ostao nepromijenjen od vremena kada su ga po prvi put kolonizirali jonski Grci iz Parosa u 4. stoljeću prije Krista.	0.269231
The original agricultural activity of this fertile plain, mainly centring on grapes and olives, has been maintained since Greek times to the present.	Autentično poljodjelstvo na ovom plodnom polju, uglavnom uzgoj vinove loze i maslina održalo se od helenističkog vremena do danas.	0.268966
The site is also a natural reserve.	Lokalitet je također i prirodni rezervat.	0.22
The landscape features ancient stone walls and trims, or small stone shelters, and bears testimony to the ancient geometrical system of land division used by the ancient Greeks, the chora which has remained virtually intact over 24 centuries.	Ovaj krajolik, u kojem se nalaze antički suhozidi i međe, ili manje kamene zgrade, svjedoči antičkom geometrijskom sustavu podjele zemljišta koju su koristili stari Grci, hori, koji je ostao praktički nepromijenjen 24 stoljeća.	1.26615
Croatian coast disposes, besides clear and clean sea, also with numerous beaches.	Hrvatska obala, osim čistog i bistrog mora raspolaže i sa brojnim uređenim plažama.	0.278873
The beaches are often further arranged with various offers, slides for children, beach volleyball courts, and coffee bars and restaurants along the beach.	Plaže su nerijetko dodatno uređene raznovrsnim ponudama, toboganima za djecu, terenima za odbojku na pijesku, te kafićima i restoranima uz plažu.	0.293077

For all those who love water and water activities at disposal are aquaparks.	Za sve ljubitelje vode i vodenih aktivnosti na raspolaganju su aquaparkovi.	0.295385
The exciting world of water and various attractions, swimming pools, water slides, spa and wellness centers, rich gastronomy and other services offer the possibility for a fun vacation for the whole family.	Uzbudljivi vodeni svijet prepun različitih atrakcija, bazeni, tobogani, wellness i spa centri, bogata gastronomska ponuda i ostali zanimljivi sadržaji nude mogućnost za zabavni odmor za cijelu obitelj.	0.509172
The most interesting water park in Istria is only five kilometers away from the coast.	Najzanimljiviji vodeni park u Istri, udaljen je svega pet kilometara od obale.	0.50871
Water Park is the perfect choice of entertainment for whole family.	Vodeni park predstavlja savršen izbor zabave za cijelu obitelj.	0.294737
Water world extends to over 81 000 m2 where lot of interesting attractions are guaranteed on 20 different slides with over 1.2 km of pipes with different angles of inclination.	Vodeni svijet prostire se na čak 81 000 m2, a obilje zanimljivosti zajamčeno je na 20 različitih tobogana, sa preko 1,2 km cijevi s različitim kutovima nagiba.	1.77826
There is also the biggest swimming pool with artificial waves in this part of Europe, where You can surf, swim or float on air inflatables.	Tu se nalazi i najveći bazen s umjetnim valovima u ovom dijelu Europe, na kojima se može surfati, plivati ili plutati na zračnim gumenjacima.	0.404483
Water Park is an ideal place for relaxation, entertainment and recreation.	Vodeni park idealno je mjesto za odmor, zabavu i rekreaciju.	0.225
It is designed for all ages, from the youngest to those in the prime of life.	Namijenjen je svim generacijama, od najmlađih do onih u najboljim godinama.	0.280952
Park is consisting of eight pools with thermal water.	Park se sastoji od osam bazena s prirodnom termalnom vodom, a prilagođen je svim uzrastima.	0.384783
Indoor water park with natural thermal water, size 9,50m x 17,50m, offers guests the opportunity for rest and relaxation and is open all year round.	Unutarnji vodeni park s prirodnom termalnom vodom, veličine 9,50m x 17,50m, gostima pruža mogućnost odmora i relaksacije, a otvoren je tijekom cijele godine.	0.7664
Visitors can use five swimming pools for all ages and two large whirlpools.	Posjetiocima je na raspolaganju pet bazena za sve uzraste i 2 velika whirlpoola.	0.276563
	Aquaparka Adamovec prostire se na 15 000 m2.	-0.3
	Nalazi se u blizini grada Zagreba, samo dvadesetak minuta vožnje od zagrebačkog Glavnog kolodvora.	-0.3
	Atraktivni vanjski i unutarnji bazeni i brojni sadržaji namijenjeni su za savršeni odmor cijele obitelji.	-0.3
	Bazeni s raznim atrakcijama za djecu i odrasle, bogati wellness i spa i vrhunski restoran nalaze se u ponudi aquaparka.	-0.3
	U unutrašnjosti se nalazi rekreacijski bazen s masažama, toboganom, gejzirima i drugim zanimljivostima.	-0.3
Aquapark St. Martin offers 2,600 m2 of water area.	Aquapark termi sv. ~~~ Martin nudi 2.600 m2 vodenih površina.	0.394286
Numerous activities for all ages, entertainment programs, wellness and excellent gastronomy can be found in Aquapark.	Brojne aktivnosti za sve uzraste, animacijski programi, wellnes i vrhunska gastronomska ponuda mogu se pronaći u Aquaparku.	0.282524

Nautical tourism is a phenomenon that is receiving attention of publicity and tourists.	Nautički turizam je fenomen koji sve više poprima pažnju javnosti i turista.	0.269565
This is one of the most promising forms of Croatian tourism.	Jedan je to od najperspektivnijih oblika hrvatskog turizma.	0.288235
Republic of Croatia is a Mediterranean country with rugged coastline and islands.	Republika Hrvatska je sredozemna zemlja s razvedenom obalom i otocima.	0.256452
Archipelago with more than a thousand islands is a distinguishing mark of Croatian tourism on which Croatia is building a comparative advantage.	Otočni arhipelag s više od tisuću otoka prepoznatljiv je znak hrvatskog turizma na čemu se gradi komparativna prednost.	0.252336
Because of the many natural resources, such as coastline and relief features, especially valuable and successful segment of their tourism is nautical tourism.	Upravo zbog brojnih prirodnih potencijala kojima Hrvatska raspolaže, poput razvedene obale i reljefnih obilježja, posebno vrijedan i uspješan dio hrvatskog turizma je nautički turizam.	0.236496
It is a special form of tourism that is in specific characteristics significantly different from other forms of tourism.	Poseban je to oblik turizma koji se po svojim specifičnim obilježjima bitno razlikuje od ostalih oblika turizma.	0.287879
Tendency is placed on necessity of finding a compromise between need to preserve natural areas and need for economic development.	Tendencija se stavlja na nužnost pronalaženja kompromisa između potrebe za očuvanjem prirodnog prostora i potrebe za gospodarskim razvojem.	0.256757
Principles of long-term development of nautical tourism, which includes management of the system of nautical tourism, nature conservation and environment, quality and competitiveness and economic evaluation have been the guidelines on which this form of tourism is based.	Principi dugoročnog razvoja nautičkog turizma koji uključuju upravljanje sustavom nautičkog turizma, očuvanje prirode i okoliša, kvalitetu i konkurentnost, gospodarsku valorizaciju i slično, odrednice su na kojima se ovaj oblik turizma zasniva.	0.282432
Aspiration of boaters are to cruise the coast and islands and some of them are staying in port from where they go on excursions.	Težnja nautičara je da krstare obalom i otocima, a neki od njih borave u matičnoj luci odakle odlaze na izlete.	0.26875
Croatian advantage is reflected in natural beauty and ecological preservation.	Prednost Hrvatske se ogleda u prirodnim ljepotama i ekološkoj očuvanosti.	0.286567

It is situated in the central part of Croatian coast,between Šibenik and Split, in the heart of Dalmacia in Rogoznica, in a beautiful protected bay Soline.In our complex there are 10 berths and transit gat with total 450 totally eqipped berths as well as well protected area for onshore berths.	U najljepšem dijelu gradske luke, sjeverno od poluotoka Sustipana, smjestila se ACI marina Split. ~~~ Otvorena je cijele godine, a njezin dugački lukobran pruža izvrsnu zaštitu od mora i južnih vjetrova.	-0.0581461
Unavoidable facilities are in hotel Kopno , complex with outdoor pools and disco night club, sports centre, main congress hall,and guarded parking.Whole complex of marina Frapa is spread on 136000 m2. Health Tourism is a kind of tourism when individuals travel for healing or for their own benefit, for medical or health care services.	Zdravstveni turizam označava onu vrstu turizma kada pojedinci putuju radi ozdravljenja ili za vlastitu dobrobit, zbog medicinskih ili zdravstvenih usluga.	0.236283
In Croatia there are extremely favorable natural resources for all kinds of medical tourism.	U Republici Hrvatskoj postoje izrazito povoljni prirodni resursi za sve vrste zdravstvenog turizma.	0.27
Pleasant climate, high quality air, lush vegetation, Adriatic Sea, thermal waters and therapeutic mud are only some of them.	Ugodna klima, visoka kvaliteta zraka, bujna vegetacija, Jadransko more, termalne vode i ljekovito blato samo neki od njih.	0.29717
Spas in Croatia offer natural and healing conditions, professional medical staff, high standards of health services, latest equipment and an affordable price. 	Osnovu zdravstvenog turizma karakterizira primjena prirodnih ljekovitih činitelja koji mogu biti morski (liječenje morem – talasoterapija), toplički (termomineralne vode, ljekovita blata, naftalan) i klimatski (mjesta s različitom klimom, kvaliteta zraka i slično).	-0.3
	Tijekom boravka u lječilištima slobodno vrijeme korisnika može se ispuniti brojnim aktivnostima (sudjelovanje u kulturnim manifestacijama, posjeti muzejima, galerijama i izložbama i drugo) ili organiziranim izletima u mjesta bogate povijesne tradicije.	-0.3
Croatia is a country rich in culture and tradition.	Hrvatska je zemlja bogate kulture i tradicije.	0.278049
The rich cultural heritage is revealed in many museums, galleries and churches that are part of the UNESCO World Heritage List.	Bogata kulturna baština otkriva se unutar brojnih muzeja, galerija i crkava koje su dio UNESCO-ova popisa svjetske baštine.	0.297222
Preservation and cultivation of immaterial Cultural Heritage transform every event, even the smallish walk, in a down staircase journey to truly experience the rich and glorious past.	Čuvanje i njegovanje nematerijalne kulturne baštine pretvaraju svaki događaj, pa čak i omanju šetnju u pravi silazak tisućljetnim stubama bogate i slavne povijesti.	0.281879
Traditional events in Croatia are of particular importance.	Tradicionalne manifestacije u Hrvatskoj od posebnog su značaja.	0.271698
Because of its exceptional value events have status of immaterial cultural heritage.	Zbog svoje iznimne vrijednosti manifestacije često puta imaju status nematerijalnog kulturnog dobra.	0.46185

Numerous bars and clubs offer entertainment until dawn.	Brojni kafići i klubovi nude zabavu do zore.	0.223077
Clubs organize open air parties, hosts famous DJs and organizes numerous house and techno parties in the open.	Uz zabave na otvorenom, klubovi ugošćuju i poznate DJ-eve i organiziraju se brojne house i techno zabave na otvorenome.	0.583875
Guests can enjoy numerous concerts and festivals, especially during summer.	Također, organiziraju se i brojni koncerti i festivali, naročito tijekom ljeta.	0.277612

For fans of different types of entertainment, with a slightly calmer atmosphere, domestic and foreign guests can relax in one of the many cafes, bars, pubs, or casino.	Za ljubitelje drugačije vrste zabave, uz nešto mirniju atmosferu, domaći i strani gosti mogu se opustiti i u nekome od brojnih kafića, barova, pubova, pivnica ili casina.	0.282979
Numerous possibilities for active tourism are offered for tourists who want to experience more active vacation.	Za turiste koji žele iskusiti aktivniji godišnji odmor brojne su mogućnosti za aktivni turizam.	0.261628
Cycling, golf, horseback riding, canoeing, rafting, kayaking, diving, sport fishing, water sports, flying, sailing, hiking, skiing are just some of the possibilities. Beautiful coastal landscape, rugged coastline, preserved nature, numerous coves and beaches, flora and fauna, old historic cities and architecture will discover Croatia as ideal destination for all those who are expecting more from vacation than just sun and sea.	Lijepi morski krajobraz, razvedena obala, očuvana priroda, brojne uvale i plaže, bogatstvo flore i faune, stari povijesni gradovi i arhitektura otkrit će Hrvatsku kao idealno odredište za sve one koje od turizma očekuju nešto više od sunca i mora.	0.287558

Croatia is territorially small country, but it has extremely rich cultural heritage, history, traditions, customs and national resources.	Republika Hrvatska teritorijalno je mala zemlja, ali je zemlja izrazito bogate kulturne baštine, povijesti, prepuna tradicija, običaja i nacionalnih dobara.	0.252893
To preserve all goods that country has in one place and present all that to public, so they can get acquainted with the traditions, culture and various types of art, established are museums.	Kako bi se sva dobra kojima zemlja raspolaže sačuvala na jednom mjestu, ali i prezentirala javnosti kako bi se upoznali sa tradicijom, kulturom, ali i raznim vrstama umjetnosti osnovani su muzeji.	0.281132
In Croatia today there are over two hundred museums.	U Hrvatskoj se danas nalazi preko dvjesto muzeja.	0.286047
Croatian cuisine is as diverse as the country’s past and nature.	Okusi koje Hrvatska nudi raznoliki su i fascinantni baš kao i priroda koja ih je, između ostalog, i oblikovala.	0.0947368
From continental cuisine of Slavonia and Zagorje with mainly meat menus, across the Istrian cuisine rich in spices, to Mediterranean specialties of Dalmatia with predominant fish, seafood and, the world much appreciated, olive oil, the flavors are different as well as their method of preparation.	Od kontinentalne kuhinje Slavonije i Zagorja s pretežito mesnim menijima preko istarske kuhinje bogate začinima pa sve do mediteranske Dalmacije čijim specijalitetima prevladavaju riba, plodovi mora i, u svijetu vrlo cijenjeno, maslinovo ulje, okusi su različiti baš kao i način pripreme.	0.298819
Discover Croatia cuisine by visiting restaurants or idyllic taverns that will win you over with their unique style and homely atmosphere.	Upoznajte Hrvatsku kuhinju kroz posjete restoranima ili idiličnim konobama koje će vas svojim jednistvenim stilom i domaćoj atmosferi osvojiti.	0.272034

The city is the industrial, administrative, judicial and cultural center.	Grad je industrijsko, upravno, sudsko i kulturno središte.	0.232075

	Nastao je iz dva naselja na susjednim brežuljcima, Gradeca i Kaptola, koji čine njegovu jezgru.	-0.3

The specialty of tourist offer of Croatian Zagorje are feudal castles and ruins of medieval fortes.	Posebnost turističke ponude Hrvatskog zagorja čine feudalni dvorci i ruševine srednjovjekovnih utvrda.	0.264706
Fifty castles were built mostly in baroque period, in 17th and 18th centuries.	Pedesetak dvoraca izgrađeno je uglavnom u razdoblju baroka, u 17. i 18. stoljeću.	0.277612
Great value of castles, is not just for a building itself, but also for its entire inventory in terms of valuable paintings, portraits, frescoes, furniture and other important elements.	Velika je vrijednost dvoraca, ne samo kao građevine, već i zbog njegov cjelokupnog inventara u pogledu vrijednih slika, portreta, freski, namještaja i drugih značajnih elemenata.	0.298101
Castles are reminders of high level of cultural life and architectural art in recent centuries.	Dvorci služe kao svojevrsni podsjetnici visoke razine kulturnog življenja i graditeljskog umijeća proteklih stoljeća.	0.20122
